 18917                                  	; dx = [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; *
 18918 00002C53 263B562F                	cmp	dx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 18919                                  	;pop	bx
 18920 00002C57 750A                    	jne	short yesdirty_fc_4
 18921                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+2Dh]

 18923 00002C5D EB04                    	jmp     short yesdirty_fc_4
 18924                                  yesdirty_fc_3:

 18930

 18932 00002C68 7258                    	JC	short No_fileJ

 18935

 18937

 18939                                  
 18940                                  DELNXT:
 18941 00002C6D C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Possible to get here without this set
 18942 00002C71 E83D1C                  	call	GETENTRY		; Registers need to be reset
 18943 00002C74 724C                    	JC	short No_fileJ

 18951

 18964 00002C89 E8B53B                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 18965 00002C8C 7234                    	JC	short No_fileJ
 18966                                  ;
 18967                                  ; Now we need to test FoundDel for our flags. The cases to consider are:
 18968                                  ;
 18969                                  ;   not found not deleted		file not found
 18970                                  ;   not found	  deleted		*** impossible ***
 18971                                  ;	found not deleted		access denied (read-only)
 18972                                  ;	found	  deleted		no error

 18978                                  ; and to force the DOS to issue a media check.

 18993

 19003                                  DelError:

 19005 00002CC0 7503                    	JNZ	short Del_access_errJ 	; yes. Access denied

 19012                                  
 19013                                  ;Break	<REN_DEL_Check - check for access for rename and delete>
 19014                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19015                                  ; Procedure Name : REN_DEL_Check
 19016                                  ;
 19017                                  ; Inputs:
 19018                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 19019                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX points to entry
 19020                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI points to firclus field of entry
 19021                                  ;	[WFP_Start] points to name
 19022                                  ; Function:
 19023                                  ;	Check for Exclusive access on given file.
 19024                                  ;	  Used by RENAME, SET_FILE_INFO, and DELETE.
 19025                                  ; Outputs:
 19026                                  ;	ES:BP = [THISDPB]
 19027                                  ;	NOTE: The WFP string pointed to by [WFP_Start] Will be Modified. The
 19028                                  ;		last element will be loaded from the directory entry. This is
 19029                                  ;		so the name given to the sharer doesn't have any meta chars in
 19030                                  ;		it.
 19031                                  ;	Carry set if sharing violation, INT 24H generated
 19032                                  ;	    NOTE THAT AX IS NOT error_sharing_violation.
 19033                                  ;		This is because input AX is preserved.
 19034                                  ;		Caller must set the error if needed.
 19035                                  ;	Carry clear
 19036                                  ;		OK
 19037                                  ; AX,DS,BX,SI,DI preserved
 19038                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19039                                  
 19040                                  	; 31/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19041                                  	
 19042                                  REN_DEL_Check:
 19043                                  
 19044 00002CC8 1E                      	PUSH	DS

 19269                                  ;============================================================================
 19270                                  ; RENAME.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 19271                                  ;============================================================================
 19272                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19273                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19274                                  
 19275                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_RENAME - Internal RENAME call for MS-DOS
 19276                                  ;	NAME	DOS_RENAME
 19277                                  
 19278                                  ;**	Low level routine for renaming files
 19279                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19280                                  ;	DOS_RENAME
 19281                                  ;
 19282                                  ;	Modification history:
 19283                                  ;
 19284                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19285                                  
 19286                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19287                                  ;
 19288                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_RENAME
 19289                                  ;
 19290                                  ; Inputs:
 19291                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to SOURCE WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19292                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19293                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string [SOURCE]
 19294                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19295                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19296                                  ;	[REN_WFP] Points to DEST WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19297                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19298                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19299                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19300                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19301                                  ; Function:
 19302                                  ;	Rename the specified file(s)
 19303                                  ;	NOTE: This routine uses most of AUXSTACK as a temp buffer.
 19304                                  ; Outputs:
 19305                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19306                                  ;	    OK
 19307                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19308                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19309                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19310                                  ;			No match for source, or dest path invalid
 19311                                  ;		error_not_same_device
 19312                                  ;			Source and dest are on different devices
 19313                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19314                                  ;			Directory specified (not simple rename),
 19315                                  ;			Device name given, Destination exists.
 19316                                  ;			NOTE: In third case some renames may have
 19317                                  ;			 been done if metas.
 19318                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19319                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19320                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19321                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19322                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19323                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19324                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 19325                                  ;			Deny both access required, generates an INT 24.
 19326                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19327                                  ;
 19328                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19329                                  
 19330                                  	; 14/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19331                                  	; 31/01/2024 Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19332                                  
 19333                                  DOS_RENAME:
 19334                                  
 19335                                  ;hkn; DOS_RENAME is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set up
 19336                                  ;hkn; at this point to DOSDATA.
 19337                                  
 19338 00002D7E E8A6EA                  	call	TestNet
 19339 00002D81 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_RENAME
 19340                                  
 19341                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19342                                  ;	transfer NET_RENAME
 19343                                  ;ELSE
 19344                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 17
 19345                                  	;INT	2FH
 19346                                  	;return
 19347                                  
 19348 00002D83 B81111                  	mov     ax, 1111h
 19349 00002D86 CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - RENAME REMOTE FILE
 19350                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS, 
 19351                                  			; SDA first filename pointer = offset of fully-qualified old name
 19352                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19353                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 19354 00002D88 C3                      	retn
 19355                                  ;ENDIF
 19356                                  
 19357                                  LOCAL_RENAME:
 19358 00002D89 C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk ; 2
 19359 00002D8E 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 19360 00002D92 8B3E[B405]              	MOV	DI,[REN_WFP]
 19361 00002D96 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 19362 00002D98 8A25                    	MOV	AH,[DI]
 19363 00002D9A 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020H		; Lower case
 19364 00002D9D 38E0                    	CMP	AL,AH
 19365 00002D9F 7405                    	JZ	short SAMEDRV
 19366 00002DA1 B81100                  	MOV	AX,error_not_same_device ; 11h
 19367 00002DA4 F9                      	STC
 19368 00002DA5 C3                      	retn
 19369                                  
 19370                                  SAMEDRV:
 19371 00002DA6 FF36[2E03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 19372 00002DAA FF36[2C03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD]
 19373 00002DAE 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	[DMAADD+2],DS
 19374                                  
 19375                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA is in DOSDATA
 19376 00002DB2 C706[2C03][2006]        	MOV	WORD [DMAADD],RENAMEDMA
 19377 00002DB8 C606[7005]00            	MOV	byte [FOUND_DEV],0	; Rename fails on DEVS, assume not a dev
 19378 00002DBD E829EB                  	call	ECritDisk
 19379 00002DC0 E86807                  	call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST	; Sets [NoSetDir] to 1, [CURBUF+2]:BX
 19380                                  					;    points to entry
 19381 00002DC3 7314                    	JNC	short Check_Dev
 19382 00002DC5 83F812                  	CMP	AX,error_no_more_files ; 12h
 19383 00002DC8 7503                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 19384 00002DCA B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found ; 2
 19385                                  GOTERR:
 19386 00002DCD F9                      	STC
 19387                                  RENAME_POP:
 19388 00002DCE 8F06[2C03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD]
 19389 00002DD2 8F06[2E03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 19390                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 19391                                  	;retn
 19392                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19393 00002DD6 E93DEB                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19394                                  
 19395                                  Check_Dev:
 19396                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19397                                  	;mov	ax,5
 19398 00002DD9 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; Assume error
 19399                                  	
 19400                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19401 00002DDC 1E                      	PUSH	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19402 00002DDD C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		      ;PTM.  check if source a dir  ;AN000;
 19403                                  	;add	si,21
 19404 00002DE1 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19405                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 19406 00002DE4 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;PTM.	    ;AN000;
 19407 00002DE8 7407                    	JZ	short notdir		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19408 00002DEA 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		      ;PTM.  if yes, make sure path ;AN000;
 19409 00002DEE E86FFA                  	call	Check_PathLen2		      ;PTM.   length < 67	    ;AN000;
 19410                                  notdir:
 19411 00002DF1 1F                      	POP	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19412 00002DF2 77D9                    	JA	short GOTERR		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19413                                  
 19414                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19415 00002DF4 803E[7005]00            	CMP	byte [FOUND_DEV],0
 19416 00002DF9 75D2                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 19417                                  
 19418                                  ; At this point a source has been found. There is search continuation info (a
 19419                                  ; la DOS_SEARCH_NEXT) for the source at RENAMEDMA, together with the first
 19420                                  ; directory entry found.
 19421                                  ; [THISCDS], [THISDPB], and [THISDRV] are set and will remain correct
 19422                                  ; throughout the RENAME since it is known at this point that the source and
 19423                                  ; destination are both on the same device.
 19424                                  ; [SATTRIB] is also set.
 19425                                  
 19426 00002DFB 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 19427                                  	;add	si,26
 19428 00002DFD 83C61A                  	ADD	SI,dir_entry.dir_first
 19429 00002E00 E8C5FE                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 19430 00002E03 7305                    	JNC	short REN_OK1
 19431 00002E05 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation  ; 20h
 19432 00002E08 EBC4                    	JMP	short RENAME_POP
 19433                                  
 19434                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19435                                  ; Check if the source is a file or directory. If file, delete the entry
 19436                                  ; from the Fastopen cache. If directory, rename it later
 19437                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19438                                  
 19439                                  REN_OK1:				;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
 19440                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19441                                  	; 31/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19442                                  	;PUSH	SI
 19443 00002E0A C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		;BN00X; PTM. check if source a dir ;AN000;
 19444                                  	;add	si,21
 19445 00002E0E 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	;;BN00XPTM.P5520		;AN000;
 19446                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 19447 00002E11 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;;BN00XPTM. ;AN000;
 19448                                  	;JZ	short NOT_DIR1		;;BN00XPTM.			;AN000;
 19449 00002E15 7503                    	jnz	short SWAP_SOURCE ; 31/01/2024
 19450                                  	;POP	SI			;BN00X
 19451                                  	;JMP	SHORT SWAP_SOURCE	;BN00X
 19452                                  ;NOT_DIR1:				;;BN00X it is a file, delete the entry
 19453                                  	;POP	SI
 19454                                  
 19455                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19456 00002E17 E82CFF                  	call	FastOpen_Delete 	; delete dir info in fastopen DOS 3.3
 19457                                  SWAP_SOURCE:
 19458                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 19459                                  	;MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]
 19460                                  	;MOV	[WFP_START],SI
 19461                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19462 00002E1A A1[B205]                	MOV	AX,[WFP_START]		; Swap source and destination
 19463 00002E1D 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		; Swap source and destination
 19464 00002E21 8936[B205]              	MOV	[WFP_START],SI		; WFP_START = Destination path
 19465 00002E25 A3[B405]                	MOV	[REN_WFP],AX		; REN_WFP   = Source path
 19466                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 19467 00002E28 C706[B605]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1	; No current dir on dest
 19468                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 19469 00002E2E C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0FFh  ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 19470                                  					; A rename is like a CREATE_NEW as far
 19471                                  					; as the destination is concerned.
 19472 00002E34 E8F81C                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 19473                                  
 19474                                  ;   If this GETPATH fails due to file not found, we know all renames will work
 19475                                  ;   since no files match the destination name. If it fails for any other
 19476                                  ;   reason, the rename fails on a path not found, or whatever (also fails if
 19477                                  ;   we find a device or directory). If the GETPATH succeeds, we aren't sure
 19478                                  ;   if the rename should fail because we haven't built an explicit name by
 19479                                  ;   substituting for the meta chars in it. In this case the destination file
 19480                                  ;   spec with metas is in [NAME1] and the explicit source name is at RENAMEDMA
 19481                                  ;   in the directory entry part.
 19482                                  	
 19483 00002E37 722A                    	JC	short NODEST
 19484                                  	
 19485                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19486                                  	;JZ	short BAD_ACC 		; Dest string is a directory	;AC000;
 19487                                  	; !! MSDOS 3.3 !!
 19488                                  	;JZ	short BAD_ACC ; !!	; Dest string is a directory
 19489                                  
 19490 00002E39 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; Device?
 19491 00002E3B 7933                    	JNS	short SAVEDEST		; No, continue
 19492                                  BAD_ACC:
 19493 00002E3D B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 19494 00002E40 F9                      	STC
 19495                                  RENAME_CLEAN:
 19496 00002E41 9C                      	PUSHF				; Save carry state

 19893                                  ; FINFO.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 19894                                  ;============================================================================
 19895                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19896                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19897                                  
 19898                                  ;**	Low level routines for returning file information and setting file
 19899                                  ;	attributes
 19900                                  ;
 19901                                  ;	GET_FILE_INFO
 19902                                  ;	SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 19903                                  ;
 19904                                  ;	Modification history:
 19905                                  ;
 19906                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19907                                  ;
 19908                                  ;	M025: Return access_denied if attempting to set
 19909                                  ;	      attribute of root directory.
 19910                                  ;
 19911                                  
 19912                                  ;SUBTTL GET_FILE_INFO -- Get File Information
 19913                                  
 19914                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19915                                  ; Procedure Name : GET_FILE_INFO
 19916                                  ;
 19917                                  ; Inputs:
 19918                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 19919                                  ;		terminated)
 19920                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 19921                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19922                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19923                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19924                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19925                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19926                                  ; Function:
 19927                                  ;	Get Information about a file
 19928                                  ; Returns:
 19929                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19930                                  ;	    AX = Attribute of file
 19931                                  ;	    CX = Time stamp of file
 19932                                  ;	    DX = Date stamp of file
 19933                                  ;	    BX:DI = Size of file (32 bit)
 19934                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19935                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19936                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19937                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 19938                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19939                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19940                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19941                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19942                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19943                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19944                                  
 19945                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19946                                  
 19947                                  GET_FILE_INFO:
 19948                                  
 19949                                  ;hkn; get_file_info is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set 
 19950                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 19951                                  
 19952 00002FCA E85AE8                  	call	TestNet
 19953 00002FCD 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_INFO
 19954                                  
 19955                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19956                                  ;	transfer NET_GET_FILE_INFO
 19957                                  ;ELSE
 19958                                  ;	MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 15
 19959                                  ;	INT	2FH
 19960                                  ;	return
 19961

 20048                                  ;Break	<SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE -- Set File Attribute>
 20049                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20050                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 20051                                  ; Inputs:
 20052                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20053                                  ;		terminated)
 20054                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20055                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else

 20072                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir

 20079                                  ;			(this request requires exclusive write/read access)

 20081                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed

 20224                                  ; DUP.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991

 20226                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 20228                                  
 20229                                  ;** 	Low level DUP routine for use by EXEC when creating a new process.
 20230                                  ;   	Exports the DUP to the server machine and increments the SFT ref count
 20231                                  ;
 20232                                  ;	DOS_DUP
 20233                                  ;
 20234                                  ;	Modification history:
 20235                                  ;
 20236                                  ;	  Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20237                                  
 20238                                  ;BREAK <DOS_DUP -- DUP SFT across network>
 20239                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20240                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DUP
 20241                                  ;
 20242                                  ; Inputs:
 20243                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being DUPed
 20244                                  ;		(a non net SFT is OK, in this case the ref
 20245                                  ;		 count is simply incremented)
 20246                                  ; Function:
 20247                                  ;	Signal to the devices that a logical open is occurring
 20248                                  ; Returns:
 20249                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 20250                                  ;    Carry clear
 20251                                  ;	SFT ref_count is incremented
 20252                                  ; Registers modified: None.
 20253                                  ; NOTE:
 20254                                  ;	This routine is called from $CREATE_PROCESS_DATA_BLOCK at DOSINIT
 20255                                  ;	time with SS NOT DOSGROUP. There will be no Network handles at
 20256                                  ;	that time.
 20257                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20258                                  
 20259                                  DOS_DUP:
 20260                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20261                                  
 20262                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20263 000030BB 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 20264 000030C0 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]
 20265                                  
 20266                                  	;Entry	Dos_Dup_Direct
 20267                                  DOS_Dup_Direct:
 20268 000030C5 E878E7                  	call	IsSFTNet
 20269 000030C8 7503                    	JNZ	short DO_INC
 20270 000030CA E86F21                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 20271                                  DO_INC:
 20272                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 20273 000030CD 26FF05                  	inc	word [ES:DI]		; Clears carry (if this ever wraps
 20274                                  					;   we're in big trouble anyway)
 20275 000030D0 C3                      	retn

 20283                                  ;TITLE	DOS_CREATE/DOS_CREATE_NEW - Internal CREATE calls for MS-DOS
 20284                                  ;NAME	DOS_CREATE
 20285                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20286                                  ;**	Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20287                                  ;
 20288                                  ;	DOS_CREATE
 20289                                  ;	DOS_CREATE_NEW
 20290                                  ;	SET_MKND_ERR
 20291                                  ;	SET_Media_ID
 20292                                  ;	SET_EXT_Mode
 20293                                  ;
 20294                                  ;	Revision history:
 20295                                  ;
 20296                                  ;	    A000 version 4.00	  Jan. 1988
 20297                                  ;	    A001  D490 -- Change IOCTL subfunctios from 63h,43h to 66h, 46h
 20298                                  
 20299                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20300                                  
 20301                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20302                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20303                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD
 20304                                  ;	I_Need	ExtErr_locus,BYTE
 20305                                  ;	I_need	JShare,DWORD
 20306                                  ;	I_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 20307                                  ;	I_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 20308                                  ;	I_need	CALLVIDM,DWORD
 20309                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000; extended open
 20310                                  ;	I_need	NAME1,BYTE			  ;AN000;
 20311                                  ;	I_need	NO_NAME_ID,BYTE 		  ;AN000;
 20312                                  ;	I_need	Packet_Temp,WORD		  ;AN000;
 20313                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD 		  ;AN000;
 20314                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;AN000;
 20315                                  
 20316                                  ;***	DOS_CREATE - Create a File
 20317                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20318                                  ;	DOS_Create is called to create the specified file, truncating
 20319                                  ;	the old one if it exists.
 20320                                  ;
 20321                                  ;	ENTRY	AX is Attribute to create
 20322                                  ;		(ds) = DOSDATA
 20323                                  ;		[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20324                                  ;			terminated)
 20325                                  ;		[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20326                                  ;			( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20327                                  ;			 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20328                                  ;		[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20329                                  ;			(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20330                                  ;		[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20331                                  ;			(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20332                                  ;		[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20333                                  ;
 20334                                  ;	EXIT	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20335                                  ;		CARRY CLEAR
 20336                                  ;		    THISSFT filled in.
 20337                                  ;			sf_mode = unchanged for FCB, sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20338                                  ;		CARRY SET
 20339                                  ;		    AX is error code
 20340                                  ;			error_path_not_found
 20341                                  ;				Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20342                                  ;			error_bad_curr_dir
 20343                                  ;				Bad path in current directory part of path
 20344                                  ;			error_access_denied
 20345                                  ;				Attempt to re-create read only file , or
 20346                                  ;				create a second volume id or create a dir
 20347                                  ;			error_sharing_violation
 20348                                  ;				The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20349                                  ;				generates an INT 24
 20350                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 20351                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20352                                  
 20353                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20354                                  	; DOSCODE:6920h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20355                                  
 20356                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20357                                  	; DOSCODE:708Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 20358                                  
 20359                                  DOS_CREATE:
 20360                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20361                                  	; DOSCODE:6934h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20362                                  
 20363                                  ;hkn; dispatched to from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS set up to DOSDATA at 
 20364                                  ;hkn; this point.
 20365                                  
 20366 000030D1 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH		; Truncate is OK
 20367                                  
 20368                                  ;	Enter here from Dos_Create_New
 20369                                  ;
 20370                                  ;	(ah) = 0 iff truncate OK
 20371                                  
 20372                                  Create_inter:
 20373 000030D3 A8C0                    	TEST	AL,~(attr_all+attr_ignore+attr_volume_id) ; 80h
 20374                                  				; Mask out any meaningless bits
 20375 000030D5 7511                    	JNZ	short AttErr
 20376 000030D7 A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id
 20377 000030D9 7407                    	JZ	short NoReset
 20378                                  	
 20379                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20380                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20381 000030DB 800E[1106]80            	OR	byte [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h ;AN000;FOR dbcs volid
 20382                                  	; 07/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 20383                                  	;or	word [DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID ; 80h 
 20384                                  	
 20385 000030E0 B008                    	MOV	AL,attr_volume_id ; 8
 20386                                  NoReset:
 20387 000030E2 0C20                    	OR	AL,attr_archive ; File changed  ; 20h
 20388 000030E4 A850                    	TEST	AL,attr_directory+attr_device ; 50h
 20389 000030E6 7408                    	JZ	short ATT_OK
 20390                                  AttErr:
 20391 000030E8 B80500                  	MOV	AX,5		; Attribute problem
 20392                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1
 20393                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20394 000030EB E8EDE1                  	call	set_exerr_locus_unk
 20395 000030EE EB62                    	JMP	SHORT SET_MKND_ERR ; Gotta use MKDIR to make dirs, NEVER allow
 20396                                  				   ;	attr_device to be set.
 20397                                  ATT_OK:
 20398 000030F0 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20399 000030F4 06                      	PUSH	ES
 20400 000030F5 C436[A205]              	LES	SI,[THISCDS]
 20401 000030F9 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1
 20402 000030FC 751B                    	JNE	short TEST_RE_NET
 20403                                  
 20404                                  ;	No CDS, it must be redirected.
 20405                                  
 20406 000030FE 07                      	POP	ES
 20407                                  
 20408                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20409                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20410                                  	;test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],1
 20411 000030FF F606[F605]01            	TEST	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20412 00003104 740D                    	JZ	short NOEXTOP 		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20413                                  IFS_extopen:				    ;AN000;EO.
 20414 00003106 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO. pass create attr
 20415                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 46    ;AN000;EO. issue extended open verb
 20416 00003107 B82E11                  	mov	ax,112Eh
 20417                                  NOEXTOP2:	; 01/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20418 0000310A CD2F                    	INT	2FH			    ;AN000;EO.
 20419 0000310C 5B                      	POP	BX			    ;AN000;EO. trash bx
 20420 0000310D C606[F605]00            	MOV	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],0	    ;AN000;EO.
 20421 00003112 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;EO.
 20422                                  NOEXTOP:				    ;AN000;
 20423                                  ;Extended open hooks
 20424                                  
 20425                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20426                                  ;	transfer NET_SEQ_CREATE
 20427                                  ;ELSE
 20428 00003113 50                      	PUSH	AX
 20429                                  
 20430                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 24
 20431                                  	;INT	2FH
 20432                                  
 20433 00003114 B81811                  	mov     ax,1118h
 20434                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20435                                  	;int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CREATE/TRUNCATE FILE
 20436                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS
 20437                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file

 20541

 20547                                  CRTERRTAB:	;LABEL BYTE	; Lookup table for MakeNode returns
 20548 00003159 00                      	DB	0			; none
 20549 0000315A 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 1
 20550 0000315B 52                      	DB	error_cannot_make	; MakeNode error 2
 20551 0000315C 50                      	DB	error_file_exists	; MakeNode error 3
 20552 0000315D 03                      	DB	error_path_not_found	; MakeNode error 4
 20553 0000315E 05                      	DB	error_access_denied	; MakeNode error 5
 20554 0000315F 20                      	DB	error_sharing_violation ; MakeNode error 6
 20555                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20556 00003160 02                      	DB	error_file_not_found	; MakeNode error 7

 20559                                  
 20560                                  ; We have just created a new file. This results in the truncation of old
 20561                                  ; files. We must inform the sharer to slash all the open SFT's for this
 20562                                  ; file to the current size.

 20565                                  ; drive number to force a Build BPB after Media Check.

 20602                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20603                                  ; Procedure Name : Dos_Create_New
 20604                                  ;
 20605                                  ; Inputs:
 20606                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20607                                  ;		terminated)
 20608                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20609                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20610                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20611                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20612                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20613                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20614                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20615                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20616                                  ;	AX is Attribute to create
 20617                                  ; Function:
 20618                                  ;	Try to create the specified file truncating an old one that exists
 20619                                  ; Outputs:
 20620                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20621                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20622                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20623                                  ;		sf_mode = sharing_compat + open_for_both for Non-FCB SFT
 20624                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20625                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20626                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20627                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20628                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20629                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20630                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20631                                  ;			Create a second volume id or create a dir
 20632                                  ;		error_file_exists
 20633                                  ;			Already a file by this name
 20634                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20635                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20636                                  
 20637                                  DOS_Create_New:
 20638 00003198 B401                    	MOV	AH,1		; Truncate is NOT OK
 20639 0000319A E936FF                  	JMP	Create_inter

 20698 000031BC F9                      	stc

 20761                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_EXT_mode
 20762                                  ;
 20763                                  ; Inputs:
 20764                                  ;	[EXTOPEN_ON]= flag for extended open
 20765                                  ;	SAVE_BX= mode specified in Extended Open
 20766                                  ; Function:
 20767                                  ;	Set mode in ThisSFT
 20768                                  ; Outputs:
 20769                                  ;	carry set,mode is set if from Extended Open
 20770                                  ;	carry clear, mode not set yet

 20775                                  Set_EXT_mode:
 20776

 20778 000031EE 36F606[F605]01          	TEST	byte [ss:EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20779 000031F4 740B                    	JZ	short NOTEX		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20780 000031F6 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 20781

 20783 000031F7 36A1[0106]              	MOV	AX,[ss:SAVE_BX]		    ;AN000;EO.
 20784                                  	;or	[es:di+2],ax
 20785 000031FB 26094502                	OR	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AX ;AN000;EO.
 20786 000031FF 58                      	POP	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 20787 00003200 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;EO.

 20793                                  ;============================================================================
 20794                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20795                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20796                                  
 20797                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_OPEN - Internal OPEN call for MS-DOS
 20798                                  ;	NAME	DOS_OPEN
 20799                                  
 20800                                  ;**	OPEN.ASM - File Open
 20801                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20802                                  ;	Low level routines for openning a file from a file spec.
 20803                                  ;	Also misc routines for sharing errors
 20804                                  ;
 20805                                  ;	DOS_Open
 20806                                  ;	Check_Access_AX
 20807                                  ;	SHARE_ERROR
 20808                                  ;	SET_SFT_MODE
 20809                                  ;	Code_Page_Mismatched_Error		   ; DOS 4.00
 20810                                  ;
 20811                                  ;	Revision history:
 20812                                  ;
 20813                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20814                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00   Jan. 1988
 20815                                  ;
 20816                                  ;	M034 - The value in save_bx must be pushed on to the stack for
 20817                                  ; 	       remote extended opens and not save_cx.
 20818                                  ;
 20819                                  ;	M035 - if open made from exec then we must set the appropriate bits
 20820                                  ;	       on the stack before calling off to the redir.
 20821                                  ;	M042 - Bit 11 of DOS34_FLAG set indicates that the redir knows how 
 20822                                  ;	       to handle open from exec. In this case set the appropriate bit
 20823                                  ;	       else do not.
 20824                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 20825                                  
 20826                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20827                                  
 20828                                  ;	i_need	NoSetDir,BYTE
 20829                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20830                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20831                                  ;	i_need	CURBUF,DWORD
 20832                                  ;	i_need	CurrentPDB,WORD
 20833                                  ;	i_need	CURR_DIR_END,WORD
 20834                                  ;	I_need	RetryCount,WORD
 20835                                  ;	I_need	Open_Access,BYTE
 20836                                  ;	I_need	fSharing,BYTE
 20837                                  ;	i_need	JShare,DWORD
 20838                                  ;	I_need	FastOpenFlg,byte
 20839                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20840                                  ;	I_need	ALLOWED,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20841                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20842                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_LOCUS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20843                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_ACTION,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20844                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR_CLASS,BYTE		  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20845                                  ;	I_need	CPSWFLAG,BYTE			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20846                                  ;	I_need	EXITHOLD,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20847                                  ;	I_need	THISDPB,DWORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20848                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_CX,WORD			  ;AN000;; DOS 4.00
 20849                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;M034
 20850                                  ;
 20851                                  ;	I_need	DOS_FLAG,BYTE
 20852                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD			  ;M042
 20853                                  
 20854                                  ;Break	<DOS_Open - internal file access>
 20855                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20856                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_Open
 20857                                  ;
 20858                                  ; Inputs:
 20859                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20860                                  ;		terminated)
 20861                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20862                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20863                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20864                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20865                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20866                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file found
 20867                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20868                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20869                                  ;	AX is Access and Sharing mode
 20870                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 20871                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 20872                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 20873                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 20874                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 20875                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 20876                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 20877                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 20878                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 20879                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 20880                                  ;
 20881                                  ;	  For FCB SFTs AL should = sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20882                                  ;		(not checked)
 20883                                  ; Function:
 20884                                  ;	Try to open the specified file
 20885                                  ; Outputs:
 20886                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20887                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20888                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20889                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20890                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20891                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 20892                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 20893                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20894                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20895                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20896                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20897                                  ;		error_invalid_access
 20898                                  ;			Bad sharing mode or bad access mode or bad combination
 20899                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20900                                  ;			Attempt to open read only file for writting, or
 20901                                  ;			open a directory
 20902                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 20903                                  ;			The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20904                                  ;			generates an INT 24 on compatibility mode SFTs
 20905                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20906                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20907                                  
 20908                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 20966                                  					; Y: check to see if redir is aware

 20973                                  					;    this

 20995                                  			; ES:DI -> uninitialized SFT, SS = DOS CS

 21067                                  Open_found:
 21068 0000328B 74F9                    	JZ	short Open_Bad_Access 	; test for directories
 21069 0000328D 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 21070 0000328F 783E                    	JS	short open_ok		; Devices don't have attributes
 21071 00003291 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]		; get buffer location
 21072                                  	;mov	al,[es:bx+0Bh]
 21073 00003295 268A470B                	MOV	AL,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 21074 00003299 A808                    	TEST	AL,attr_volume_id	; can't open volume ids
 21075 0000329B 75E9                    	JNZ	short Open_Bad_Access
 21076 0000329D A801                    	TEST	AL,attr_read_only	; check write on read only
 21077 0000329F 742E                    	JZ	short open_ok
 21078                                  
 21079                                  ; The file is marked READ-ONLY. We verify that the open mode allows access to
 21080                                  ; the read-only file. Unfortunately, with FCB's and net-FCB's we cannot
 21081                                  ; determine at the OPEN time if such access is allowed. Thus, we defer such
 21082                                  ; processing until the actual write operation:
 21083                                  ;
 21084                                  ; If FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 21085                                  ; If net_FCB, then we change the mode to be read_only.
 21086                                  ; If not open for read then error.
 21087                                  
 21088 000032A1 1E                      	push	ds
 21089 000032A2 56                      	push	si
 21090 000032A3 C536[9E05]              	LDS	SI,[THISSFT]
 21091                                  	;mov	cx,[si+2]
 21092 000032A7 8B4C02                  	MOV	CX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 21093                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21094                                  	;test	ch,80h
 21095 000032AA F6C580                  	test	ch,sf_isFCB>>8
 21096                                  	;TEST	CX,sf_isFCB ; 8000h	; is it FCB?
 21097 000032AD 750A                    	JNZ	short ResetAccess	; yes, reset the access
 21098 000032AF 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL
 21099 000032B1 80E2F0                  	AND	DL,SHARING_MASK	; 0F0h
 21100 000032B4 80FA70                  	CMP	DL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h ; is it net FCB?
 21101 000032B7 7508                    	JNZ	short NormalOpen	; no
 21102                                  ResetAccess:
 21103                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)	
 21104                                  	;AND	CX,~access_mask	; 0FFF0h ; clear access
 21105                                  	; 16/12/2022
 21106                                  	;and	cl,0F0h ; 18/05/2019
 21107                                  	;;;
 21108                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21109                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21110                                  	;and	cx,0FFFCh
 21111 000032B9 80E1FC                  	and	cl,0FCh ; ~3 ; ~open_mode_mask ; clear access
 21112                                  	;;;
 21113                                  ;	OR	CX,open_for_read ; 0	; stick in open_for_read
 21114 000032BC 894C02                  	MOV	[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],CX
 21115 000032BF EB0C                    	JMP	SHORT FillSFT
 21116                                  
 21117                                  ; The SFT is normal. See if the requested access is open_for_read
 21118                                  
 21119                                  NormalOpen:
 21120                                  	;AND	CL,access_mask	; 0Fh	; remove extras
 21121                                  	;;;
 21122                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21123                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 21124 000032C1 80E103                  	and     cl,3		; it was 'and cl,0Fh' in MSDOS 6.22
 21125                                  				; (and cl,access_mask)
 21126                                  				; this may be open_mode_mask
 21127                                  	;;;
 21128 000032C4 80F900                  	CMP	CL,open_for_read ; 0	; is it open for read?
 21129 000032C7 7404                    	JZ	short FillSFT	; yes
 21130 000032C9 5E                      	pop	si
 21131 000032CA 1F                      	pop	ds
 21132 000032CB EBB9                    	JMP	short Open_Bad_Access
 21133                                  ;
 21134                                  ; All done, restore registers and fill the SFT.
 21135                                  ;
 21136                                  FillSFT:
 21137 000032CD 5E                      	pop	si
 21138 000032CE 1F                      	pop	ds
 21139                                  open_ok:

 21141

 21155                                  	;;JMP	short Clear_FastOpen
 21156                                  	;retn	; 18/05/2019
 21157                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 21158                                  	;jmp	short Clear_FastOpen	
 21159                                  
 21160                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 21161                                  ;DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 21162                                  ;	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 21163                                  ;OpenShareRetry:

 21187                                  ;if installed

 21189 000032E7 FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]  ; 14 = ShSU
 21190                                  ;else

 21198                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_SFT_MODE
 21199                                  ;
 21200                                  ; Finish SFT initialization for new reference. Set the correct mode.
 21201                                  ;

 21219                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB ; Clears carry
 21220 000032FA 7407                    	JZ	short Clear_FastOpen	; sf_mode correct (retz)

 21227                                  
 21228                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21229                                  ; Procedure Name : SHARE_ERROR
 21230                                  ;
 21231                                  ; Called on sharing violations. ES:DI points to SFT. AX has error code
 21232                                  ; If SFT is FCB or compatibility mode gens INT 24 error.
 21233                                  ; Returns carry set AX=error_sharing_violation if user says ignore (can't
 21234                                  ; really ignore). Carry clear if user wants a retry. ES, DI, DS preserved
 21235                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21236                                  
 21237                                  SHARE_ERROR:
 21238                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21239                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 21240 00003304 26F6450380              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],sf_isFCB>>8 ; 80h
 21241                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB ; 8000h
 21242 00003309 7509                    	JNZ	short _HARD_ERR
 21243 0000330B 268A4D02                	MOV	CL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 21244 0000330F 80E1F0                  	AND	CL,SHARING_MASK  ; 0F0h
 21245                                  	;CMP	CL,SHARING_COMPAT ; 0
 21246                                  	;JNE	short _NO_HARD_ERR
 21247                                  	; 21/09/2023
 21248 00003312 7505                    	jnz	short _NO_HARD_ERR
 21249                                  _HARD_ERR:
 21250 00003314 E8334E                  	call	SHARE_VIOLATION
 21251                                  	;retnc				; User wants retry
 21252 00003317 73EA                    	jnc	short Clear_FastOpen
 21253                                  _NO_HARD_ERR:
 21254 00003319 B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation  ; 20h
 21255 0000331C F9                      	STC
 21256 0000331D C3                      	retn

 21258                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 21259                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21260                                  ; Procedure Name : DO_SHARE_CHECK
 21261                                  ;
 21262                                  ; Input: THISDPB, WFP_Start, THISSFT set
 21263                                  ; Functions: check file sharing mode is valid
 21264                                  ; Output: carry set, error
 21265                                  ;	  carry clear, share ok
 21266                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21267                                  
 21268                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21269                                  DO_SHARE_CHECK:
 21270 0000331E E8C8E5                  	call	ECritDisk		; enter critical section
 21271                                  OPN_RETRY:
 21272 00003321 8B0E[1A00]              	MOV	CX,[RetryCount]		; Get # tries to do
 21273                                  OpenShareRetry:
 21274 00003325 51                      	push	cx			; Save number left to do
 21275 00003326 E81C4E                  	call	SHARE_CHECK		; Final Check
 21276 00003329 59                      	pop	cx			; CX = # left
 21277 0000332A 730E                    	JNC	short Share_Ok2		; No problem with access
 21278 0000332C E8B3E4                  	call	Idle
 21279 0000332F E2F4                    	LOOP	OpenShareRetry		; One more retry used up
 21280                                  OpenShareFail:
 21281 00003331 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 21282 00003335 E8CCFF                  	call	SHARE_ERROR
 21283 00003338 73E7                    	JNC	short OPN_RETRY		; User wants more retry
 21284                                  Share_Ok2:
 21285                                  	;call	LCritDisk		; leave critical section
 21286                                  	;retn
 21287                                  	; 18/12/2022
 21288 0000333A E9D9E5                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21289                                  
 21290                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21291                                  ; Procedure Name : Check_Access
 21292                                  ;
 21293                                  ; Inputs:
 21294                                  ;	AX is mode
 21295                                  ;	  High NIBBLE of AL (Sharing Mode)
 21296                                  ;		sharing_compat	   file is opened in compatibility mode
 21297                                  ;		sharing_deny_none  file is opened Multi reader, Multi writer
 21298                                  ;		sharing_deny_read  file is opened Only reader, Multi writer
 21299                                  ;		sharing_deny_write file is opened Multi reader, Only writer
 21300                                  ;		sharing_deny_both  file is opened Only reader, Only writer
 21301                                  ;	  Low NIBBLE of AL (Access Mode)
 21302                                  ;		open_for_read	file is opened for reading
 21303                                  ;		open_for_write	file is opened for writing
 21304                                  ;		open_for_both	file is opened for both reading and writing.
 21305                                  ; Function:
 21306                                  ;	Check this access mode for correctness
 21307                                  ; Outputs:
 21308                                  ;	[open_access] = AL input
 21309                                  ;	Carry Clear
 21310                                  ;		Mode is correct
 21311                                  ;		AX unchanged
 21312                                  ;	Carry Set
 21313                                  ;		Mode is bad
 21314                                  ;		AX = error_invalid_access
 21315                                  ; No other registers effected
 21316                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21317                                  
 21318                                  	; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21319                                  Check_Access_AX:
 21320 0000333D A2[6E05]                	MOV	[OPEN_ACCESS],AL
 21321 00003340 53                      	PUSH	BX
 21322                                  
 21323                                  ;	If sharing, then test for special sharing mode for FCBs
 21324                                  
 21325 00003341 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 21326 00003343 80E3F0                  	AND	BL,SHARING_MASK ; 0F0h
 21327                                  
 21328                                  	;CMP	byte [FSHARING],-1
 21329                                  	;JNZ	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 21330                                  	; 23/01/2024
 21331                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 21332 00003346 803E[7205]00            	cmp	byte [FSHARING],0
 21333 0000334B 7405                    	jz	short CheckShareMode	; not through server call, must be ok
 21334                                  
 21335 0000334D 80FB70                  	CMP	BL,SHARING_NET_FCB ; 70h
 21336 00003350 7405                    	JZ	short CheckAccessMode	; yes, we have an FCB
 21337                                  CheckShareMode:
 21338 00003352 80FB40                  	CMP	BL,40h			; is this a good sharing mode?
 21339 00003355 770D                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 21340                                  CheckAccessMode:
 21341 00003357 88C3                    	MOV	BL,AL
 21342                                  	; 23/01/2024
 21343 00003359 80E303                  	and	bl,3 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM	
 21344                                  	;AND	BL,access_mask ; 0Fh
 21345 0000335C 80FB02                  	CMP	BL,2
 21346 0000335F 7703                    	JA	short Make_Bad_Access
 21347 00003361 5B                      	POP	BX
 21348 00003362 F8                      	CLC
 21349 00003363 C3                      	retn
 21350                                  
 21351                                  Make_Bad_Access:
 21352 00003364 B80C00                  	MOV	AX,error_invalid_access ; 0Ch
 21353 00003367 5B                      	POP	BX
 21354 00003368 F9                      	STC
 21355 00003369 C3                      	retn

 21357                                  ;============================================================================
 21358                                  ; DINFO.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 21359                                  ;============================================================================
 21360                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21361                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21362                                  ; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21363                                  
 21364                                  ;**	Low level routine for returning disk drive information from a local
 21365                                  ;	  or NET device
 21366                                  ;
 21367                                  ;	DISK_INFO
 21368                                  ;
 21369                                  ;	  Modification history:
 21370                                  ;
 21371                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 21372                                  
 21373                                  ;	Break	<DISK_INFO -- Get Disk Drive Information>
 21374                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21375                                  ; Procedure Name : DISK_INFO
 21376                                  ;
 21377                                  ; Inputs:
 21378                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to the Macro List Structure of interest
 21379                                  ;		(It MAY NOT be NUL, error not detected)
 21380                                  ; Function:
 21381                                  ;	Get Interesting Drive Information
 21382                                  ; Returns:
 21383                                  ;	DX = Number of free allocation units
 21384                                  ;	BX = Total Number of allocation units on disk
 21385                                  ;	CX = Sector size

 21467

 21469 000033A9 16                      	push	ss
 21470 000033AA 1F                      	pop	ds
 21471                                  
 21472                                  ; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21473                                  %if 0
 21474                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 21475                                  	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 21476                                  
 21477                                  ; Examine the current free count. If it indicates that we have an invalid
 21478                                  ; count, do the expensive calculation.
 21479                                  
 21480                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21481                                  	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; get free count
 21482                                  	CMP	DX,-1			; is it valid?
 21483                                  	JZ	short DoScan
 21484                                  
 21485                                  ; Check to see if it is in a reasonable range. If so, trust it and return.
 21486                                  ; Otherwise, we need to blast out an internal error message and then recompute
 21487                                  ; the count.
 21488                                  
 21489                                  	CMP	DX,CX			; is it in a reasonable range?
 21490                                  	JB	short GotVal		; yes, trust it.
 21491                                  DoScan:
 21492                                  	XOR	DX,DX
 21493                                  	DEC	CX
 21494                                  SCANFREE:
 21495                                  	call	UNPACK

 21499                                  NOTFREECLUS:

 21502                                  	DEC	BX			; BX was next cluster. Convert to
 21503                                  ReturnVals:
 21504                                  	DEC	BX			; count
 21505                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]

 21515                                  	;retn

 21517                                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 21518                                  
 21519                                  ; We have correctly computed everything previously. Load up registers for
 21520                                  ; return.
 21521

 21524                                  	JMP	short ReturnVals
 21525

 21532                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],si

 21537 000033BD EB18                    	jmp	short dsk_info_5 ; zf=0, si=di=0
 21538                                  
 21539                                  dsk_info_4:
 21540                                  	;mov	di,[es:bp+2Fh]
 21541 000033BF 268B7E2F                	mov	di,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 21542                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2Dh]

 21544                                  	;mov	si,[es:bp+21h]
 21545 000033C7 268B7621                	mov	si,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT_HW] ; hw of free cluster count
 21546 000033CB 39F2                    	cmp	dx,si			; same (zero) ?
 21547                                  ;dsk_info_5:
 21548 000033CD 7504                    	jnz	short dsk_info_6	; not same (not zero)
 21549 000033CF 42                      	inc	dx
 21550 000033D0 740B                    	jz	short dsk_info_8	; 0FFFFh -> 0 (free count is invalid/initial)
 21551                                  					; free count calculation is needed
 21552 000033D2 4A                      	dec	dx
 21553                                  dsk_info_6:
 21554 000033D3 39FE                    	cmp	si,di			; same hw ?
 21555 000033D5 7502                    	jne	short dsk_info_7	; no
 21556                                  dsk_info_5:	; 02/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 
 21557 000033D7 39CA                    	cmp	dx,cx			; same lw ?
 21558                                  dsk_info_7:
 21559 000033D9 7268                    	jb	short GotVal		; free cluster count < last cluster number
 21560 000033DB 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx	; 0
 21561                                  dsk_info_8:
 21562 000033DD 31F6                    	xor	si,si	; 0
 21563 000033DF 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; last cluster number - 1 = number of clusters
 21564 000033E2 19F7                    	sbb	di,si
 21565                                  	;or	byte [es:bp+18h],1
 21566 000033E4 26804E1801              	or	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],1 ; set first access bit 0
 21567                                  					; (Update flag for FSINFO sector)
 21568                                  SCANFREE:
 21569 000033E9 56                      	push	si
 21570 000033EA FF36[F30A]              	push	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 21571 000033EE 57                      	push	di
 21572 000033EF E8122F                  	call	UNPACK
 21573 000033F2 5F                      	pop	di
 21574 000033F3 8F06[F30A]              	pop	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 21575 000033F7 5E                      	pop	si
 21576 000033F8 7246                    	jc	short CRIT_LEAVE
 21577 000033FA 7504                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS
 21578 000033FC 42                      	inc	dx			; a free one
 21579 000033FD 7501                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS
 21580 000033FF 46                      	inc	si			; increase hw of free cluster count
 21581                                  
 21582                                  NOTFREECLUS:
 21583 00003400 43                      	inc	bx			; next cluster
 21584 00003401 7504                    	jnz	short NOTFREECLUS2
 21585 00003403 FF06[EF0A]              	inc	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]	; increase hw of (next) cluster number
 21586                                  
 21587                                  NOTFREECLUS2:
 21588 00003407 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; decrease remain cluster count for calculation
 21589 0000340A 83DF00                  	sbb	di,0
 21590 0000340D 75DA                    	jnz	short SCANFREE
 21591 0000340F E302                    	jcxz	NOTFREECLUS3		; calculation completed
 21592 00003411 EBD6                    	jmp	short SCANFREE
 21593                                  
 21594                                  NOTFREECLUS3:
 21595 00003413 8B3E[EF0A]              	mov	di,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 21596 00003417 83EB01                  	sub	bx,1
 21597 0000341A 83DF00                  	sbb	di,0			; di:bx = last cluster number
 21598                                  
 21599                                  ReturnVals:
 21600 0000341D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21601 0000341F 83EB01                  	sub	bx,1
 21602 00003422 19CF                    	sbb	di,cx			; di:bx = number of clusters
 21603                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]

 21611                                  	;mov	[es:bp+21h],si

 21613

 21615                                  
 21616                                  ReturnVals2:

 21619 0000343F F8                      	clc
 21620                                  
 21621                                  CRIT_LEAVE:
 21622                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 21623                                  	;retn
