 21625                                  
 21626                                  GotVal:
 21627 00003443 89CB                    	mov	bx,cx
 21628 00003445 EBD6                    	jmp	short ReturnVals
 21629                                  
 21630                                  %endif
 21631                                  
 21632                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 21633                                  
 21634                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21635                                  
 21636                                  modify_spc:
 21637 00003447 50                      	push	ax			; ax = sectors per cluster
 21638 00003448 52                      	push	dx
 21639 00003449 F7E1                    	mul	cx			; bytes per sector
 21640                                  	;cmp	dx,0
 21641 0000344B 21D2                    	and	dx,dx
 21642 0000344D 7503                    	jnz	short mspc_1
 21643 0000344F 3D0040                  	cmp	ax,16384		; 16 kilobytes (per cluster)
 21644                                  					; ***
 21645                                  					; actual disk size limit
 21646                                  					; without invalidating cluster counts is
 21647                                  					; 2 GB (512K clusters * 8 sectors per cluster)
 21648                                  					;      (128K clusters * 32 sectors per cluster)
 21649                                  mspc_1:
 21650 00003452 5A                      	pop	dx
 21651 00003453 58                      	pop	ax
 21652 00003454 760E                    	jbe	short mspc_3		; bytes per cluster <= 16 KB
 21653                                                                          ; ***
 21654                                                                          ; bytes per cluster > 16 KB
 21655 00003456 31FF                    	xor	di,di			; 0
 21656 00003458 BBFEFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFEh		; (invalidated)
 21657 0000345B 09F6                    	or	si,si			; hw of free cluster count
 21658 0000345D 7404                    	jz	short mspc_2		; si = 0
 21659 0000345F 89FE                    	mov	si,di			; si = 0
 21660 00003461 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx			; dx = bx = 0FFFEh (invalidated)
 21661                                  mspc_2:
 21662 00003463 C3                      	retn
 21663                                  
 21664                                  mspc_3:
 21665 00003464 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1			; sectors per clust = sectors per clust * 2
 21666                                  					; (ax <= 32768) -modified spc limit-
 21667 00003466 D1EF                    	shr	di,1			; cluster count = cluster count /2
 21668                                  					; di:bx = modified value of total clusters
 21669                                  mspc_4:

 21671 0000346A D1EE                    	shr	si,1			; free clusters = free clusters / 2
 21672 0000346C D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1			; si:dx = modified value of free clusters

 21677                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7431h
 21678                                  
 21679                                  modify_cluster_count:
 21680 0000346E 09FF                    	or	di,di			; hw of cluster count
 21681 00003470 75D5                    	jnz	short modify_spc
 21682 00003472 C3                      	retn
 21683                                  
 21684                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 21685                                  
 21686                                  ; write FSINFO sector onto disk
 21687                                  
 21688                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21689                                  ; --------------------------------
 21690                                  ; FAT32 FSInfo Sector Structure
 21691                                  ; --------------------------------
 21692                                  ; ref: Microsoft FAT32 File System Specification (2000)
 21693                                  
 21694                                  struc FSINFO		; Offset ;
 21695 00000000 ????????                .LeadSig:	resb 4	  ; 0		; Value 0x41615252. Lead Signature.
 21696 00000004 <res 1E0h>              .Reserved1:	resb 480  ; 4		; Reserved. Must be 0. Never be used.
 21697 000001E4 ????????                .StrucSig:	resb 4	  ; 484		; Value 0x61417272. Fields Signature.
 21698 000001E8 ????????                .Free_Count:	resb 4	  ; 488		; Last known free cluster count. (*) 
 21699 000001EC ????????                .Nxt_Free:	resb 4	  ; 492		; Start clus for free clus srch. (**)
 21700 000001F0 <res Ch>                .Reserved2:	resb 12	  ; 496		; Reserved. Must be 0. Never be used.
 21701 000001FC ????????                .TrailSig:	resb 4	  ; 508		; Value 0xAA550000. Trail Signature.
 21702                                  .size:
 21703                                  endstruc
 21704                                  
 21705                                  ; (*) If the value is 0xFFFFFFFF, then the free count is unknown
 21706                                  ;     and must be computed.
 21707                                  ; (**) If the value is 0xFFFFFFFF, then free cluster search must be started
 21708                                  ;     from cluster 2.
 21709                                  ; Lead Signature, Fields (Structure) Signature and Trail Signature
 21710                                  ; are used to validate FSInfo sector.
 21711                                  
 21712                                  ; --------------------------------
 21713                                  
 21714                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 21715                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7436h
 21716                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7227h)
 21717                                  
 21718                                  update_fat32_fsinfo:
 21719 00003473 51                      	push	cx
 21720 00003474 52                      	push	dx
 21721 00003475 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21722                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+25h]
 21723 00003477 268B5625                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FSINFO_SECTOR]
 21724                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],cx
 21725 0000347B 26394E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],cx ; 0
 21726                                  				; (16bit FAT size field = 0 for FAT32 fs)
 21727 0000347F 7505                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_1
 21728 00003481 83FAFF                  	cmp	dx,0FFFFh ; -1
 21729 00003484 7508                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_2
 21730                                  
 21731                                  u_fat32_inf_1:
 21732 00003486 5A                      	pop	dx
 21733 00003487 59                      	pop	cx
 21734                                  	;and	byte [es:bp+18h],0F4h
 21735 00003488 26806618F4              	and	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],0F4h ; clear bit 0,1 and 3
 21736                                  					; bit 0 - FSINFO update (dirty) bit
 21737                                  					; bit 1 - BPB_RootClus update bit
 21738                                  					; bit 3 - BPB_ExtFlags update bit
 21739 0000348D C3                      	retn
 21740                                  
 21741                                  u_fat32_inf_2:
 21742 0000348E 50                      	push	ax
 21743 0000348F 53                      	push	bx
 21744 00003490 57                      	push	di
 21745 00003491 56                      	push	si
 21746 00003492 1E                      	push	ds
 21747 00003493 36803E[7900]00          	cmp	byte [ss:BuffInHMA],0	; is buffers in HMA?
 21748 00003499 740A                    	jz	short u_fat32_inf_3	; no
 21749 0000349B 36C53E[7A00]            	lds	di,[ss:LoMemBuff]	; read it into scratch buffer
 21750                                  	;sub	di,24
 21751 000034A0 83EF18                  	sub	di,BUFINSIZ		; space for buffer header
 21752                                  					; (buffer header size = 24)
 21753                                  	;clc
 21754 000034A3 EB0E                    	jmp	short u_fat32_inf_4
 21755                                  
 21756                                  u_fat32_inf_3:
 21757 000034A5 06                      	push	es
 21758 000034A6 55                      	push	bp
 21759 000034A7 E82132                  	call	GETCURHEAD		; ds:di = first buffer in queue
 21760 000034AA 52                      	push	dx
 21761 000034AB E8FB33                  	call	BUFWRITE		; BufWrite writes a buffer to the disk,
 21762                                  					;  if it's dirty.
 21763 000034AE 5A                      	pop	dx
 21764 000034AF 5D                      	pop	bp
 21765 000034B0 07                      	pop	es
 21766                                  ;u_fat32_inf_4:
 21767 000034B1 726A                    	jc	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21768                                  u_fat32_inf_4:
 21769 000034B3 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21770                                  	;lea	bx,[di+24]
 21771 000034B5 8D5D18                  	lea	bx,[di+BUFINSIZ]	; buffer data address
 21772                                  	;mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],18h
 21773 000034B8 36C606[4B03]18          	mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 21774 000034BE 36890E[0706]            	mov	[ss:HIGH_SECTOR],cx ; 0
 21775 000034C3 41                      	inc	cx			; cx = sector count = 1
 21776                                  					; es:bp = DPB
 21777 000034C4 53                      	push	bx			; ds:bx = buffer (data) address
 21778 000034C5 52                      	push	dx			; HIGH_SECTOR:dx = disk sector address
 21779 000034C6 E8300B                  	call	DREAD		 	; read fs info sector
 21780 000034C9 5A                      	pop	dx
 21781 000034CA 5B                      	pop	bx
 21782 000034CB 7250                    	jc	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21783                                  
 21784                                  	;cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.LeadSig],5252h	
 21785 000034CD 813F5252                	cmp	word [bx],5252h		; 'RR'
 21786 000034D1 754A                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21787                                  	;cmp	word [bx+2],4161h	; 'aA' ; (NASM syntax)
 21788 000034D3 817F026141              	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.LeadSig+2],4161h
 21789 000034D8 7543                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21790                                  	
 21791                                  	;cmp	word [bx+1E4h],7272h	; 'rr' at offset 484
 21792 000034DA 81BFE4017272            	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.StrucSig],7272h
 21793 000034E0 753B                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21794                                  
 21795                                  	;cmp	word [bx+1E6h],6141h	; 'Aa' at offset 486
 21796 000034E2 81BFE6014161            	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.StrucSig+2],6141h
 21797 000034E8 7533                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21798                                  
 21799                                  	;cmp	word [bx+1FEh],0AA55h	; boot signature at offset 510
 21800 000034EA 81BFFE0155AA            	cmp	word [bx+FSINFO.TrailSig+2],0AA55h
 21801 000034F0 752B                    	jne	short u_fat32_inf_5
 21802                                  	
 21803                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+1Fh]
 21804 000034F2 268B461F                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT]
 21805                                  	;mov	[bx+1E8h],ax 
 21806 000034F6 8987E801                	mov	[bx+FSINFO.Free_Count],ax ; at offset 488
 21807                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+21h]
 21808 000034FA 268B4621                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2]
 21809                                  	;mov	[bx+1EAh],ax
 21810 000034FE 8987EA01                	mov	[bx+FSINFO.Free_Count+2],ax
 21811                                  
 21812                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+39h]
 21813 00003502 268B4639                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE]
 21814                                  	;mov	[bx+1ECh],ax
 21815 00003506 8987EC01                	mov	[bx+FSINFO.Nxt_Free],ax	; at offset 492
 21816                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+3Bh]
 21817 0000350A 268B463B                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE+2]
 21818                                  	;mov	[bx+1EEh],ax
 21819 0000350E 8987EE01                	mov	[bx+FSINFO.Nxt_Free+2],ax
 21820                                  
 21821 00003512 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 21822 00003514 36890E[0706]            	mov	[ss:HIGH_SECTOR],cx ; 0
 21823 00003519 41                      	inc	cx	; 1
 21824 0000351A E8410B                  	call	DWRITE
 21825                                  
 21826                                  u_fat32_inf_5:
 21827 0000351D 1F                      	pop	ds
 21828 0000351E 5E                      	pop	si
 21829 0000351F 5F                      	pop	di
 21830 00003520 5B                      	pop	bx

 21834                                  ;============================================================================
 21835                                  ; ISEARCH.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 21836                                  ;============================================================================
 21837                                  ; 22/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21838                                  
 21839                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_SEARCH - Internal SEARCH calls for MS-DOS
 21840                                  ;	NAME	DOS_SEARCH
 21841                                  
 21842                                  ;**	Low level routines for doing local and NET directory searches
 21843                                  ;
 21844                                  ;	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21845                                  ;	DOS_SEARCH_NEXT
 21846                                  ;	RENAME_NEXT
 21847                                  ;
 21848                                  ;	Revision history:
 21849                                  ;
 21850                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 21851                                  ;	    A000	version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 21852                                  ;	    A001	PTM 3564 -- search for fastopen
 21853                                  
 21854                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 21855                                  
 21856                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21857                                  ;
 21858                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21859                                  ;
 21860                                  ; Inputs:
 21861                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 21862                                  ;		terminated)
 21863                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 21864                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 21865                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 21866                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 21867                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 21868                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 21869                                  ;	[DMAADD] Points to 53 byte buffer
 21870                                  ; Function:
 21871                                  ;	Initiate a search for the given file spec
 21872                                  ; Outputs:
 21873                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 21874                                  ;	    The 53 bytes ot DMAADD are filled in as follows:
 21875                                  ;
 21876                                  ;	LOCAL
 21877                                  ;	    Drive Byte (A=1, B=2, ...) High bit clear
 21878                                  ;		NEVER STORE DRIVE BYTE AFTER  found_it
 21879                                  ;	    11 byte search name with Meta chars in it
 21880                                  ;	    Search Attribute Byte, attribute of search
 21881                                  ;	    WORD LastEnt value
 21882                                  ;	    WORD DirStart
 21883                                  ;	    4 byte pad
 21884                                  ;	    32 bytes of the directory entry found
 21885                                  ;	NET
 21886                                  ;	    21 bytes First byte has high bit set
 21887                                  ;	    32 bytes of the directory entry found
 21888                                  ;
 21889                                  ;	CARRY SET
 21890                                  ;	    AX = error code
 21891                                  ;		error_no_more_files
 21892                                  ;			No match for this file
 21893                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 21894                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 21895                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 21896                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 21897                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 21898                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21899                                  
 21900                                  ; 24/01/2024
 21901                                  %if 1
 21902                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21903                                  GET_FAST_SEARCH:
 21904                                  	; 22/07/2018
 21905                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 21906                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21907 00003525 36800E[1206]04          	OR	byte [ss:DOS34_FLAG+1],(SEARCH_FASTOPEN>>8)  ; 04h
 21908                                  	;OR	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],SEARCH_FASTOPEN  ; 400h
 21909                                  					;FO.trigger fastopen ;AN000;
 21910                                  	;call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21911                                  	;retn
 21912                                  	; 24/01/2024
 21913                                  	; 17/12/2022
 21914                                  	;jmp	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 21915                                  %endif

 22144                                  ;BREAK <DOS_SEARCH_NEXT - scan for subsequent matches>
 22145                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22146                                  ;
 22147                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_SEARCH_NEXT
 22148                                  ;
 22149                                  ; Inputs:
 22150                                  ;	[DMAADD] Points to 53 byte buffer returned by DOS_SEARCH_FIRST
 22151                                  ;	    (only first 21 bytes must have valid information)
 22152                                  ; Function:
 22153                                  ;	Look for subsequent matches
 22154                                  ; Outputs:
 22155                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 22156                                  ;	    The 53 bytes at DMAADD are updated for next call
 22157                                  ;		(see DOS_SEARCH_FIRST)
 22158                                  ;	CARRY SET
 22159                                  ;	    AX = error code
 22160                                  ;		error_no_more_files
 22161                                  ;			No more files to find
 22162                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 22163                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22164                                  
 22165                                  ;hkn; called from search.asm. DS already set up at this point.
 22166                                  
 22167                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22168                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:75ECh
 22169                                  
 22170                                  DOS_SEARCH_NEXT:
 22171 00003625 C43E[2C03]              	LES	DI,[DMAADD]	; 24/01/2024 (Retro DOS v5-v4)
 22172 00003629 268A05                  	MOV	AL,[ES:DI]
 22173 0000362C A880                    	TEST	AL,80H			; Test for NET
 22174 0000362E 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_SEARCH_NEXT
 22175                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 22176                                  ;	transfer NET_SEARCH_NEXT
 22177                                  ;ELSE
 22178                                  	;mov	ax,111Ch
 22179 00003630 B81C11                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|28
 22180 00003633 CD2F                    	INT	2FH  ; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - FINDNEXT
 22181                                  		     ; SS = DS = DOS CS, [DTA] = 21-byte findfirst search data
 22182                                  		     ; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 22183                                  		     ; CF clear if successful
 22184 00003635 C3                      	retn
 22185                                  ;ENDIF

 22313                                  	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]		;AN000;;FO.
 22314                                  	;mov	si,[ss:WFP_START]
 22315                                  getnext:				;AN000;
 22316                                  	LODSB				;AN000;;FO. get char
 22317                                  	OR	AL,AL			;AN000;;FO. is it null
 22318                                  	JZ	short NO_Question	;AN000;;FO. yes
 22319                                  	CMP	AL,'?'                  ;AN000;;FO. is '?'
 22320                                  	JNZ	short getnext 		;AN000;;FO. no
 22321                                  	STC				;AN000;;FO.
 22322                                  NO_Question:				;AN000;
 22323                                  	retn				;AN000;;FO.
 22324                                  %endif
 22325                                  
 22326                                  ;============================================================================
 22327                                  ; ABORT.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 22328                                  ;============================================================================
 22329                                  ; 23/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 22330                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22331                                  
 22332                                  ;**
 22333                                  ;
 22334                                  ; Internal Abort call closes all handles and FCBs associated with a process.
 22335                                  ;  If process has NET resources a close all is sent out over the net.
 22336                                  ;
 22337                                  ;   DOS_ABORT
 22338                                  ;
 22339                                  ;   Modification history:
 22340                                  ;
 22341                                  ;       Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 22342                                  ;
 22343                                  ;	M038	SR	10/16/90	Free SFT with the PSP of the process
 22344                                  ;				being terminated only if it is busy.
 22345                                  ;
 22346                                  
 22347                                  ;Break   <DOS_ABORT -- CLOSE all files for process>
 22348                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22349                                  ;
 22350                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_ABORT
 22351                                  ;
 22352                                  ; Inputs:
 22353                                  ;       [CurrentPDB] set to PID of process aborting
 22354                                  ; Function:
 22355                                  ;       Close all files and free all SFTs for this PID
 22356                                  ; Returns:
 22357                                  ;       None
 22358                                  ; All destroyed except stack
 22359                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22360                                  
 22361                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22362                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7685h
 22363                                  	; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:74F4h) 
 22364                                  
 22365                                  DOS_ABORT:
 22366 000036B8 368E06[3003]            	MOV     ES,[SS:CurrentPDB]	; SS override
 22367 000036BD 268B0E3200              	MOV     CX,[ES:PDB.JFN_Length]  ; Number of JFNs
 22368                                  reset_free_jfn:
 22369 000036C2 89CB                    	MOV     BX,CX
 22370 000036C4 51                      	PUSH    CX
 22371 000036C5 4B                      	DEC     BX                      ; get jfn (start with last one)
 22372                                  
 22373 000036C6 E8453E                  	CALL	_$CLOSE
 22374 000036C9 59                      	POP     CX
 22375 000036CA E2F6                    	LOOP    reset_free_jfn          ; and do 'em all
 22376                                  
 22377                                  ; Note: We do need to explicitly close FCBs. Reasons are as follows: If we
 22378                                  ; are running in the no-sharing no-network environment, we are simulating the
 22379                                  ; 2.0 world and thus if the user doesn't close the file, that is his problem
 22380                                  ; BUT... the cache remains in a state with garbage that may be reused by the
 22381                                  ; next process. We scan the set and blast the ref counts of the FCBs we own.
 22382                                  ;
 22383                                  ; If sharing is loaded, then the following call to close process will
 22384                                  ; correctly close all FCBs. We will then need to walk the list AFTER here.
 22385                                  ;
 22386                                  ; Finally, the following call to NET_Abort will cause an EOP to be sent to all
 22387                                  ; known network resources. These resources are then responsible for cleaning
 22388                                  ; up after this process.
 22389                                  ;
 22390                                  ; Sleazy, eh?
 22391                                  
 22392                                  	;context DS			; SS is DOSDATA
 22393 000036CC 16                      	push	ss
 22394 000036CD 1F                      	pop	ds  ; 09/09/2018
 22395                                  
 22396                                  	;CallInstall Net_Abort, MultNET, 29
 22397 000036CE B81D11                  	mov	ax,111Dh
 22398 000036D1 CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR 
 22399                                  			;	    - CLOSE ALL REMOTE FILES FOR PROCESS
 22400                                  			; DS???, SS = DOS CS
 22401                                  ;if installed
 22402 000036D3 FF1E[A000]              	call	far [JShare+(4*4)]	; 4 = MFTCloseP
 22403                                  ;else
 22404                                  ;	call 	MFTCloseP
 22405                                  ;endif
 22406                                  
 22407                                  ; Scan the FCB cache for guys that belong to this process and zap their ref
 22408                                  ; counts.
 22409                                  					; SS override
 22410 000036D7 36C43E[4000]            	les     di,[ss:SFTFCB]		; grab the pointer to the table
 22411                                  
 22412                                  	;;;
 22413                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22414                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 22415                                  SFTFCB_check:
 22416 000036DC 8CC1                    	mov	cx,es
 22417 000036DE 09F9                    	or	cx,di
 22418 000036E0 E31C                    	jcxz	FCBScanDone
 22419 000036E2 57                      	push	di
 22420                                  SFTFCB_OK:
 22421                                  	;;;
 22422                                  	;mov	cx,[es:di+4]
 22423 000036E3 268B4D04                	mov     cx,[es:di+SFT.SFCount]
 22424 000036E7 E315                    	jcxz    FCBScanDone
 22425                                  	;lea	di,[di+6]
 22426 000036E9 8D7D06                  	LEA     DI,[DI+SFT.SFTable]	; point at table
 22427 000036EC 36A1[3C03]              	mov     ax,[SS:PROC_ID]		; SS override
 22428                                  FCBTest:
 22429                                  	;cmp	[es:di+31h],ax
 22430 000036F0 26394531                	cmp	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_PID],ax ; is this one of ours
 22431 000036F4 7503                    	jnz	short FCBNext		; no, skip it
 22432                                  
 22433                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22434                                  %if 0
 22435                                  	mov	word [es:di],0
 22436                                  	;mov	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0 ; yes, blast ref count
 22437                                  %else
 22438                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22439                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 22440 000036F6 E80814                  	call    SFT_FREE
 22441                                  %endif
 22442                                  
 22443                                  FCBNext:
 22444 000036F9 83C73B                  	add     di,SF_ENTRY.size ; 59 (for MSDOS 6.0)
 22445 000036FC E2F2                    	loop    FCBTest
 22446                                  FCBScanDone:
 22447                                  
 22448                                  ; Walk the SFT to eliminate all busy SFT's for this process.
 22449                                  
 22450 000036FE 31DB                    	XOR     BX,BX
 22451                                  Scan:
 22452 00003700 53                      	push    bx
 22453 00003701 E8853D                  	call	SFFromSFN
 22454 00003704 5B                      	pop     bx
 22455                                  	;jnc	short Scan1
 22456                                  	;retn
 22457                                  
 22458                                  	; 18/12/2022
 22459                                  	;jc	short NO_Question ; retn
 22460                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22461 00003705 7232                    	jc	short RET2
 22462                                  
 22463                                  ;M038
 22464                                  ; Do what the comment above says, check for busy state
 22465                                  
 22466                                  Scan1:
 22467                                  	;cmp	word [es:di],0
 22468                                  	;jz	short scan_next  ; MSDOS 3.3
 22469                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 22470 00003707 26833DFF                	cmp	word [es:di],sf_busy ; -1
 22471                                  	;cmp	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],sf_busy
 22472                                  				; Is Sft busy? ;M038
 22473 0000370B 7517                    	jnz	short scan_next ; no
 22474                                  ;
 22475                                  ; we have a SFT that is busy. See if it is for the current process
 22476                                  ;
 22477 0000370D 36A1[3C03]              	mov     ax,[SS:PROC_ID]		; SS override
 22478                                  	;cmp	[es:di+31h],ax
 22479 00003711 26394531                	cmp	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_PID],ax
 22480 00003715 750D                    	jnz	short scan_next
 22481 00003717 36A1[3E03]              	mov     ax,[SS:USER_ID]		; SS override
 22482                                  	;sub	ax,[es:di+2Fh] ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM ; 03/02/2024
 22483                                  	;cmp	[es:di+2Fh],ax
 22484 0000371B 2639452F                	cmp	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_UID],ax
 22485 0000371F 7503                    	jnz	short scan_next
 22486                                  
 22487                                  ; This SFT is labelled as ours.
 22488                                  
 22489                                  ; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22490                                  %if 0
 22491                                  	mov	word [es:di],0
 22492                                  	;mov	word [es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count],0
 22493                                  %else
 22494                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22495                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 22496 00003721 E8DD13                  	call    SFT_FREE
 22497                                  %endif
 22498                                  
 22499                                  scan_next:
 22500 00003724 43                      	inc     bx
 22501 00003725 EBD9                    	jmp     short Scan
 22502                                  
 22503                                  ;============================================================================
 22504                                  ; CLOSE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 22505                                  ;============================================================================
 22506                                  ; 23/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 22507                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22508                                  
 22509                                  ;**	Internal Close and Commit calls to close a local or NET SFT.
 22510                                  ;
 22511                                  ;	DOS_CLOSE
 22512                                  ;	DOS_COMMIT
 22513                                  ;	FREE_SFT
 22514                                  ;	SetSFTTimes
 22515                                  ;
 22516                                  ;	Revision history:
 22517                                  ;
 22518                                  ;	   AN000  version 4.00	Jan. 1988
 22519                                  ;	   A005   PTM 3718 --- lost clusters when fastopen installed
 22520                                  ;	   A011   PTM 4766 --- C2 fastopen problem
 22521                                  
 22522                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 22523                                  
 22524                                  ;Break <DOS_CLOSE -- CLOSE FILE from SFT>
 22525                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22526                                  ;
 22527                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_CLOSE
 22528                                  ;
 22529                                  ; Inputs:
 22530                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being used
 22531                                  ; Function:
 22532                                  ;	Close the indicated file via the SFT
 22533                                  ; Returns:
 22534                                  ;	sf_ref_count decremented otherwise
 22535                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 22536                                  ;	Carry set if error
 22537                                  ;	    AX has error code
 22538                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 22539                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22540                                  
 22541                                  ;hkn; DOS_CLOSE called from fcbio.asm and handle.asm. DS alreday set up.
 22542                                  
 22543                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22544                                  ; DOSCODE:6E2Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 22545                                  
 22546                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 22547                                  ; DOSCODE:6E1Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 22548                                  
 22549                                  ; 23/07/2018 - IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3), 1987 - Offset 39D0h
 22550                                  
 22551                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22552                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:76FEh
 22553                                  	; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7579h) 
 22554                                  
 22555                                  DOS_CLOSE:
 22556 00003727 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 22557                                  	;mov	bx,[ES:DI+5]
 22558 0000372B 268B5D05                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags]
 22559                                  
 22560                                  ; Network closes are handled entirely by the net code.
 22561                                  
 22562                                  	;;test	bx,8000h
 22563                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_isnet
 22564                                  	; 17/12/2022
 22565                                  	;test	bh,80h
 22566 0000372F F6C780                  	test	bh,(sf_isnet>>8)
 22567 00003732 7406                    	JZ	short LocalClose
 22568                                  
 22569                                  	;CallInstall Net_Close,MultNET,6
 22570 00003734 B80611                  	mov     ax,1106h
 22571 00003737 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CLOSE REMOTE FILE
 22572                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 22573                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 22574                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 22575                                  			; CF clear if successful
 22576                                  RET2:		; 03/02/2024
 22577 00003739 C3                      	retn
 22578                                  
 22579                                  ; All closes release the sharing information.
 22580                                  ; No commit releases sharing information
 22581                                  ;
 22582                                  ; All closes decrement the ref count.
 22583                                  ; No commit decrements the ref count.
 22584                                  
 22585                                  LocalClose:
 22586 0000373A E8ACE1                  	call	ECritDisk
 22587 0000373D E8C901                  	CALL	SetSFTTimes
 22588 00003740 E84C01                  	CALL	FREE_SFT		; dec ref count or mark as busy
 22589                                  
 22590                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 22591                                  	;Context DS
 22592 00003743 16                      	push	ss
 22593 00003744 1F                      	pop	ds
 22594                                  
 22595 00003745 50                      	push	ax
 22596 00003746 53                      	push	bx
 22597 00003747 E8264A                  	call	ShareEnd
 22598 0000374A 5B                      	pop	bx
 22599 0000374B 58                      	pop	ax
 22600                                  
 22601                                  ; Commit enters here. AX from commit MUST be <> 1, BX is flags word
 22602                                  
 22603                                  CloseEntry:
 22604 0000374C 50                      	PUSH	AX
 22605                                  
 22606                                  ; File clean or device does not get stamped nor disk looked at.
 22607                                  
 22608                                  	;test	bx,0C0h
 22609                                  	; 17/12/2022
 22610 0000374D F6C3C0                  	test	bl,devid_file_clean+devid_device
 22611                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device
 22612 00003750 7403                    	JZ	short rdir
 22613                                  	; 14/11/2022
 22614 00003752 E90101                  	JMP	FREE_SFT_OK		; either clean or device
 22615                                  	;jnz	short FREE_SFT_OK ; 24/07/2019	
 22616                                  
 22617                                  ; Retrieve the directory entry for the file
 22618                                  
 22619                                  rdir:
 22620 00003755 E84401                  	CALL	DirFromSFT
 22621                                  	;mov	al,5
 22622 00003758 B005                    	MOV	AL,error_access_denied
 22623                                  	
 22624                                  	; 03/02/2024
 22625                                  	;JNC	short clook
 22626                                  	;; 14/11/2022
 22627                                  	;JMP	CloseFinish		; pretend the close worked.
 22628                                  	;;jc	short CloseFinish ; 24/07/2019
 22629                                  	
 22630                                  	;;;
 22631                                  	; 03/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 22632                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 22633 0000375A 7240                    	jc	short jmp_to_CloseFinish ; pretend the close worked.
 22634                                  rdir2:
 22635                                  	;test	word [si+2],4
 22636 0000375C F6440204                	test	byte [si+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],4 ; devid_device_null
 22637                                  					; bit 2 - null device
 22638 00003760 751F                    	jnz	short clook
 22639                                  
 22640 00003762 1E                      	push	ds
 22641 00003763 53                      	push	bx
 22642 00003764 C55C07                  	lds	bx,[si+7]
 22643 00003767 C55C07                  	lds	bx,[si+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr] ; pointer to DPB
 22644                                  
 22645 0000376A 8A1F                    	mov	bl,[bx]			; DPB.DRIVE
 22646 0000376C 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh  ; 0
 22647 0000376E 36F687[3114]04          	test	byte [ss:bx+drive_flags],4
 22648                                  					; bit 2 - last access date/time flag?
 22649                                  					; or disk accessed flag !?
 22650 00003774 5B                       	pop	bx
 22651 00003775 7409                    	jz	short skip_upd_laccdt	; no support for last access date&time
 22652 00003777 1F                      	pop	ds
 22653 00003778 1E                      	push	ds
 22654 00003779 E8E6D3                  	call	DATE16
 22655                                  	;mov	[es:di+12h],ax
 22656 0000377C 26894512                	mov	[es:di+dir_entry.dir_lstaccdate],ax
 22657                                  skip_upd_laccdt:
 22658 00003780 1F                      	pop	ds
 22659                                  	;;;
 22660                                  
 22661                                  clook:
 22662                                  
 22663                                  ; ES:DI points to entry
 22664                                  ; DS:SI points to SFT
 22665                                  ; ES:BX points to buffer header
 22666                                  
 22667 00003781 57                      	push	di
 22668 00003782 56                      	push	si
 22669                                  	;lea	si,[si+20h]

 22674

 22679

 22682 0000378F 5E                      	pop	si
 22683 00003790 5F                      	pop	di
 22684 00003791 740C                    	JZ	short CLOSE_GO		; Name OK
 22685                                  Bye:	
 22686 00003793 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 22687 00003795 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 22688 00003796 07                      	POP	ES			; ES:DI points to SFT
 22689 00003797 16                      	PUSH	SS
 22690 00003798 1F                      	POP	DS

 22981                                  ; Procedure Name : FREE_SFT

 22984                                  ; Flags preserved. Return old ref count in AX

 23091                                  ;
 23092                                  ;**	DOS_Commit - UPdate Directory Entries
 23093                                  ;
 23094                                  ;	ENTRY	same as DOS_CLOSE (??? BUGBUG - update this jgl)

 23101                                  ; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 23103                                  
 23104                                  ; 04/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23105                                  ; DOSCODE:78B8h (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23106                                  
 23107                                  DOS_COMMIT:
 23108                                  	;hkn; called from srvcall. DS already set up.
 23109 000038DA C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 23110                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+5]
 23111 000038DE 268B5D05                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags]
 23112                                  	;test	bx,0C0h
 23113                                  	; 17/12/2022
 23114 000038E2 F6C3C0                  	test	bl,devid_file_clean+devid_device ;Clears carry
 23115                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device ;Clears carry
 23116 000038E5 75F2                    	jnz	short PopDone_retn
 23117                                  	;test	bx,8000h
 23118                                  	; 17/12/2022
 23119                                  	;test	bh,80h
 23120 000038E7 F6C780                  	test	bh,(sf_isnet>>8) ; 80h
 23121                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_isnet ; 8000h
 23122 000038EA 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_COMMIT
 23123                                  
 23124                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 23125                                  ;	transfer NET_COMMIT
 23126                                  ;ELSE
 23127                                  	;mov	ax,1107h
 23128 000038EC B80711                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|7
 23129 000038EF CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - COMMIT REMOTE FILE
 23130                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 23131                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 23132                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 23133                                  			; CF clear if successful
 23134                                  localcommit_retn: ; 18/12/2022	
 23135 000038F1 C3                      	retn
 23136                                  ;ENDIF
 23137                                  
 23138                                  ; Perform local commit operation by doing a close but not releaseing the SFT.
 23139                                  ; There are three ways we can do this. One is to enter a critical section to
 23140                                  ; protect a potential free. The second is to increment the ref count to mask
 23141                                  ; the close decrementing.
 23142                                  ;
 23143                                  ; The proper way is to let the caller's of close decide if a decrement should
 23144                                  ; be done. We do this by providing another entry into close after the
 23145                                  ; decrement and after the share information release.
 23146                                  
 23147                                  ; DOSCODE:6FA0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23148                                  ; DOSCODE:6F8Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 23149                                  
 23150                                  LOCAL_COMMIT:
 23151 000038F2 E8F4DF                  	call	ECritDisk
 23152                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 23153 000038F5 E8F1DF                  	call	ECritDisk	;PTM.
 23154 000038F8 E80E00                  	call	SetSFTTimes
 23155 000038FB B8FFFF                  	MOV	AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 23156 000038FE E84BFE                  	call	CloseEntry
 23157                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 23158 00003901 9C                      	PUSHF			;PTM.				;AN000;
 23159 00003902 E83719                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT	;PTM.  increment device count	;AN000;
 23160 00003905 9D                      	POPF			;PTM.				;AN000;
 23161                                  	;call	LCritDisk	;PTM.				;AN000;
 23162                                  	; 18/12/2022
 23163 00003906 E90DE0                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 23164                                  ;localcommit_retn:
 23165                                  ;	retn

 23170                                  ; Procedure Name : SetSFTTimes
 23171                                  ;
 23172                                  ;   SetSFTTimes - Examine the flags for a SFT and set the time appropriately.
 23173                                  ;   Reflect these times in other SFT's for the same file.
 23174                                  ;
 23175                                  ;   Inputs:	ES:DI point to SFT
 23176                                  ;		BX = sf_flags set appropriately
 23177                                  ;   Outputs:	Set sft times to current time if File & dirty & !nodate
 23178                                  ;   Registers modified: All except ES:DI, BX, AX
 23179                                  ;
 23180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23181                                  
 23182                                  	; 04/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 23183                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM 
 23184                                  
 23185                                  SetSFTTimes:
 23186                                  
 23187                                  ; 04/02/2024
 23188                                  %if 0

 23190

 23194                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device
 23195                                  	;retnz				; clean or device => no timestamp
 23196                                  	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 23197

 23199

 23201                                  	; 17/12/2022
 23202                                  	;test	bh,40h

 23204                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_close_nodate
 23205                                  	;retnz				; nodate => no timestamp

 23207                                  %else

 23209                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 23210                                  	;test	bx,40C0h
 23211 00003909 F7C3C040                	test	bx,sf_close_nodate+devid_file_clean+devid_device
 23212 0000390D 75E2                    	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 23213                                  %endif
 23214                                  
 23215 0000390F 50                      	push	ax
 23216 00003910 53                      	push	bx
 23217 00003911 E84ED2                  	call	DATE16			; Date/Time to AX/DX
 23218                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Fh],ax
 23219 00003914 2689450F                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date],AX
 23220                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Dh],dx
 23221 00003918 2689550D                	MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time],DX
 23222 0000391C 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 23223                                  ;if installed
 23224                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 23225 0000391E FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]	; 14 = ShSU
 23226                                  ;else
 23227                                  ;	call	ShSU
 23228                                  ;endif
 23229 00003922 5B                      	pop	bx
 23230 00003923 58                      	pop	ax
 23231 00003924 C3                      	retn

 23240                                  
 23241                                  ;TITLE DIRCALL - Directory manipulation internal calls
 23242                                  ;NAME  DIRCALL
 23243                                  
 23244                                  ;**	Low level directory manipulation routines for making removing and
 23245                                  ;	  verifying local or NET directories
 23246                                  ;
 23247                                  ;	DOS_MKDIR
 23248                                  ;	DOS_CHDIR
 23249                                  ;	DOS_RMDIR
 23250                                  ;
 23251                                  ;	Modification history:
 23252                                  ;
 23253                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 23254                                  
 23255                                  ;BREAK <DOS_MkDir - Make a directory entry>
 23256                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23257                                  ;
 23258                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_MkDir
 23259                                  ;
 23260                                  ; Inputs:
 23261                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 23262                                  ;		terminated)
 23263                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 23264                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 23265                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 23266                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 23267                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 23268                                  ; Function:
 23269                                  ;	Make a new directory
 23270                                  ; Returns:
 23271                                  ;	Carry Clear
 23272                                  ;		No error
 23273                                  ;	Carry Set
 23274                                  ;	    AX is error code
 23275                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 23276                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 23277                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 23278                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 23279                                  ;		error_access_denied
 23280                                  ;			Already exists, device name
 23281                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 23282                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23283

 23540                                  ;
 23541                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_ChDir
 23542                                  ;
 23543                                  ; Inputs:
 23544                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 23545                                  ;		terminated)
 23546                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string

 23557                                  ;		Caller must NOT set ID fields on a NET CDS.
 23558                                  ;	Carry Set
 23559                                  ;	    AX is error code

 23562                                  ;		error_access_denied

 23899                                  ;	TITLE	DISK - Disk utility routines
 23900                                  ;	NAME	Disk
 23901                                  
 23902                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs
 23903                                  ;
 23904                                  ;	SWAPCON
 23905                                  ;	SWAPBACK
 23906                                  ;	DOS_READ
 23907                                  ;	DOS_WRITE
 23908                                  ;	get_io_sft
 23909                                  ;	DirRead
 23910                                  ;	FIRSTCLUSTER
 23911                                  ;	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 23912                                  ;	FATSecRd
 23913                                  ;	DREAD
 23914                                  ;	CHECK_WRITE_LOCK
 23915                                  ;	CHECK_READ_LOCK
 23916                                  ;
 23917                                  ;	Revision history:
 23918                                  ;
 23919                                  ;		A000   version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 23920                                  ;
 23921                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23922                                  ;
 23923                                  ; M065 : B#5276. On raw read/write of a block of characters if a critical
 23924                                  ;		error happens, DOS retries the entire block assuming that
 23925                                  ;		zero characters were transferred. Modified the code to take
 23926                                  ;		into account the number of characters transfered before
 23927                                  ;		retrying the operation.
 23928                                  ;
 23929                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23930                                  ;
 23931                                  
 23932                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 23933                                  
 23934                                  ;Break	<SwapCon, Swap Back - Old-style I/O to files>
 23935                                  
 23936                                  ; **** Drivers for file input from devices ****
 23937                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23938                                  ;   Indicate that there is no more I/O occurring through another SFT outside
 23939                                  ;   of handles 0 and 1
 23940                                  ;
 23941                                  ;   Inputs:	DS is DOSDATA
 23942                                  ;   Outputs:	CONSWAP is set to false.
 23943                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 23944                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23945                                  
 23946                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 3CF8h
 23947                                  
 23948                                  ; DOSCODE:71E3h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23949                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23950                                  
 23951                                  ; DOSCODE:71CFh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 23952                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23953                                  
 23954                                  SWAPBACK:
 23955 00003B67 C606[5703]00            	MOV	BYTE [CONSWAP],0	; signal no conswaps
 23956 00003B6C C3                      	retn
 23957                                  
 23958                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23959                                  ;
 23960                                  ; Procedure Name : SWAPCON
 23961                                  ;
 23962                                  ;   Copy ThisSFT to CONSFT for use by the 1-12 primitives.
 23963                                  ;
 23964                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisSFT as the sft of the desired file
 23965                                  ;		DS is DOSDATA
 23966                                  ;   Outputs:	CONSWAP is set.  CONSFT = ThisSFT.
 23967                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 23968                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23969                                  
 23970                                  SWAPCON:
 23971                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 23972                                  	;push	es
 23973                                  	;push	di
 23974                                  	;mov	byte [CONSWAP],1
 23975                                  	;les	di,[THISSFT]
 23976                                  	;mov	word [CONSFT],di
 23977                                  	;mov	word [CONSFT+2],es
 23978                                  	;pop	di
 23979                                  	;pop	es
 23980                                  	;retn
 23981                                  
 23982                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 23983 00003B6D C606[5703]01            	mov	byte [CONSWAP],1	; ConSwap = TRUE
 23984 00003B72 50                      	push	ax
 23985 00003B73 A1[9E05]                	mov	ax,[THISSFT]
 23986 00003B76 A3[E605]                	mov	[CONSFT],ax
 23987 00003B79 A1[A005]                	mov	ax,[THISSFT+2]
 23988 00003B7C A3[E805]                	mov	[CONSFT+2],ax
 23989 00003B7F 58                      	pop	ax
 23990 00003B80 C3                      	retn
 23991                                  
 23992                                  ; DOSCODE:71FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23993                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23994                                  
 23995                                  ;Break	<DOS_READ -- MAIN READ ROUTINE AND DEVICE IN ROUTINES>
 23996                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23997                                  ;
 23998                                  ; Inputs:
 23999                                  ;	ThisSFT set to the SFT for the file being used
 24000                                  ;	[DMAADD] contains transfer address
 24001                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes to read
 24002                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 24003                                  ; Function:
 24004                                  ;	Perform read operation
 24005                                  ; Outputs:
 24006                                  ;    Carry clear
 24007                                  ;	SFT Position and cluster pointers updated
 24008                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes read
 24009                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24010                                  ;    Carry set
 24011                                  ;	AX is error code
 24012                                  ;	CX = 0
 24013                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24014                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed
 24015                                  ;
 24016                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24017                                  
 24018                                  ;hkn; called from fcbio.asm, handle.asm and dev.asm. DS is be set up.
 24019                                  
 24020                                  ; DOSCODE:71E9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24021                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24022                                  
 24023                                  ; 07/02/2024
 24024                                  ; 06/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24025                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7B76h
 24026                                  
 24027                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:7997h)
 24028                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:71FDh)
 24029                                  
 24030                                  DOS_READ:
 24031 00003B81 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 24032                                  
 24033                                  ; Verify that the sft has been opened in a mode that allows reading.
 24034                                  
 24035                                  	;mov	al,[es:di+2]
 24036 00003B85 268A4502                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 24037                                  	;;and	al,0Fh	; (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.22)
 24038                                  	;AND	AL,access_mask
 24039                                  	; 06/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 24040                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 & Win Me)
 24041 00003B89 2403                    	and	al,3	; open_mode_mask ?
 24042                                  
 24043                                  	;cmp	al,1
 24044 00003B8B 3C01                    	CMP	AL,open_for_write
 24045 00003B8D 7503                    	JNE	short READ_NO_MODE	; Is read or both
 24046 00003B8F E96506                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR
 24047                                  
 24048                                  READ_NO_MODE:
 24049 00003B92 E82505                  	call	SETUP
 24050 00003B95 E30B                    	JCXZ	NoIORet 		; no bytes to read - fast return
 24051 00003B97 E8A6DC                  	call	IsSFTNet
 24052 00003B9A 7408                    	JZ	short LOCAL_READ
 24053                                  
 24054                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 24055                                  ;	transfer NET_READ
 24056                                  ;ELSE
 24057                                  	;mov	ax,1108h
 24058 00003B9C B80811                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|8
 24059 00003B9F CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - READ FROM REMOTE FILE
 24060                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 24061                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 24062                                  			; CX = number of bytes, SS = DOS CS, SDA DTA field -> user buffer
 24063                                  			; Return: CF set on error, CX = bytes read
 24064 00003BA1 C3                      	retn
 24065                                  ;ENDIF
 24066                                  
 24067                                  ; The user ended up requesting 0 bytes of input. We do nothing for this case
 24068                                  ; except return immediately.
 24069                                  
 24070                                  NoIORet:
 24071 00003BA2 F8                      	CLC
 24072 00003BA3 C3                      	retn
 24073                                  
 24074                                  LOCAL_READ:
 24075                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],80h
 24076                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device  ; Check for named device I/O
 24077 00003BA4 26F6450580              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device ; 02/06/2019
 24078 00003BA9 750E                    	JNZ	short READDEV
 24079                                  
 24080                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2
 24081 00003BAB C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
