 24083 00003BB3 E8F805                  	call	DISKREAD
 24084                                  
 24085                                  critexit:
 24086                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 24087                                  	;retn
 24088                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24089 00003BB6 E95DDD                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 24090                                  
 24091                                  ; We are reading from a device. Examine the status of the device to see if we
 24092                                  ; can short-circuit the I/O. If the device in the EOF state or if it is the
 24093                                  ; null device, we can safely indicate no transfer.
 24094                                  
 24095                                  READDEV:
 24096                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],4
 24097 00003BB9 C606[2303]04            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_SerDev
 24098                                  	;mov	bl,[es:di+5]
 24099 00003BBE 268A5D05                	MOV	BL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags]
 24100 00003BC2 C43E[2C03]              	LES	DI,[DMAADD]
 24101                                  	;test	bl,40h
 24102 00003BC6 F6C340                  	test	BL,devid_device_EOF	; End of file?
 24103 00003BC9 7407                    	JZ	short ENDRDDEVJ3
 24104                                  	;test	bl,4
 24105 00003BCB F6C304                  	test	BL,devid_device_null	; NUL device?
 24106 00003BCE 7405                    	JZ	short TESTRAW 		; NO
 24107 00003BD0 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL			; Indicate EOF by setting zero
 24108                                  ENDRDDEVJ3:
 24109                                  	; 17/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility!)
 24110                                  	;JMP	short ENDRDDEVJ2
 24111                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24112 00003BD2 E93F01                  	jmp	ENDRDDEV ; 04/05/2019
 24113                                  
 24114                                  ; We need to hit the device. Figure out if we do a raw read or we do the
 24115                                  ; bizarre std_con_string_input.
 24116                                  
 24117                                  TESTRAW:
 24118                                  	;test	bl,20h
 24119 00003BD5 F6C320                  	test	BL,devid_device_raw	; Raw mode?
 24120 00003BD8 7508                    	JNZ	short DVRDRAW 		; Yes, let the device do all local editing
 24121                                  	;test	bl,1
 24122 00003BDA F6C301                  	test	BL,devid_device_con_in	; Is it console device?
 24123 00003BDD 7458                    	JZ	short NOTRDCON
 24124 00003BDF E96701                  	JMP	READCON
 24125                                  
 24126                                  DVRDRAW:
 24127 00003BE2 06                      	PUSH	ES
 24128 00003BE3 1F                      	POP	DS			; Xaddr to DS:DI
 24129                                  
 24130                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24131                                  
 24132                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24133                                  ;SR;
 24134                                  ;Check for win386 presence -- if present, do polled read of characters
 24135                                  
 24136 00003BE4 36F606[A310]01          	test	byte [ss:IsWin386],1 ; 19/05/2019
 24137 00003BEA 7408                    	jz	short ReadRawRetry	;not present
 24138 00003BEC F6C301                  	test	bl,devid_device_con_in	;is it console device?
 24139 00003BEF 7403                    	jz	short ReadRawRetry	;no, do normal read
 24140 00003BF1 E9A800                  	jmp	do_polling		;yes, do win386 polling loop
 24141                                  
 24142                                  ReadRawRetry:
 24143                                  
 24144                                  ; 07/02/2024
 24145                                  %if 0
 24146                                  	MOV	BX,DI			; DS:BX transfer addr
 24147                                  	; 06/02/2024 ; *
 24148                                  	;XOR	AX,AX			; Media Byte, unit = 0
 24149                                  	;;MOV	DX,AX			; Start at 0
 24150                                  	;; 06/02/2024
 24151                                  	;cwd
 24152                                  	;call	SETREAD
 24153                                  	; 06/02/2024 ; *
 24154                                  	call	SETREAD_X
 24155                                  %else
 24156 00003BF4 E83917                  	call	SETREAD_XJ
 24157                                  %endif
 24158                                  
 24159 00003BF7 1E                      	PUSH	DS			; Save Seg part of Xaddr
 24160                                  
 24161                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24162 00003BF8 36C536[9E05]            	LDS	SI,[SS:THISSFT]
 24163 00003BFD E8BA16                  	call	DEVIOCALL
 24164 00003C00 89FA                    	MOV	DX,DI			; DS:DX is preserved by INT 24
 24165 00003C02 B486                    	MOV	AH,86H			; Read error
 24166                                  
 24167                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24168 00003C04 368B3E[5D03]            	MOV	DI,[SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 24169                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 24170                                  	;test	di,8000h
 24171                                  	;jz	short CRDROK
 24172                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24173 00003C09 09FF                    	or	di,di
 24174 00003C0B 7920                    	jns	short CRDROK		; no errors
 24175                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 24176 00003C0D E84624                  	call	CHARHARD
 24177                                  
 24178                                  ; 06/02/2024 - Retrro DOS v5.0
 24179                                  %if 0
 24180                                  	MOV	DI,DX			; DS:DI is Xaddr
 24181                                  	; 04/05/2019
 24182                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24183                                  	add	di,[ss:CALLSCNT]	; update ptr and count to reflect the	M065
 24184                                  	sub	cx,[ss:CALLSCNT]	; number of chars xferred		M065
 24185                                  %else
 24186 00003C10 368B3E[6C03]            	mov	di,[ss:CALLSCNT]
 24187 00003C15 29F9                    	sub	cx,di			; update transfer count
 24188 00003C17 01D7                    	add	di,dx			; update pointer
 24189                                  %endif
 24190                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 24191 00003C19 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24192 00003C1B 7410                    	JZ	short CRDROK		; Ignore
 24193 00003C1D 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3
 24194 00003C1F 7403                    	JZ	short CRDFERR 		; fail.
 24195 00003C21 1F                      	POP	DS			; Recover saved seg part of Xaddr
 24196 00003C22 EBD0                    	JMP	short ReadRawRetry	; Retry
 24197                                  
 24198                                  ; We have encountered a device-driver error. We have informed the user of it
 24199                                  ; and he has said for us to fail the system call.
 24200                                  
 24201                                  CRDFERR:
 24202 00003C24 5F                      	POP	DI			; Clean stack
 24203                                  DEVIOFERR:
 24204                                  
 24205                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24206 00003C25 36C43E[9E05]            	LES	DI,[SS:THISSFT]
 24207 00003C2A E9C805                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 24208                                  
 24209                                  CRDROK:
 24210 00003C2D 5F                      	POP	DI			; Chuck saved seg of Xaddr
 24211 00003C2E 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 24212                                  
 24213                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24214 00003C30 36033E[6C03]            	ADD	DI,[ss:CALLSCNT]	; Amount transferred
 24215                                  	;JMP	SHORT ENDRDDEVJ3
 24216                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24217 00003C35 EB63                    	jmp	short ENDRDDEVJ2
 24218                                  
 24219                                  ; We are going to do a cooked read on some character device. There is a
 24220                                  ; problem here, what does the data look like? Is it a terminal device, line
 24221                                  ; CR line CR line CR, or is it file data, line CR LF line CR LF? Does it have
 24222                                  ; a ^Z at the end which is data, or is the ^Z not data?  In any event we're
 24223                                  ; going to do this: Read in pieces up to CR (CRs included in data) or ^z (^z
 24224                                  ; included in data). this "simulates" the way con works in cooked mode
 24225                                  ; reading one line at a time. With file data, however, the lines will look
 24226                                  ; like, LF line CR. This is a little weird.
 24227                                  
 24228                                  NOTRDCON:
 24229                                  	;MOV	AX,ES
 24230                                  	;MOV	DS,AX
 24231                                  	; 07/02/2024
 24232 00003C37 06                      	push	es
 24233 00003C38 1F                      	pop	ds
 24234                                  
 24235                                  ; 07/02/2024
 24236                                  %if 0
 24237                                  	MOV	BX,DI
 24238                                  	; 06/02/2024 ; *
 24239                                  	;;XOR	DX,DX
 24240                                  	;;MOV	AX,DX
 24241                                  	;; 06/02/2024
 24242                                  	;xor	ax,ax
 24243                                  	;cwd
 24244                                  	PUSH	CX
 24245                                  	MOV	CX,1
 24246                                  	;call	SETREAD
 24247                                  	; 06/02/2024 ; *

 24249                                  	POP	CX
 24250                                  %else
 24251 00003C39 51                      	push	cx
 24252 00003C3A B90100                  	mov	cx,1

 24254 00003C40 59                      	pop	cx
 24255                                  %endif
 24256                                  
 24257                                  ;hkn; SS override

 24259                                  	;lds	si,[si+7]
 24260 00003C46 C57407                  	LDS	SI,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr]
 24261                                  DVRDLP:

 24264 00003C4F 57                      	PUSH	DI			; Save "count" done

 24284 00003C6A 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3

 24286 00003C6E 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL			; Ignore, Pick some random character
 24287 00003C70 EB12                    	JMP	SHORT DVRDIGN
 24288

 24291                                  
 24292                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24293 00003C73 36833E[6C03]01          	CMP	word [SS:CALLSCNT],1
 24294                                  	; 17/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility!)
 24295 00003C79 751F                    	JNZ	short ENDRDDEVJ2
 24296                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24297                                  	;jnz	short ENDRDDEV ; 24/07/2019
 24298                                  
 24299 00003C7B 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 24300                                  
 24301                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24302 00003C7C 368E1E[6A03]            	MOV	DS,[SS:CALLXAD+2]
 24303 00003C81 8A05                    	MOV	AL,[DI]			; Get the character we just read
 24304 00003C83 1F                      	POP	DS
 24305                                  DVRDIGN:

 24307                                  ;hkn; SS override

 24319                                  					;  AX=FFFF which is not likely

 24326                                  	; 04/05/2019
 24327                                  
 24328                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24329                                  ;SR;
 24330                                  ;Polling code for raw read on CON when WIN386 is present
 24331                                  ;
 24332                                  ;At this point -- ds:di is transfer address
 24333                                  ;		  cx is count
 24334

 24336                                  
 24337                                  ; 07/02/2024
 24338                                  %if 0

 24353                                  ;Change read to a NON-DESTRUCTIVE READ, NO WAIT
 24354                                  
 24355 00003C9F 26C6470205              	mov	byte [es:bx+2],DEVRDND ; 5 ;Change command code
 24356 00003CA4 1E                      	push	ds

 24360                                  	
 24361                                  	;test	word [es:bx+3],8000h
 24362                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24363                                  	;test	byte [es:bx+4],80h

 24365                                  	;test	word [es:bx+SRHEAD.REQSTAT],STERR ;check if error
 24366 00003CB3 7413                    	jz	short check_busy	;no
 24367                                  
 24368 00003CB5 1E                      	push	ds
 24369 00003CB6 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 24370                                  
 24371                                  invoke_charhard:	; 07/02/2024
 24372                                  	;invoke charhard		;invoke int 24h handler
 24373 00003CB8 E89B23                  	call	CHARHARD
 24374 00003CBB 89D7                    	mov	di,dx
 24375 00003CBD 08C0                    	or	al,al
 24376 00003CBF 744D                    	jz	short pop_done_read	;ignore by user, assume read done
 24377 00003CC1 3C03                    	cmp	al,3
 24378 00003CC3 7438                    	jz	short devrderr		;user asked to fail
 24379 00003CC5 1F                      	pop	ds
 24380 00003CC6 EBD7                    	jmp	short do_io		;user asked to retry
 24381                                  
 24382                                  check_busy:
 24383                                  	;test	word [es:bx+3],200h
 24384                                  	; 16/12/2022

 24387 00003CCD 7537                    	jnz	short no_char		;yes, no character available
 24388                                  
 24389                                  ;Character is available. Read in 1 character at a time until all characters
 24390                                  ;are read in or no character is available
 24391                                  
 24392 00003CCF 26C6470204              	mov	byte [es:bx+2],DEVRD ; 4 ;command code is READ now
 24393 00003CD4 26C747120100            	mov	word [es:bx+18],1	;change count to 1 character
 24394 00003CDA 1E                      	push	ds
 24395 00003CDB 36C536[9E05]            	lds	si,[ss:THISSFT]
 24396 00003CE0 E8D715                  	call	DEVIOCALL
 24397                                  
 24398 00003CE3 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 24399 00003CE5 B486                    	mov	ah,86h
 24400                                  	;mov	di,[es:bx+3]
 24401 00003CE7 268B7F03                	mov	di,[es:bx+SRHEAD.REQSTAT] ;get returned status
 24402 00003CEB F7C70080                	test	di,STERR ; 8000h	;was there an error during read?

 24404                                  	; 07/02/2024

 24406                                  
 24407                                  ; 07/02/2024
 24408                                  %if 0
 24409                                  	;invoke	charhard		;invoke int 24h handler
 24410                                  	call	CHARHARD

 24412                                  	or	al,al			;
 24413                                  	jz	short pop_done_read	;ignore by user,assume read is done
 24414                                  	cmp	al,3
 24415                                  	jz	short devrderr		;user issued a 'fail',indicate error
 24416                                  	pop	ds
 24417                                  	jmp	short do_io		;user issued a retry
 24418                                  %endif
 24419                                  
 24420                                  next_char:

 24422 00003CF2 89D7                    	mov	di,dx
 24423 00003CF4 49                      	dec	cx			;decrement count
 24424                                  	;jcxz	done_read		;all characters read in
 24425                                  	; 07/02/2024
 24426 00003CF5 7418                    	jz	short done_read
 24427 00003CF7 26FF470E                	inc	word [es:bx+14]		;update transfer address
 24428 00003CFB EBA2                    	jmp	short do_io		;read next character in
 24429                                  
 24430                                  devrderr:

 24433                                  	;transfer SET_ACC_ERR_DS	;indicate error

 24435                                  
 24436                                  no_char:

 24438                                  
 24439 00003D06 50                      	push	ax
 24440 00003D07 B484                    	mov	ah,84h	; Microsoft Networks - KEYBOARD BUSY LOOP
 24441 00003D09 CD2A                    	int	2Ah			;indicate idle to WIN386
 24442                                  
 24443                                  ;When control returns from WIN386, we continue the raw read
 24444                                  
 24445 00003D0B 58                      	pop	ax
 24446 00003D0C EB91                    	jmp	do_io
 24447                                  
 24448                                  pop_done_read:
 24449 00003D0E 1F                      	pop	ds

 24456                                  	;jmp	ENDRDDEV ; 04/05/2019

 24458                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24459                                  ENDRDDEV:
 24460 00003D14 16                      	push	ss

 24467                                  TRANBUF:
 24468 00003D18 AC                      	LODSB

 24471 00003D1C 7503                    	JNZ	short NORMCH

 24558                                  ; 24/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24559                                  
 24560                                  ;Break	<DOS_WRITE -- MAIN WRITE ROUTINE AND DEVICE OUT ROUTINES>
 24561                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24562                                  ;
 24563                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_WRITE
 24564                                  ;
 24565                                  ; Inputs:
 24566                                  ;	ThisSFT set to the SFT for the file being used
 24567                                  ;	[DMAADD] contains transfer address
 24568                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes to write
 24569                                  ; Function:
 24570                                  ;	Perform write operation
 24571                                  ;	NOTE: If CX = 0 on input, file is truncated or grown
 24572                                  ;		to current sf_position
 24573                                  ; Outputs:
 24574                                  ;    Carry clear
 24575                                  ;	SFT Position and cluster pointers updated
 24576                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes written
 24577                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24578                                  ;    Carry set
 24579                                  ;	AX is error code
 24580                                  ;	CX = 0
 24581                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 24582                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed
 24583                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24584                                  
 24585                                  ;hkn; called from fcbio2.asm, handle.asm and dev.asm. DS is set up at this 
 24586                                  ;hkn; point to DOSDATA.
 24587                                  
 24588                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24589                                  ; DOSCODE:742Ch (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24590                                  
 24591                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24592                                  ; DOSCODE:7418h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24593                                  
 24594                                  ; 08/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24595                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:7D8Fh
 24596                                  
 24597                                  DOS_WRITE:
 24598 00003D82 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 24599                                  	;mov	al,[ES:DI+2]
 24600 00003D86 268A4502                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 24601                                  	;;and	al,0Fh
 24602                                  	;AND	AL,access_mask
 24603                                  	; 07/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 24604                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 & Win Me)
 24605 00003D8A 2403                    	and	al,3	; open_mode_mask ?
 24606                                  	;cmp	al,0
 24607 00003D8C 3C00                    	CMP	AL,open_for_read
 24608 00003D8E 7503                    	JNE	short Check_FCB_RO		 ;Is write or both
 24609                                  BadMode:
 24610 00003D90 E96404                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR
 24611                                  
 24612                                  ; NOTE: The following check for writting to a Read Only File is performed
 24613                                  ;	    ONLY on FCBs!!!!
 24614                                  ;	We ALLOW writes to Read Only files via handles to allow a CREATE
 24615                                  ;	    of a read only file which can then be written to.
 24616                                  ;	This is OK because we are NOT ALLOWED to OPEN a RO file via handles
 24617                                  ;	    for writting, or RE-CREATE an EXISTING RO file via handles. Thus,
 24618                                  ;	    CREATing a NEW RO file, or RE-CREATing an existing file which
 24619                                  ;	    is NOT RO to be RO, via handles are the only times we can write
 24620                                  ;	    to a read-only file.
 24621                                  
 24622                                  Check_FCB_RO:
 24623                                  	;;test	word [es:di+2],8000h
 24624                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],sf_isFCB
 24625                                  	;JZ	short WRITE_NO_MODE	; Not an FCB
 24626                                  	
 24627                                  	;test	byte [es:di+3],80h
 24628 00003D93 26F6450380              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],(sf_isFCB>>8)
 24629 00003D98 7407                    	JZ	short WRITE_NO_MODE	; Not an FCB
 24630                                  
 24631                                  	;test	byte [es:di+4],1
 24632 00003D9A 26F6450401              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr],attr_read_only
 24633 00003D9F 75EF                    	JNZ	short BadMode 		; Can't write to Read_Only files via FCB
 24634                                  WRITE_NO_MODE:
 24635 00003DA1 E81603                  	call	SETUP
 24636 00003DA4 E899DA                  	call	IsSFTNet
 24637 00003DA7 7406                    	JZ	short LOCAL_WRITE
 24638                                  
 24639                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 24640                                  ;	transfer NET_WRITE
 24641                                  ;ELSE
 24642                                  	;mov	ax,1109h
 24643 00003DA9 B80911                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|9
 24644 00003DAC CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - WRITE TO REMOTE FILE
 24645                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 24646                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 24647                                  			; CX = number of bytes, SS = DOS CS, SDA DTA field -> user buffer
 24648                                  			; Return: CF set on error, CX = bytes written
 24649 00003DAE C3                      	retn
 24650                                  ;ENDIF
 24651                                  
 24652                                  LOCAL_WRITE:
 24653                                  	;;test	word [es:di+5],80h
 24654                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device
 24655                                  	;jnz	short WRTDEV
 24656                                  
 24657                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],80h
 24658 00003DAF 26F6450580              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],devid_device ; Check for named device I/O
 24659 00003DB4 756D                    	jnz	short WRTDEV
 24660                                  
 24661                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2
 24662 00003DB6 C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 24663 00003DBB E82BDB                  	call	ECritDisk
 24664                                  
 24665 00003DBE E8A905                  	call	DISKWRITE
 24666                                  
 24667                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24668                                  
 24669                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24670                                  ; Extended Open
 24671 00003DC1 7210                    	JC	short nocommit
 24672                                  	
 24673 00003DC3 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 24674                                  	
 24675                                  	;;test	word [ES:DI+2],4000h
 24676                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AUTO_COMMIT_WRITE
 24677                                  	;JZ	short nocommit
 24678                                  	
 24679                                  	;test	byte [ES:DI+3],40h
 24680 00003DC7 26F6450340              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode+1],(AUTO_COMMIT_WRITE>>8)
 24681 00003DCC 7405                    	JZ	short nocommit
 24682                                  	
 24683 00003DCE 51                      	PUSH	CX
 24684 00003DCF E808FB                  	call	DOS_COMMIT
 24685 00003DD2 59                      	POP	CX
 24686                                  nocommit:
 24687                                  ; Extended Open
 24688                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 24689                                  	;retn
 24690                                  	; 18/12/2022
 24691 00003DD3 E940DB                  	jmp	LCritDisk

 24891                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24892                                  ;
 24893                                  ; Procedure Name : get_io_sft
 24894                                  ;
 24895                                  ;   Convert JFN number in BX to sf_entry in DS:SI We get the normal SFT if
 24896                                  ;   CONSWAP is FALSE or if the handle desired is 2 or more. Otherwise, we
 24897                                  ;   retrieve the sft from ConSFT which is set by SwapCon.
 24898                                  ;
 24899                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24900                                  
 24901                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24902                                  ; DOSCODE:7583h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24903                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24904                                  ; DOSCODE:756Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24905                                  
 24906                                  GET_IO_SFT:
 24907                                  	;test	byte [SS:CONSWAP],0FFh
 24908 00003ED4 36803E[5703]00          	cmp	byte [SS:CONSWAP],0			;smr;SS Override
 24909 00003EDA 7512                    	JNZ	short GetRedir
 24910                                  GetNormal:
 24911 00003EDC 16                      	push	ss
 24912 00003EDD 1F                      	pop	ds
 24913 00003EDE 06                      	PUSH	ES
 24914 00003EDF 57                      	PUSH	DI
 24915 00003EE0 E89035                  	call	SFFromHandle
 24916 00003EE3 7206                    	JC	short RET44P
 24917 00003EE5 8CC6                    	MOV	SI,ES
 24918 00003EE7 8EDE                    	MOV	DS,SI
 24919 00003EE9 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 24920                                  RET44P:
 24921 00003EEB 5F                      	POP	DI
 24922 00003EEC 07                      	POP	ES
 24923 00003EED C3                      	retn
 24924                                  GetRedir:
 24925 00003EEE 83FB01                  	CMP	BX,1
 24926 00003EF1 77E9                    	JA	short GetNormal
 24927 00003EF3 36C536[E605]            	LDS	SI,[SS:CONSFT]
 24928 00003EF8 F8                      	CLC
 24929                                  get_io_sft_retn:
 24930 00003EF9 C3                      	retn

 24932                                  ;Break	<DIRREAD -- READ A DIRECTORY SECTOR>
 24933                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24934                                  ;
 24935                                  ; Procedure Name : DIRREAD
 24936                                  ;
 24937                                  ; Inputs:
 24938                                  ;	AX = Directory block number (relative to first block of directory)
 24939                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 24940                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = First sector of first cluster of directory
 24941                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster
 24942                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 24943                                  ; Function:
 24944                                  ;	Read the directory block into [CURBUF].
 24945                                  ; Outputs:
 24946                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM] = Next cluster (after the one skipped to)
 24947                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] Set
 24948                                  ;	ES:BP unchanged
 24949                                  ;	[CURBUF] Points to Buffer with dir sector
 24950                                  ;	Carry set if error (user said FAIL to I 24)
 24951                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed.
 24952                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24953                                  
 24954                                  ;hkn; called from dir.asm. DS already set up to DOSDATA.
 24955                                  
 24956                                  ; 08/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 24957                                  
 24958                                  DIRREAD:
 24959                                  
 24960                                  ; Note that ClusFac is the sectors per cluster. This is NOT necessarily
 24961                                  ; the same as what is in the DPB! In the case of the root directory, we have
 24962                                  ; ClusFac = # sectors in the root directory. The root directory is detected
 24963                                  ; by DIRStart = 0.
 24964                                  
 24965 00003EFA 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 24966                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 24967 00003EFC 3916[E30A]              	cmp	[DIRSTART_HW],dx
 24968 00003F00 7509                    	jnz	short SubDir
 24969                                  	;CMP	word [DIRSTART],0
 24970                                  	; 21/09/2023
 24971 00003F02 3916[C205]              	cmp	[DIRSTART],dx ; 0
 24972 00003F06 7503                    	jnz	short SubDir
 24973 00003F08 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 24974 00003F09 EB0C                    	JMP	short DoRead
 24975                                  
 24976                                  ; Convert the sector number in AX into cluster and sector-within-cluster pair
 24977                                  
 24978                                  SubDir:
 24979 00003F0B 88C2                    	MOV	DL,AL
 24980                                  	;and	dl,[es:bp+4]
 24981 00003F0D 26225604                	AND	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 24982                                  
 24983                                  ;	(DX) = sector-in-cluster
 24984                                  
 24985                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 24986 00003F11 268A4E05                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 24987 00003F15 D3E8                    	SHR	AX,CL
 24988                                  
 24989                                  ;	(DX) = position in cluster
 24990                                  ;	(AX) = number of clusters to skip
 24991                                  
 24992                                  DoRead:
 24993 00003F17 8816[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],DL
 24994 00003F1B 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX
 24995 00003F1D 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 24996                                  
 24997                                  ;	(CX) = number of clusters to skip.
 24998                                  ;	(AH) = remainder
 24999                                  
 25000                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25001                                  
 25002                                  ; 08/02/2024
 25003                                  %if 0
 25004                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25005                                  	;MOV	DX,[DIRSEC+2]	     	  ;>32mb
 25006                                  	;MOV	[HIGH_SECTOR],DX	  ;>32mb
 25007                                  	;MOV	DX,[DIRSEC]
 25008                                  	;ADD	DL,AH
 25009                                  	;ADC	DH,0
 25010                                  	;ADC	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0	  ;>32mb
 25011                                  	; 21/09/2023
 25012                                  	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 25013                                  	mov	dx,[DIRSEC]
 25014                                  	add	dl,ah
 25015                                  	adc	dh,bl ; 0
 25016                                  	adc	bx,[DIRSEC+2]
 25017                                  	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],bx
 25018                                  
 25019                                  	MOV	BX,[CLUSNUM]
 25020                                  	MOV	[NXTCLUSNUM],BX
 25021                                  	JCXZ	FIRSTCLUSTER
 25022                                  %else
 25023                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 25024 00003F1F 8B1E[E50A]              	mov	bx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 25025 00003F23 891E[E70A]              	mov	[NXTCLUSNUM_HW],bx
 25026 00003F27 891E[EF0A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 25027 00003F2B 8B16[C005]              	mov	dx,[DIRSEC+2]
 25028 00003F2F 8916[0706]              	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],dx
 25029 00003F33 8B16[BE05]              	mov	dx,[DIRSEC]
 25030 00003F37 00E2                    	add	dl,ah
 25031 00003F39 80D600                  	adc	dh,0
 25032 00003F3C 8316[0706]00            	adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 25033 00003F41 8B1E[BC05]              	mov	bx,[CLUSNUM]
 25034 00003F45 891E[DC05]              	mov	[NXTCLUSNUM],bx
 25035 00003F49 E339                    	jcxz	FIRSTCLUSTER
 25036                                  %endif
 25037                                  
 25038                                  SKPCLLP:
 25039 00003F4B E8B623                  	call	UNPACK
 25040 00003F4E 72A9                    	jc	short get_io_sft_retn
 25041                                  	;;;
 25042                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 25043 00003F50 FF36[EF0A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 25044 00003F54 8F06[F90A]              	pop	word [CLUSTERS_HW]
 25045 00003F58 FF36[F30A]              	push	word [CCONTENT_HW]

 25064 00003F81 E83A1A                  	call	FIGREC

 25066                                  	;entry	FIRSTCLUSTER
 25067                                  
 25068                                  FIRSTCLUSTER:
 25069                                  	; 22/09/2023
 25070                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h

 25072                                  	;XOR	AL,AL ; *	; Indicate pre-read

 25079                                  	;entry	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 25080                                  
 25081                                  SET_BUF_AS_DIR:
 25082                                  
 25083                                  ;	Set the type of CURBUF to be a directory sector.
 25084                                  ;	Only flags are modified.
 25085                                  
 25086 00003F89 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 25087 00003F8A 56                      	PUSH	SI
 25088 00003F8B C536[E205]              	LDS	SI,[CURBUF]

 25090 00003F8F 804C0504                	OR	byte [SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR	; Clears carry

 25093                                  dirread_retn:

 25096                                  ;Break	<FATSECRD -- READ A FAT SECTOR>
 25097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25098                                  ;
 25099                                  ; Procedure Name : FATSECRD
 25100                                  ; Inputs:
 25101                                  ;	Same as DREAD
 25102                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25103                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25104                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number
 25105                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25106                                  ; Function:
 25107                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform FAT read.
 25108                                  ; Outputs:
 25109                                  ;	Same as DREAD
 25110                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25111                                  
 25112                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25113                                  	; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25114                                  
 25115                                  	; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25116                                  
 25117                                  FATSECRD:
 25118                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25119                                  	;mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],18h
 25120 00003F96 36C606[4B03]18          	MOV	byte [SS:ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL
 25121 00003F9C 89CF                    	MOV	DI,CX
 25122                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+8]
 25123 00003F9E 268A4E08                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_COUNT]
 25124                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 25125                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0Fh]
 25126                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_SIZE]
 25127                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 25128                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25129                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+0Fh]
 25130 00003FA2 268B460F                	MOV	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_SIZE] ;>32mb
 25131 00003FA6 30ED                    	XOR	CH,CH
 25132                                  	;;;
 25133                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25134 00003FA8 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 25135 00003FAA 7509                    	jnz	short FATSECRD_cont	; not FAT32
 25136                                  	;test	byte [es:bp+23h],80h
 25137 00003FAC 26F6462380              	test	byte [es:bp+DPB.EXT_FLAGS],80h ; (FAT32 bs extd flags bit 7)
 25138 00003FB1 7402                    	jz      short FATSECRD_cont
 25139                                  	;mov	cx,1           		; only one FAT is active
 25140 00003FB3 B101                    	mov	cl,1
 25141                                  FATSECRD_cont:
 25142 00003FB5 36FF36[0706]            	push	word [ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 25143                                  	;;;
 25144 00003FBA 52                      	PUSH	DX
 25145                                  NXTFAT:
 25146                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25147                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25148                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1)
 25149                                  	;MOV	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR],0	;>32mb FAT sectors cannot exceed
 25150 00003FBB 51                      	PUSH	CX			;32mb
 25151 00003FBC 50                      	PUSH	AX
 25152                                  	;;;
 25153                                  	; 08/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25154 00003FBD 36FF36[0706]            	push	word [ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 25155 00003FC2 52                      	push	dx
 25156                                  	;;;
 25157 00003FC3 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 25158 00003FC5 E88600                  	call	DSKREAD
 25159                                  	;;;
 25160                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25161 00003FC8 5A                      	pop	dx
 25162 00003FC9 368F06[0706]            	pop	word [ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 25163                                  	;;;
 25164 00003FCE 58                      	POP	AX

 25200                                  ; Procedure Name : DREAD
 25201                                  ;
 25202                                  ; Inputs:
 25203                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25204                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25205                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	      (LOW)
 25206                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25207                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters

 25290 0000402B E8CE40                  	call	LOCK_CHECK		;check lock

 25293 00004031 E87301                  	call	WRITE_LOCK_VIOLATION	;issue I24
 25294 00004034 73ED                    	JNC	short write_cont	;retry
 25295                                  WRITE_OK:				;
 25296 00004036 C3                      	retn				;

 25345                                  ;	TITLE	DISK2 - Disk utility routines
 25346                                  ;	NAME	Disk2
 25347                                  
 25348                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs
 25349                                  ;
 25350                                  ;	DskRead
 25351                                  ;	DWRITE
 25352                                  ;	DSKWRITE
 25353                                  ;	HarderrRW
 25354                                  ;	SETUP
 25355                                  ;	BREAKDOWN
 25356                                  ;	READ_LOCK_VIOLATION

 25359                                  ;	SET_ACC_ERR_DS

 25364                                  ;
 25365                                  ;	Revision history:
 25366                                  ;
 25367                                  ;		AN000 version 4.00 Jan. 1988
 25368                                  ;		M039 DB 10/17/90 - Disk read/write optimization
 25369                                  
 25370                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25371                                  ; DOSCODE:7699h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25372                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25373                                  ; DOSCODE:7685h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25374                                  
 25375                                  ;Break	<DSKREAD -- PHYSICAL DISK READ>
 25376                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25377                                  ;
 25378                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKREAD
 25379                                  ;
 25380                                  ; Inputs:
 25381                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25382                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25383                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25384                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25385                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25386                                  ; Function:
 25387                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25388                                  ; Outputs:
 25389                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25390                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25391                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25392                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25393                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25394                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25395                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25396                                  
 25397                                  DSKREAD:
 25398 0000404E 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25399                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25400 0000404F 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25401                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25402 00004053 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25403 00004057 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25404 00004058 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25405 00004059 E8E212                  	call	SETREAD
 25406 0000405C EB22                    	JMP	short DODSKOP
 25407                                  
 25408                                  ;Break	<DWRITE -- SEE ABOUT WRITING>
 25409                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25410                                  ;
 25411                                  ; Procedure Name : DWRITE
 25412                                  ;
 25413                                  ; Inputs:
 25414                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25415                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25416                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25417                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25418                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25419                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case HARDERR called
 25420                                  ; Function:
 25421                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk write. If BIOS reports
 25422                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 25423                                  ; Output:
 25424                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently, user FAILed to I 24)
 25425                                  ; BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 25426                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25427                                  
 25428                                  	;entry	DWRITE
 25429                                  DWRITE:
 25430 0000405E E81100                  	CALL	DSKWRITE
 25431 00004061 74EA                    	jz	short dw_ret_label	; Carry clear (retz)
 25432                                  
 25433                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25434 00004063 36C606[7505]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:READOP],1	; Write
 25435 00004069 E83500                  	call	HARDERRRW
 25436 0000406C 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1			; Check for retry
 25437 0000406E 74EE                    	JZ	short DWRITE
 25438                                  
 25439                                  ; 09/02/2024
 25440                                  %if 0
 25441                                  	CMP	AL,3			; Check for FAIL
 25442                                  	CLC
 25443                                  	JNZ	short NO_CAR2 		; Ignore
 25444                                  	STC
 25445                                  NO_CAR2:
 25446                                  dw_ret_label:
 25447                                  	retn

 25449                                  	; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 25450 00004070 EB99                    	jmp	short fail_ignore
 25451                                  %endif

 25453                                  ;Break	<DSKWRITE -- PHYSICAL DISK WRITE>
 25454                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25455                                  ;
 25456                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKWRITE
 25457                                  ;
 25458                                  ; Inputs:
 25459                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25460                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25461                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25462                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25463                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25464                                  ; Function:
 25465                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25466                                  ; Outputs:
 25467                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25468                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25469                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25470                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25471                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25472                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25473                                  ;
 25474                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25475                                  
 25476                                  	;entry	DSKWRITE
 25477                                  DSKWRITE:
 25478 00004072 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25479                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25480 00004073 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25481                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25482 00004077 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25483 0000407B 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25484 0000407C 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25485 0000407D E8F112                  	call	SETWRITE
 25486                                  DODSKOP:
 25487 00004080 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS		; Save DS
 25488 00004082 1F                      	POP	DS		; DS:BP points to DPB
 25489 00004083 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 25490                                  
 25491                                  	;lds	si,[ds:bp+13h] ; 04/05/2019

 25493 00004088 E83212                  	call	DEVIOCALL2
 25494                                  
 25495 0000408B 8ED9                    	MOV	DS,CX		; Restore DS
 25496 0000408D 07                      	POP	ES		; Restore ES
 25497 0000408E 5B                      	POP	BX
 25498                                  
 25499                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25500 0000408F 368B0E[6C03]            	MOV	CX,[SS:CALLSCNT] ; Number of sectors transferred
 25501 00004094 5F                      	POP	DI
 25502 00004095 29F9                    	SUB	CX,DI
 25503 00004097 F7D9                    	NEG	CX		; Number of sectors not transferred
 25504                                  
 25505                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25506 00004099 36A1[5D03]              	MOV	AX,[SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 25507                                  	;test	ax,8000h
 25508                                  	; 17/12/2022
 25509                                  	;test	ah,80h
 25510 0000409D F6C480                  	test	ah,(STERR>>8)
 25511                                  	;test	AX,STERR
 25512 000040A0 C3                      	retn
 25513                                  
 25514                                  ;Break	<HardErrRW - map extended errors and call harderr>
 25515                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25516                                  ;
 25517                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErrRW
 25518                                  ;
 25519                                  ; Inputs:
 25520                                  ;	AX is error code from read or write
 25521                                  ;	Other registers set as per HARDERR
 25522                                  ; Function:
 25523                                  ;	Checks the error code for special extended
 25524                                  ;	errors and maps them if needed. Then invokes
 25525                                  ;	Harderr
 25526                                  ; Outputs:
 25527                                  ;	Of HARDERR
 25528                                  ; AX may be modified prior to call to HARDERR.
 25529                                  ; No other registers altered.
 25530                                  ;
 25531                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25532

 25534                                  HARDERRRW:

 25536 000040A1 3C0F                    	CMP	AL,error_I24_wrong_disk
 25537 000040A3 7512                    	JNZ	short DO_ERR			; Nothing to do
 25538

 25540                                  	;push	ds

 25551 000040AA 36A3[2803]              	mov	[ss:EXTERRPT],ax		; set ext err ptr lo

 25566                                  
 25567                                  ;Break	<SETUP -- SETUP A DISK READ OR WRITE FROM USER>
 25568                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25569                                  ;
 25570                                  ; Procedure Name : SETUP
 25571                                  ;
 25572                                  ; Inputs:
 25573                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT (value also in THISSFT)
 25574                                  ;	DMAAdd contains transfer address
 25575                                  ;	CX = Byte count
 25576                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25577                                  ;   WARNING Stack must be clean, two ret addrs on stack, 1st of caller,
 25578                                  ;		2nd of caller of caller.
 25579                                  ; Outputs:
 25580                                  ;	    CX = byte count
 25581                                  ;	    [THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters if file
 25582                                  ;		      = Pointer to device header if device or NET
 25583                                  ;	    ES:DI Points to SFT
 25584                                  ;	    [NEXTADD] = Displacement of disk transfer within segment
 25585                                  ;	    [TRANS] = 0 (No transfers yet)
 25586                                  ;	    BytPos = Byte position in file
 25587                                  ;
 25588                                  ;	The following fields are relevant to local files (not devices) only:
 25589                                  ;
 25590                                  ;	    SecPos = Position of first sector (local files only)
 25591                                  ;	    [BYTSECPOS] = Byte position in first sector (local files only)
 25592                                  ;	    [CLUSNUM] = First cluster (local files only)
 25593                                  ;	    [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector within first cluster (local files only)
 25594                                  ;	    [THISDRV] = Physical unit number (local files only)
 25595                                  ;
 25596                                  ;      RETURNS ONE LEVEL UP WITH:
 25597                                  ;	   CX = 0
 25598                                  ;	   CARRY = Clear
 25599                                  ;	IF AN ERROR IS DETECTED
 25600                                  ; All other registers destroyed
 25601                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25602                                  
 25603                                  ;hkn; called from disk.asm. DS has been set up to DOSDATA.
 25604                                  
 25605                                  ; DOSCODE:770Bh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25606                                  
 25607                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25608                                  ; DOSCODE:76F7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25609                                  
 25610                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 25611                                  ; DOSCODE:80D8h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 25612                                  
 25613                                  SETUP:
 25614                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 411Bh
 25615                                  
 25616                                  	;lds 	si,[es:di+7]
 25617 000040BA 26C57507                	LDS	SI,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr]
 25618                                  
 25619                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25620 000040BE 368C1E[8C05]            	MOV	[SS:THISDPB+2],DS
 25621                                  
 25622                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 25623 000040C3 16                      	push	ss
 25624 000040C4 1F                      	pop	ds
 25625                                  
 25626 000040C5 8936[8A05]              	MOV	[THISDPB],SI
 25627                                  
 25628 000040C9 8B1E[2C03]              	MOV	BX,[DMAADD]
 25629 000040CD 891E[B805]              	MOV	[NEXTADD],BX		;Set NEXTADD to start of Xaddr
 25630 000040D1 C606[7405]00            	MOV	BYTE [TRANS],0		;No transferes
 25631                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+15h]
 25632 000040D6 268B4515                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position]
 25633                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+17h]
 25634 000040DA 268B5517                	MOV	DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position+2]
 25635 000040DE 8916[D005]              	MOV	[BYTPOS+2],DX		;Set it
 25636 000040E2 A3[CE05]                	MOV	[BYTPOS],AX
 25637                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],8080h
 25638 000040E5 26F745058080            	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet+devid_device
 25639 000040EB 7555                    	JNZ	short NOSETSTUFF	;Following not done on devs or NET
 25640 000040ED 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25641 000040EE C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		;Point at the DPB
 25642                                  
 25643                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25644                                  	;;mov	bl,[es:bp+0]
 25645                                  	;MOV	BL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 25646                                  	; 05/12/2022
 25647 000040F2 268A5E00                	mov	bl,[es:bp]
 25648                                  	
 25649 000040F6 881E[7605]              	MOV	[THISDRV],BL		;Set THISDRV
 25650                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 25651 000040FA 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 25652                                  
 25653                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3
 25654                                  	;cmp	dx,bx
 25655                                  	;jnb	short EOFERR
 25656                                  	;div	bx
 25657                                  	;mov	[SECPOS],ax
 25658                                  	;mov	[BYTSECPOS],dx
 25659                                  	;mov	dx,ax
 25660                                  	;;and	al,[es:bp+4]
 25661                                  	;AND	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 25662                                  	;mov	[SECCLUSPOS],al
 25663                                  	;mov	ax,cx
 25664                                  	;;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 25665                                  	;MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 25666                                  	;shr	dx,cl
 25667                                  	;mov	[CLUSNUM],dx
 25668                                  	;pop	es
 25669                                  	;mov	cx,ax
 25670                                  
 25671                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25672                                  
 25673                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25674                                  ;M039: Optimized this section.
 25675 000040FE 51                              PUSH    CX			;SHR32 and DIV32 use CX.

 25748                                  ;Break	<BREAKDOWN -- CUT A USER READ OR WRITE INTO PIECES>
 25749                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25750                                  ;
 25751                                  ; Procedure Name : BREAKDOWN
 25752                                  ;
 25753                                  ; Inputs:
 25754                                  ;	CX = Length of disk transfer in bytes
 25755                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25756                                  ;	[BYTSECPOS] = Byte position within first sector
 25757                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25758                                  ; Outputs:
 25759                                  ;	[BYTCNT1] = Bytes to transfer in first sector
 25760                                  ;	[SECCNT] = No. of whole sectors to transfer
 25761                                  ;	[BYTCNT2] = Bytes to transfer in last sector
 25762                                  ; AX, BX, DX destroyed. No other registers affected.
 25763                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25764                                  
 25765                                  BREAKDOWN:
 25766 0000415D A1[CC05]                	MOV	AX,[BYTSECPOS]
 25767 00004160 89CB                    	MOV	BX,CX
 25768 00004162 09C0                    	OR	AX,AX
 25769 00004164 740E                    	JZ	short SAVFIR	; Partial first sector?
 25770                                  	;sub	ax,[es:bp+2]
 25771 00004166 262B4602                	SUB	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 25772 0000416A F7D8                    	NEG	AX		; Max number of bytes left in first sector
 25773 0000416C 29C3                    	SUB	BX,AX		; Subtract from total length
 25774 0000416E 7304                    	JAE	short SAVFIR
 25775 00004170 01D8                    	ADD	AX,BX		; Don't use all of the rest of the sector
 25776 00004172 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX		; And no bytes are left
 25777                                  SAVFIR:

 25779 00004177 89D8                    	MOV	AX,BX
 25780 00004179 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX

 25782 0000417B 26F77602                	DIV	word [ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; How many whole sectors?
 25783 0000417F A3[D605]                	MOV	[SECCNT],AX
 25784 00004182 8916[D405]              	MOV	[BYTCNT2],DX	; Bytes remaining for last sector
 25785                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 25786                                  	;OR	DX,[BYTCNT1]	; SMR ONESECTORFIX BUGBUG

 25792                                  	;MOV	[SECCNT],DX	; DX = 0
 25793                                  _RET45:
 25794 00004186 C3                      	retn

 26329                                  ;Break   <DskRdBufScan -- Disk Read Buffer Scan>
 26330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26331                                  ;
 26332                                  ; Procedure Name : DskRdBufScan
 26333                                  ;
 26334                                  ; Inputs:
 26335                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors read. (These constitute a block of
 26336                                  ;            sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 26337                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 26338                                  ;       [TEMP_VAR2]:[TEMP_VAR] = Transfer address (destination data address).
 26339                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 26340                                  ;
 26341                                  ; Function:
 26342                                  ;	The Buffer Queue is scanned: the contents of any dirty buffers are
 26343                                  ;	"read" into the transfer memory block, so that the transfer memory
 26344                                  ;	reflects the most recent data.
 26345                                  ;
 26346                                  ; Outputs:
 26347                                  ;       Transfer memory updated as required.
 26348                                  ;
 26349                                  ; Uses:
 26350                                  ;       DS,AX,BX,CX,SI,DI destroyed.
 26351                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 26352                                  ;
 26353                                  ; Notes:
 26354                                  ;       FIRST_BUFF_ADDR is set-up to contain the LAST buffer to check, rather
 26355                                  ;	than the FIRST.
 26356                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26357                                  ;M039: Created
 26358                                  
 26359                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26360                                  ; DOSCODE:78F0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26361                                  
 26362                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26363                                  ; DOSCODE:78DCh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26364                                  
 26365                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 26366                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8313h
 26367                                  
 26368                                  ;procedure DskRdBufScan,NEAR
 26369                                  ;
 26370                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 26371                                  
 26372                                  DskRdBufScan:
 26373 000042E0 36833E[7100]00          	cmp	word [ss:DirtyBufferCount],0 ; Any dirty buffers?
 26374 000042E6 743C                    	je	short bufx		     ; -no, skip all work.
 26375                                  
 26376 000042E8 368B1E[0706]            	mov     bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 26377 000042ED 89DE                    	mov     si,bx
 26378 000042EF 01D1                    	add     cx,dx
 26379 000042F1 83D600                  	adc     si,0
 26380                                  
 26381 000042F4 E8D423                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> 1st buf in queue.
 26382                                  	;mov	ax,[di+2]
 26383 000042F7 8B4502                  	mov     ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]
 26384 000042FA 36A3[A712]              	mov     [ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],ax
 26385                                  		
 26386                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26387                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 26388                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 26389                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26390 000042FE 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 26391                                  
 26392                                  ;       BX:DX = Extent start.
 26393                                  ;       SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 26394                                  ;          AL = Drive #.
 26395                                  ;       DS:DI-> 1st buffer in queue.
 26396                                  ;[FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] = Address offset of last buffer in queue.
 26397                                  
 26398                                  bufq:	
 26399                                  	;cmp	al,[di+4]
 26400 00004302 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 26401 00004305 7514                    	jne	short bufq1        	;  -no, jump.
 26402                                  
 26403                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26404                                  ;       ja	short bufq1		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 26405                                  
 26406                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 26407 00004307 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26408 0000430A 7503                    	jne	short bufq01
 26409                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 26410 0000430C 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26411                                  bufq01:
 26412 0000430F 770A                    	ja	short bufq1
 26413                                  
 26414                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26415                                  ;       ja	short bufq2		;Jump if Extent end >= buffer sector.
 26416                                  
 26417                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 26418 00004311 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26419 00004314 7503                    	jne	short bufq02
 26420                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 26421 00004316 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26422                                  bufq02:
 26423 00004319 770A                    	ja	short bufq2
 26424                                  bufq1:	
 26425 0000431B 363B3E[A712]            	cmp     di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 26426 00004320 8B3D                    	mov	di,[di]
 26427                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next] ; Set-up for next buffer.
 26428 00004322 75DE                    	jne	short bufq		; -no, do next buffer
 26429                                  bufx:
 26430 00004324 C3                      	retn				;Exit.
 26431                                  
 26432                                  ;       Buffer's sector is in Extent: if it is dirty, copy its contents to
 26433                                  ;	transfer memory; otherwise, just re-position it in the buffer queue
 26434                                  ;       as MRU (Most Recently Used).
 26435                                  
 26436                                  bufq2:	
 26437 00004325 50                      	push	ax
 26438                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 26439 00004326 F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 26440 0000432A 7430                    	jz	short bufq3                    ; -no, jump.
 26441                                  
 26442                                  ;       SaveReg <cx,dx,si,di,es>
 26443 0000432C 51                      	push	cx
 26444 0000432D 52                      	push	dx
 26445 0000432E 56                      	push	si
 26446 0000432F 57                      	push	di
 26447 00004330 06                      	push	es
 26448                                  
 26449 00004331 89D0                    	mov     ax,dx
 26450                                  	;sub	ax,[di+6]
 26451 00004333 2B4506                  	sub	ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26452 00004336 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 26453                                  
 26454                                  ;       AX = offset (in sectors) of buffer sector within Transfer memory
 26455                                  ;            block. (Note: the upper word of the sector # may be ignored
 26456                                  ;	     since no more than 64k bytes will ever be read. This 64k limit
 26457                                  ;            is imposed by the input parameters of the disk read operation.)
 26458                                  
 26459                                  	;lea	si,[di+20]
 26460 00004338 8D7518                  	lea	si,[di+BUFINSIZ]	;DS:SI -> buffer data.
 26461                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 26462 0000433B 268B4E02                	mov     cx,[es:bp+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ;CX = sector size (in bytes).
 26463 0000433F F7E1                    	mul     cx			;AX = offset (in bytes) of buf. sector
 26464                                  	;mov	di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 26465                                  	; 09/02/2024
 26466 00004341 36C43E[0C06]            	les	di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 26467 00004346 01C7                    	add	di,ax
 26468                                  	;mov	es,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]
 26469 00004348 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 26470                                  
 26471                                  ;	   CX = sector size (in WORDs) ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 26472                                  ;       DS:SI-> Buffer sector data.
 26473                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 26474                                  
 26475                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 26476                                  %if 0
 26477                                  	rep	movsw			;Copy buffer sector to Transfer memory
 26478                                  	;; 04/05/2019
 26479                                  	;;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 26480                                  	;;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 26481                                  	;jnc	short bufq03	
 26482                                  	;movsb
 26483                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26484                                  	;adc	cx,0
 26485                                  	;rep	movsb
 26486                                  	; 22/09/2023
 26487                                  	jnc	short bufq03
 26488                                  	movsb
 26489                                  %else
 26490                                  	;;;
 26491                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 26492 0000434A 36803E[6A00]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0
 26493 00004350 7403                    	jz	short bufq03+1 ; rep movsw (skip 32 bit prefix)
 26494 00004352 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 26495                                  bufq03:
 26496 00004354 F366A5                  	rep	movsd
 26497                                  	;;;
 26498                                  %endif
 26499                                  
 26500                                  ;bufq03:	; 09/02/2024
 26501                                  	;RestoreReg <es,di,si,dx,cx>
 26502 00004357 07                      	pop	es
 26503 00004358 5F                      	pop	di
 26504 00004359 5E                      	pop	si
 26505 0000435A 5A                      	pop	dx
 26506 0000435B 59                      	pop	cx
 26507                                  
 26508                                  ;       DS:DI -> current buffer.
 26509                                  bufq3:	
 26510 0000435C 89F8                    	mov     ax,di			;DS:AX -> Current buffer.
 26511                                          ;invoke SCANPLACE
 26512 0000435E E87C23                  	call	SCANPLACE
 26513 00004361 363B06[A712]            	cmp	ax,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] ;Last buffer?
 26514 00004366 58                      	pop	ax
 26515                                  	;jne	short bufq		; -no, jump.
 26516                                  	;;jmp	short bufx		; -yes, exit.
 26517                                  	;; 12/06/2019
 26518                                  	;retn
 26519                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compability)
 26520 00004367 7599                    	jne	short bufq
 26521                                  	;jmp	short bufx
 26522                                  	; 09/02/2024
 26523 00004369 C3                      	retn	; Exit
 26524                                  
 26525                                  ;EndProc DskRdBufScan
