 26533                                  ;Break   <DISKWRITE -- PERFORM USER DISK WRITE>
 26534                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26535                                  ;
 26536                                  ; Procedure Name : DISKWRITE
 26537                                  ;
 26538                                  ; Inputs:
 26539                                  ;       Outputs of SETUP
 26540                                  ; Function:
 26541                                  ;       Perform disk write
 26542                                  ; Outputs:
 26543                                  ;    Carry clear
 26544                                  ;       CX = No. of bytes written
 26545                                  ;       ES:DI point to SFT
 26546                                  ;       SFT offset and cluster pointers updated
 26547                                  ;    Carry set
 26548                                  ;       CX = 0
 26549                                  ;       ES:DI point to SFT
 26550                                  ;       AX has error code
 26551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26552                                  
 26553                                  ;hkn; called by DOS_WRITE. DS already set up at this point.
 26554                                  
 26555                                  ; DOSCODE:797Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26556                                  
 26557                                  ; 20/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26558                                  ; DOSCODE:7966h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26559                                  
 26560                                  ; 10/02/2024
 26561                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0

 26563

 26565                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:797Ah)
 26566                                  
 26567                                  DISKWRITE:
 26568                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 26569                                  	; IBMDOS.COM - Offset 436Dh
 26570                                  	;;test	byte [es:di+4],8
 26571                                  	;TEST	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_attr],attr_volume_id
 26572                                  	;jz	short write_cont
 26573                                  	;jmp	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 26574                                  ;write_cont:
 26575                                  	;push	cx
 26576                                  	;or	cx,cx
 26577                                  	;jnz	short Not_Truncate
 26578                                  	;;mov	cx,-1
 26579                                  	;dec	cx
 26580                                  ;Not_Truncate:
 26581                                  	;call	LOCK_CHECK
 26582                                  	;pop	cx
 26583                                  	;jnb	short _WRITE_OK
 26584                                  	;call	WRITE_LOCK_VIOLATION
 26585                                  	;jnb	short DISKWRITE
 26586                                  	;retn
 26587                                  
 26588                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26589 0000436A E8ACFC                  	call	CHECK_WRITE_LOCK	;IFS. check write lock	;AN000;
 26590                                  	; 19/08/2018
 26591 0000436D 7304                    	JNC	short _WRITE_OK		;IFS. lock check ok	;AN000;
 26592 0000436F C3                      	retn
 26593                                  
 26594                                  WRTEOFJ:
 26595 00004370 E95902                  	JMP     WRTEOF
 26596                                  
 26597                                  _WRITE_OK:
 26598                                   	; 27/07/2018
 26599                                  	; IBMDOS.COM - Offset 438Eh
 26600                                  	
 26601                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 26602                                  	;and	word [es:di+5],0BFBFh
 26603 00004373 26816505BFBF            	AND     word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],~(sf_close_nodate|devid_file_clean)
 26604                                  				; Mark file as dirty, clear no date on close
 26605                                  ; 10/02/2024
 26606                                  %if 0
 26607                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26608                                  
 26609                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26610                                  	;mov 	ax,[es:di+11h]
 26611                                  	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size]		;M039
 26612                                          MOV	[TEMP_VAR],AX                           ;M039
 26613                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+13h]
 26614                                  	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_size+2]		;M039
 26615                                          MOV	[TEMP_VAR2],AX                          ;M039
 26616                                  %else
 26617                                  	; 10/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS COM)
 26618                                  	;les	ax,[es:di+11h]
 26619 00004379 26C44511                	les	ax,[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_size]
 26620 0000437D 8C06[0E06]              	mov	[TEMP_VAR2],es
 26621 00004381 A3[0C06]                	mov	[TEMP_VAR],ax
 26622                                  %endif
 26623                                  
 26624                                  ;	TEMP_VAR2:TEMP_VAR = Current file size (sf_size);M039
 26625                                  
 26626                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 26627 00004384 C42E[8A05]              	LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 26628                                  
 26629 00004388 E8D2FD                  	call	BREAKDOWN
 26630                                  
 26631 0000438B A1[CE05]                	MOV     AX,[BYTPOS]
 26632 0000438E 8B16[D005]              	MOV     DX,[BYTPOS+2]
 26633 00004392 E3DC                    	JCXZ    WRTEOFJ                 ;Make the file length = sf_position
 26634 00004394 01C8                    	ADD     AX,CX
 26635 00004396 83D200                  	ADC     DX,0                    ;DX:AX = last byte to write + 1.
 26636                                  	
 26637                                  	;;;
 26638                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 26639 00004399 7303                    	jnc	short dskwrt_1

 27520                                  
 27521                                  ;Break   <DskWrtBufPurge -- Disk Write Buffer Purge>
 27522                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27523                                  ;
 27524                                  ; Procedure Name : DskWrtBufPurge
 27525                                  ;
 27526                                  ; Inputs:
 27527                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors to write. (These constitute a block of
 27528                                  ;	     sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 27529                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 27530                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 27531                                  ;
 27532                                  ; Function:
 27533                                  ;       Purge the Buffer Queue and the Secondary Cache of any buffers which
 27534                                  ;	are in Extent; they are being over-written.
 27535                                  ;
 27536                                  ; Outputs:
 27537                                  ;       (Same as Input.)
 27538                                  ; Uses:
 27539                                  ;       All registers except DS,AX,SI,DI preserved.
 27540                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 27541                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27542                                  ;M039: Created
 27543                                  
 27544                                  ;procedure   DskWrtBufPurge,NEAR
 27545                                  ;
 27546                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 27547                                  
 27548                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27549                                  ; DOSCODE:7C0Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27550                                  
 27551                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27552                                  ; DOSCODE:7BD4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27553                                  
 27554                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27555                                  ; DOSCODE:8714h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 27556                                  
 27557                                  ; NOTE: Secondary (Buffer) Cache is not used in PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 27558                                  
 27559                                  ; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:BB93h)
 27560                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS - DOSCODE:7C0Eh)
 27561                                  
 27562                                  DskWrtBufPurge:
 27563                                  	;SaveReg <bx,cx>
 27564 000046D0 53                      	push	bx
 27565 000046D1 51                      	push	cx
 27566                                  
 27567 000046D2 368B1E[0706]            	mov	bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	;BX:DX = Extent start (sector #).
 27568 000046D7 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 27569 000046D9 01D1                    	add	cx,dx
 27570 000046DB 83D600                  	adc	si,0                    ;SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27571                                  
 27572                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27573                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 27574                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 27575                                  	; 15/12/2022
 27576 000046DE 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 27577                                  
 27578                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 27579                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 27580                                  %if 0
 27581                                  
 27582                                  ;	BX:DX = Extent start.
 27583                                  ;	SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27584                                  ;	AL = Drive #
 27585                                  
 27586                                  	cmp	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0 ;Secondary cache in-use?
 27587                                  	je	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27588                                  
 27589                                  ;	If any of the sectors to be written are in the secondary cache (SC),
 27590                                  ;	invalidate the entire SC. (This is an optimization; we really only
 27591                                  ;	need to invalidate those sectors which intersect, but that's slower.)
 27592                                  
 27593                                  	cmp	al,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	;Same drive?
 27594                                  	jne	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27595                                  
 27596                                  	push    ax
 27597                                  	mov     ax,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]
 27598                                  	mov     di,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]	;DI:AX = SC start.
 27599                                  
 27600                                  	;Cmp32	si,cx,di,ax		;Extent end < SC start?
 27601                                  	;jbe	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27602                                  
 27603                                  	cmp	si,di
 27604                                  	jne	short sc01
 27605                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 27606                                  sc01: 
 27607                                  	jbe	short sc5
 27608                                  
 27609                                  	add	ax,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]
 27610                                  	adc	di,0                    ;DI:AX = SC end + 1.
 27611                                  	
 27612                                  	;Cmp32	bx,dx,di,ax             ;Extent start > SC end?
 27613                                  	;jae	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27614                                  
 27615                                  	cmp	bx,di
 27616                                  	jne	short sc02
 27617                                  	cmp	dx,ax
 27618                                  sc02:
 27619                                  	jnb	short sc5
 27620                                  
 27621                                  	mov	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	;Extent intersects SC: invalidate SC.
 27622                                  sc5:	
 27623                                  	pop     ax
 27624                                  
 27625                                  %endif
 27626                                  
 27627                                  ;	Free any buffered sectors which are in Extent; they are being over-
 27628                                  ;	written.
 27629                                  
 27630                                  nosc:	
 27631 000046E2 E8E61F                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> first buffer in queue.
 27632                                  
 27633                                  _bufq:	
 27634                                  	;cmpo	al,[di+4]
 27635 000046E5 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 27636 000046E8 7527                    	jne	short bufq5		; -no, jump.
 27637                                  
 27638                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27639                                  ;       ja	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 27640                                  
 27641                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 27642 000046EA 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27643 000046ED 7503                    	jne	short bufq04
 27644                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 27645 000046EF 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27646                                  bufq04:
 27647 000046F2 771D                    	ja	short bufq5
 27648                                  
 27649                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27650                                  ;       jbe	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent end < buffer sector.
 27651                                  
 27652                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 27653 000046F4 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27654 000046F7 7503                    	jne	short bufq05
 27655                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 27656 000046F9 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27657                                  bufq05:
 27658 000046FC 7613                    	jbe	short bufq5
 27659                                  
 27660                                  ;	Buffer's sector is in Extent, so free it; it is being over-written.
 27661                                  
 27662                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 27663 000046FE F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 27664 00004702 7403                    	jz	short bufq4		; -no, jump.
 27665 00004704 E85122                  	call	DEC_DIRTY_COUNT		; -yes, decrement dirty count.
 27666                                  bufq4:
 27667                                  	;mov	word [di+4],20FFh
 27668 00004707 C74504FF20              	mov     word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID],((buf_visit<<8)|0FFh)
 27669                                  
 27670 0000470C E8CE1F                  	call	SCANPLACE
 27671 0000470F EB02                    	jmp     short bufq6
 27672                                  bufq5: 
 27673 00004711 8B3D                    	mov     di,[di]
 27674                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next]
 27675                                  bufq6: 
 27676 00004713 363B3E[A712]            	cmp	di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 27677 00004718 75CB                    	jne	short _bufq		; --no, go do next buffer.
 27678                                  	
 27679                                  	;RestoreReg <cx,bx>
 27680 0000471A 59                      	pop	cx
 27681 0000471B 5B                      	pop	bx
 27682 0000471C C3                      	retn
 27683                                  
 27684                                  ;EndProc DskWrtBufPurge
 27685                                  
 27686                                  ;Break   <DIV32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT DIVIDE>
 27687                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27688                                  ;
 27689                                  ; Procedure Name : DIV32
 27690                                  ;
 27691                                  ; Inputs:
 27692                                  ;       DX:AX = 32 bit dividend   BX= divisor
 27693                                  ; Function:
 27694                                  ;       Perform 32 bit division:  DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem.)
 27695                                  ; Outputs:
 27696                                  ;       CX:AX = quotient , DX= remainder
 27697                                  ; Uses:
 27698                                  ;       All registers except AX,CX,DX preserved.
 27699                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27700                                  ;M039: DIV32 optimized for divisor of 512 (common sector size).
 27701                                  
 27702                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27703                                  ; DOSCODE:7C94h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27704                                  
 27705                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27706                                  ; DOSCODE:7C5Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27707                                  
 27708                                  DIV32:
 27709 0000471D 81FB0002                	cmp	bx,512
 27710 00004721 7515                    	jne	short div5
 27711                                  
 27712 00004723 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 27713 00004725 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax           ; CX:AX = Dividend
 27714 00004727 81E2FF01                	and	dx,(512-1)      ; DX = Remainder
 27715 0000472B 88E0                    	mov	al,ah
 27716 0000472D 88CC                    	mov	ah,cl
 27717 0000472F 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 27718 00004731 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch
 27719 00004733 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 27720 00004735 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 27721 00004737 C3                      	retn
 27722                                  div5:	
 27723 00004738 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 27724 0000473A 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 27725 0000473C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 27726 0000473E F7F3                    	div	bx              ; 0:AX/BX
 27727 00004740 91                      	xchg	cx,ax
 27728 00004741 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; DX:AX/BX
 27729 00004743 C3                      	retn
 27730                                  
 27731                                  ;Break   <SHR32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT SHIFT RIGHT>
 27732                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27733                                  ;
 27734                                  ; Procedure Name : SHR32
 27735                                  ;
 27736                                  ; Inputs:
 27737                                  ;	DX:AX = 32 bit sector number
 27738                                  ; Function:
 27739                                  ;       Perform 32 bit shift right
 27740                                  ; Outputs:
 27741                                  ;	AX = cluster number
 27742                                  ;	ZF = 1 if no error
 27743                                  ;	   = 0 if error (cluster number > 64k)
 27744                                  ; Uses:
 27745                                  ;       DX,CX
 27746                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27747                                  ; M017	- SHR32 rewritten for better performance
 27748                                  ; M039	- Additional optimization
 27749                                  
 27750                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27751                                  ; DOSCODE:7CBBh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27752                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27753                                  ; DOSCODE:7C81h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27754                                  
 27755                                  SHR32:
 27756                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 27757 00004744 268A4E05                	mov	cl,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 27758 00004748 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch	    ;ZF=1
 27759 0000474A E306                    	jcxz	norota
 27760                                  
 27761                                  rotashft2:
 27762 0000474C D1EA                    	shr	dx,1	    ;ZF reflects state of DX.
 27763 0000474E D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1	    ;ZF not affected.
 27764 00004750 E2FA                    	loop	rotashft2
 27765                                  norota:
 27766 00004752 C3                      	retn
 27767                                  
 27768                                  ;============================================================================
 27769                                  ; DIR.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991

 27774                                  ;	TITLE	DIR - Directory and path cracking
 27775                                  ;	NAME	Dir
 27776                                  
 27777                                  ;Break	<FINDENTRY -- LOOK FOR AN ENTRY>
 27778                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27779                                  ;
 27780                                  ; Procedure Name : FINDENTRY,SEARCH
 27781                                  ;
 27782                                  ; Inputs:
 27783                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 27784                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 27785                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Starting directory sector number
 27786                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster of directory
 27787                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 27788                                  ;	[NAME1] = Name to look for
 27789                                  ; Function:
 27790                                  ;	Find file name in disk directory.
 27791                                  ;	"?" matches any character.
 27792                                  ; Outputs:
 27793                                  ;	Carry set if name not found
 27794                                  ;	ELSE
 27795                                  ;	Zero set if attributes match (always except when creating)
 27796                                  ;	AH = Device ID (bit 7 set if not disk)
 27797                                  ;	[THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters
 27798                                  ;	DS = DOSGROUP
 27799                                  ;	ES = DOSGROUP
 27800                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer into directory buffer
 27801                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI = Pointer to First Cluster field in directory entry
 27802                                  ;	[CURBUF] has directory record with match
 27803                                  ;	[NAME1] has file name
 27804                                  ;	[LASTENT] is entry number of the entry
 27805                                  ; All other registers destroyed.
 27806                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27807                                  
 27808                                  ;hkn; called from rename.asm and dir2.asm. DS must be already set up at
 27809                                  ;hkn; this point.
 27810                                  
 27811                                  SEARCH:
 27812                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27813                                  	; DOSCODE:7C90h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27814                                  
 27815                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27816                                  	; DOSCODE:7CCAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27817                                  
 27818                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27819                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 45B3h
 27820                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 27821                                  
 27822                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27823                                  
 27824                                  	; 13/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 27825                                  	; DOSCODE:8797h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 27826                                  
 27827                                  	;entry	FindEntry
 27828                                  FINDENTRY:
 27829 00004753 E87E06                  	call	STARTSRCH
 27830 00004756 A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 27831                                  	;and	al,9Eh
 27832 00004759 24DE                    	AND	AL,~attr_ignore		; Ignore useless bits
 27833                                  	;cmp	al,8
 27834 0000475B 3C08                    	CMP	AL,attr_volume_id	; Looking for vol ID only ?
 27835 0000475D 7503                    	JNZ	short NOTVOLSRCH	; No
 27836 0000475F E83B02                  	CALL	SETROOTSRCH		; Yes force search of root
 27837                                  NOTVOLSRCH:
 27838 00004762 E84C01                  	CALL	GETENTRY
 27839                                  	;JNC	short SRCH
 27840                                  	;JMP	SETESRET
 27841                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27842 00004765 724F                    	jc	short SETESRET
 27843                                  
 27844                                  	;entry	Srch
 27845                                  SRCH:
 27846                                  	;;;
 27847                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27848 00004767 C706[AC0A]0000          	mov     word [LNE_COUNT],0	; reset long name entry count
 27849                                  SRCH2:
 27850                                  	;;;
 27851                                  
 27852 0000476D 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 27853 0000476E 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 27854                                  
 27855                                  ;	(DS:BX) = directory entry address
 27856                                  
 27857 00004772 8A27                    	mov	ah,[BX]
 27858                                  	;MOV	AH,[BX+dir_entry.dir_name] ; mov ah,[bx+0]
 27859 00004774 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; End of directory?
 27860 00004776 7461                    	JZ	short FREE
 27861                                  
 27862                                  	;;;
 27863                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27864 00004778 50                      	push	ax
 27865 00004779 8A470B                  	mov	al,[bx+0Bh]		; [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 27866 0000477C E8A503                  	call	check_longname
 27867 0000477F 58                      	pop	ax
 27868 00004780 7447                    	jz	short NEXTENT2
 27869                                  	;;;
 27870                                  
 27871                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27872 00004782 363A26[7F05]            	CMP	AH,[SS:DELALL]		; Free entry?
 27873 00004787 7450                    	JZ	short FREE
 27874                                  	;test	byte [bx+0Bh],8
 27875 00004789 F6470B08                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_volume_id
 27876                                  					; Volume ID file?
 27877 0000478D 7405                    	JZ	short CHKFNAM 		; NO
 27878                                  
 27879                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27880 0000478F 36FE06[7B05]            	INC	BYTE [SS:VOLID]
 27881                                  CHKFNAM:
 27882                                  ;	Context ES
 27883 00004794 8CD6                    	MOV	SI,SS
 27884 00004796 8EC6                    	MOV	ES,SI
 27885 00004798 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 27886                                  
 27887                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 27888 0000479A BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 27889                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 27890                                  
 27891                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 27892                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SS:NAME1],0E5H	; special char check
 27893                                  	;JNZ	short NO_E5
 27894                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:NAME1],05H
 27895                                  	; 22/09/2023
 27896 0000479D 26803DE5                	cmp	byte [es:di],0E5h
 27897 000047A1 7504                    	jnz	short NO_E5
 27898 000047A3 26C60505                	mov	byte [es:di],05h
 27899                                  NO_E5:
 27900                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 27901 000047A7 E88100                  	CALL	MetaCompare
 27902 000047AA 7449                    	JZ	short FOUND
 27903 000047AC 1F                      	POP	DS
 27904                                  
 27905                                  	;entry	NEXTENT
 27906                                  NEXTENT:
 27907 000047AD C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 27908 000047B1 E88600                  	CALL	NEXTENTRY
 27909 000047B4 73B1                    	JNC	short SRCH
 27910                                  	;JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 27911                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27912                                  SETESRET:
 27913 000047B6 16                      	PUSH	SS
 27914 000047B7 07                      	POP	ES
 27915                                  
 27916                                  	;;;
 27917                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27918 000047B8 FF36[DA05]              	push	word [ENTLAST]
 27919 000047BC 8F06[BC0A]              	pop	word [ENTLAST_PREV]	; previous ENTLAST
 27920 000047C0 7306                    	jnc	short SETESRETN
 27921 000047C2 C706[AC0A]0000          	mov	word [LNE_COUNT],0	; reset long name entry count
 27922                                  SETESRETN:
 27923                                  	;;;
 27924                                  
 27925 000047C8 C3                      	retn
 27926                                  
 27927                                  	;;;
 27928                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27929                                  NEXTENT2:
 27930 000047C9 1F                      	pop	ds
 27931 000047CA FF06[AC0A]              	inc	word [LNE_COUNT]	; Long Name entry count
 27932                                  NEXTENT3:
 27933 000047CE C42E[8A05]              	les	bp,[THISDPB]
 27934 000047D2 E86500                  	call	NEXTENTRY
 27935 000047D5 7396                    	jnc	short SRCH2
 27936 000047D7 EBDD                    	jmp	short SETESRET
 27937                                  	;;;
 27938                                  
 27939                                  FREE:
 27940 000047D9 1F                      	POP	DS
 27941 000047DA 8B0E[4803]              	MOV	CX,[LASTENT]
 27942 000047DE 3B0E[D805]              	CMP	CX,[ENTFREE]
 27943 000047E2 7304                    	JAE	short TSTALL
 27944 000047E4 890E[D805]              	MOV	[ENTFREE],CX
 27945                                  TSTALL:
 27946 000047E8 3A26[7F05]              	CMP	AH,[DELALL]		; At end of directory?
 27947                                  NEXTENTJ:
 27948                                  	;je	short NEXTENT 		; No - continue search
 27949                                  	;;;
 27950                                  	; 13/02/2024
 27951 000047EC 74E0                    	je	short NEXTENT3		; No - continue search
 27952                                  	;;;
 27953 000047EE 890E[DA05]              	MOV	[ENTLAST],CX
 27954 000047F2 F9                      	STC
 27955 000047F3 EBC1                    	JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 27956                                  
 27957                                  FOUND:
 27958                                  ; We have a file with a matching name. We must now consider the attributes:
 27959                                  ; ATTRIB	Action
 27960                                  ; ------	------
 27961                                  ; Volume_ID	Is Volume_ID in test?
 27962                                  ; Otherwise	If no create then Is ATTRIB+extra superset of test?
 27963                                  ;		If create then Is ATTRIB equal to test?
 27964                                  
 27965 000047F5 8A2C                    	MOV	CH,[SI] 		; Attributes of file
 27966 000047F7 1F                      	POP	DS
 27967 000047F8 8A26[6B05]              	MOV	AH,[ATTRIB]		; Attributes of search
 27968                                  	;and	ah,9Eh
 27969 000047FC 80E4DE                  	AND	AH,~attr_ignore
 27970                                  	;lea	si,[si+15]
 27971 000047FF 8D740F                  	LEA	SI,[SI+dir_entry.dir_first-dir_entry.dir_attr]
 27972                                  					; point to first cluster field
 27973                                  	;test	ch,8
 27974 00004802 F6C508                  	TEST	CH,attr_volume_id	; Volume ID file?
 27975 00004805 7409                    	JZ	short check_one_volume_id ; Nope check other attributes
 27976                                  	;test	ah,8
 27977 00004807 F6C408                  	TEST	AH,attr_volume_id	; Can we find Volume ID?
 27978                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Nope, (not even $FCB_CREATE)
 27979                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27980 0000480A 74A1                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 27981                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27982                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 27983 0000480C 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; Set zero flag for $FCB_CREATE
 27984 0000480E EB11                    	JMP	SHORT RETFF		; Found Volume ID
 27985                                  check_one_volume_id:
 27986                                  	;CMP	ah,8
 27987 00004810 80FC08                  	CMP	AH,attr_volume_id	; Looking only for Volume ID?
 27988                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Yes, continue search
 27989                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27990 00004813 7498                    	je	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 27991                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 27992 00004815 E8D005                  	CALL	MatchAttributes
 27993 00004818 7407                    	JZ	SHORT RETFF
 27994 0000481A F606[7E05]FF            	TEST	BYTE [CREATING],-1	; Pass back mismatch if creating
 27995                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27996                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Otherwise continue searching
 27997 0000481F 748C                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 27998                                  RETFF:
 27999 00004821 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 28000                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28001                                  	;MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]  ; mov ah,[es:bp+0]
 28002                                  	; 15/12/2022
 28003 00004825 268A6600                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP]
 28004                                  ;SETESRET:
 28005                                  	;PUSH	SS
 28006                                  	;POP	ES
 28007                                  	;retn
 28008                                  	; 24/01/2024
 28009 00004829 EB8B                    	jmp	short SETESRET
 28010                                  
 28011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28012                                  ;
 28013                                  ; Procedure Name : MetaCompare
 28014                                  ;
 28015                                  ; Inputs:
 28016                                  ;	DS:SI -> 11 character FCB style name NO '?'
 28017                                  ;	    Typically this is a directory entry. It MUST be in upper case
 28018                                  ;	ES:DI -> 11 character FCB style name with possible '?'
 28019                                  ;	    Typically this is a FCB or SFT. It MUST be in upper case
 28020                                  ; Function:
 28021                                  ;	Compare FCB style names allowing for ? match to any char
 28022                                  ; Outputs:
 28023                                  ;	Zero if match else NZ
 28024                                  ; Destroys CX,SI,DI all others preserved
 28025                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28026                                  
 28027                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28028                                  	; DOSCODE:7D3Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 28029                                  
 28030                                  MetaCompare:
 28031 0000482B B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 28032                                  WILDCRD:
 28033 0000482E F3A6                    	REPE	CMPSB
 28034 00004830 7407                    	JZ	short MetaRet 		; most of the time we will fail.
 28035                                  CHECK_META:
 28036 00004832 26807DFF3F              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1],"?"
 28037 00004837 74F5                    	JZ	short WILDCRD
 28038                                  MetaRet:
 28039 00004839 C3                       	retn				; Zero set, Match
 28040                                  
 28041                                  ;Break	<NEXTENTRY -- STEP THROUGH DIRECTORY>
 28042                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28043                                  ;
 28044                                  ; Procedure Name : NEXTENTRY
 28045                                  ;
 28046                                  ; Inputs:
 28047                                  ;	Same as outputs of GETENTRY, above
 28048                                  ; Function:
 28049                                  ;	Update BX, and [LASTENT] for next directory entry.
 28050                                  ;	Carry set if no more.
 28051                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28052                                  
 28053                                  NEXTENTRY:
 28054                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28055                                  	; DOSCODE:7D4Eh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 28056                                  
 28057                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28058                                  	; DOSCODE:7D88h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)

 28184                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28185                                  ;
 28186                                  ; Procedure Name : GETENTRY
 28187                                  ;
 28188                                  ; Inputs:
 28189                                  ;	[LASTENT] has directory entry
 28190                                  ;	ES:BP points to drive parameters
 28191                                  ;	[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[ENTLAST] set for DIR involved
 28192                                  ; Function:
 28193                                  ;	Locates directory entry in preparation for search
 28194                                  ;	GETENT provides entry for passing desired entry in AX
 28195                                  ; Outputs:
 28196                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer to next directory entry in CURBUF
 28197                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:DX = Pointer to first byte after end of CURBUF
 28198                                  ;	[LASTENT] = New directory entry number
 28199                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS] set via DIRREAD
 28200                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28201                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28202                                  
 28203                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28204                                  GETENTRY:
 28205                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 28206 000048B1 A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 28207                                  
 28208                                  	;entry	GETENT
 28209                                  GETENT:
 28210 000048B4 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 28211                                  ;
 28212                                  ; Convert the entry number in AX into a byte offset from the beginning of the
 28213                                  ; directory.
 28214                                  ;
 28215 000048B7 B105                    	mov	cl,5			; shift left by 5 = mult by 32
 28216 000048B9 D3C0                    	rol	ax,cl			; keep hight order bits
 28217 000048BB 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax
 28218                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28219                                  	;and	ax,0FFE0h
 28220                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28221                                  	;and	ax,~(32-1)		; mask off high order bits
 28222                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28223 000048BD 24E0                    	and	al,0E0h ; ~31
 28224 000048BF 83E21F                  	and	dx,1Fh
 28225                                  	;and	dx,32-1			; mask off low order bits
 28226                                  ;
 28227                                  ; DX:AX contain the byte offset of the required directory entry from the
 28228                                  ; beginning of the directory. Convert this to a sector number. Round the
 28229                                  ; sector size down to a multiple of 32.
 28230                                  ;
 28231                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 28232 000048C2 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 28233 000048C6 80E3E0                  	and	bl,0E0h
 28234                                  	;AND	BL,255-31		; Must be multiple of 32
 28235 000048C9 F7F3                    	DIV	BX
 28236                                  	; 14/02/2024
 28237                                  	;MOV	BX,DX			; Position within sector
 28238                                  				; NOTE: This BX value is not used in DIRREAD
 28239                                  				; Erdogan Tan - 14/02/2024
 28240                                  	;PUSH	BX
 28241 000048CB 52                      	push	dx
 28242                                  	;
 28243 000048CC E82BF6                  	call	DIRREAD
 28244 000048CF 5B                      	POP	BX
 28245                                  	;retc
 28246 000048D0 72BD                    	jc	short nextentry_retn
 28247                                  SETENTRY:
 28248 000048D2 8B16[E205]              	MOV	DX,[CURBUF]
 28249                                  	;;;add	dx,16 ; MSDOS 3.3
 28250                                  	;;add	dx,20 ; MSDOS 6.0

 28569

 28578                                  
 28579 00004A68 93                      	xchg	ax,bx
 28580                                  	;xor	dx,dx ; *
 28581                                  	; dx = 0

 28583 00004A6C F7F1                    	div	cx

 28606                                  
 28607                                  ; 24/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 28610                                  	; 14/02/2024
 28611                                  find_sft_entry_number:
 28612 00004A80 06                      	push	es		; es:di = SFT entry
 28613 00004A81 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 28614 00004A83 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 28615 00004A85 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 28616 00004A8A 26C41E[2A00]            	les	bx,[es:SFT_ADDR] ; address of the first SFT
 28617                                  f_sfte_1:
 28618 00004A8F 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 28619 00004A91 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; same SFT segment ?
 28620 00004A93 7512                    	jne	short f_sfte_2	; no
 28621 00004A95 89F8                    	mov	ax,di
 28622 00004A97 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx		; ax = entry offset
 28623                                  	;sub	ax,6		; ax = offset from start of the SFT table
 28624 00004A99 83E806                  	sub	ax,SFT.SFTable
 28625                                  	;mov	bx,59
 28626 00004A9C BB3B00                  	mov	bx,SF_ENTRY.size ; (SFT entry size)
 28627 00004A9F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 28628 00004AA1 F7F3                    	div	bx		; ax = SFT entry index in the table
 28629 00004AA3 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; ax = SFT index number (for requested SFT entry)
 28630 00004AA5 07                      	pop	es
 28631 00004AA6 C3                      	retn
 28632                                  f_sfte_2:
 28633 00004AA7 26034F04                	add	cx,[es:bx+4]	; SFT.SFCount ; number of entries in the table
 28634 00004AAB 26C41F                  	les	bx,[es:bx]	; SFT.SFLink
 28635 00004AAE 83FBFF                  	cmp	bx,0FFFFh ; -1	; the last SFT
 28636 00004AB1 75DC                    	jnz	short f_sfte_1
 28637 00004AB3 F9                      	stc			; (not found)
 28638 00004AB4 07                      	pop	es
 28639 00004AB5 C3                      	retn
 28640                                  
 28641                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28642                                  
 28643                                  ; 24/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 28645                                  
 28646                                  	; 14/02/2024
 28647                                  int_2Fh_1230h:		; Windows95 - FIND SFT ENTRY IN INTERNAL FILE TABLES
 28648 00004AB6 E8C7FF                  	call	find_sft_entry_number
 28649 00004AB9 7242                    	jc	short find_sfte_i_error
 28650 00004ABB 06                      	push	es	; ax = SFT enty index number (of the requested SFT entry)
 28651 00004ABC 57                      	push	di
 28652 00004ABD 0E                      	push	cs
 28653 00004ABE 07                      	pop	es
 28654 00004ABF B91400                  	mov	cx,20		; statically allocated with 20 entries,
 28655                                  				; and used only for FCB calls
 28656 00004AC2 BF[E148]                	mov	di,sft_fcb_table ; new file system (internal) table
 28657                                  				;  only for fcb calls
 28658                                  scan_next_sftfcb:
 28659 00004AC5 F2AE                    	repne scasb
 28660 00004AC7 F9                      	stc
 28661 00004AC8 7531                    	jnz	short sfte_i_notfound ; not found (cf=1)
 28662 00004ACA 8D5DFF                  	lea	bx,[di-1]	; offset of the entry in the table
 28663 00004ACD 81EB[E148]              	sub	bx,sft_fcb_table ; index into new file system table
 28664 00004AD1 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 28665 00004AD3 01DB                    	add	bx,bx		; 2*bx
 28666 00004AD5 01D3                    	add	bx,dx		; 3*bx
 28667 00004AD7 01DB                    	add	bx,bx		; bx = 6*bx  ; entry size = 6 bytes
 28668 00004AD9 268BB7[F748]            	mov	si,[es:bx+sftfcb.cluster+2] ; dir start cluster number, hw
 28669 00004ADE 268B97[F948]            	mov	dx,[es:bx+sftfcb.direntry] ; directory entry number
 28670 00004AE3 51                      	push	cx
 28671 00004AE4 268B8F[F548]            	mov	cx,[es:bx+sftfcb.cluster] ; dir start cluster number, lw
 28672 00004AE9 09C9                    	or	cx,cx
 28673 00004AEB 750C                    	jnz	short sfte_i_found
 28674 00004AED 09F6                    	or	si,si
 28675 00004AEF 7508                    	jnz	short sfte_i_found
 28676 00004AF1 59                      	pop	cx
 28677 00004AF2 09C9                    	or	cx,cx
 28678 00004AF4 75CF                    	jnz	short scan_next_sftfcb
 28679 00004AF6 F9                      	stc			; not found (cf=1)
 28680 00004AF7 EB02                    	jmp	short sfte_i_notfound
 28681                                  
 28682                                  sfte_i_found:
 28683 00004AF9 58                      	pop	ax		; clear stack
 28684 00004AFA F8                      	clc			; found (cf=0)
 28685                                  sfte_i_notfound:
 28686 00004AFB 5F                      	pop	di
 28687 00004AFC 07                      	pop	es
 28688                                  find_sfte_i_error:
 28689 00004AFD B80000                  	mov	ax,0
 28690 00004B00 C3                      	retn
