 31151                                  ; 22/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31152                                  %if 0	; SC
 31153                                  
 31154                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31155                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31156                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31157                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31158                                  
 31159                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 31160                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31161                                  ;
 31162                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 31163                                  ;
 31164                                  ; Inputs:
 31165                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 31166                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 31167                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 31168                                  ; Function:
 31169                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 31170                                  ; Output:
 31171                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 31172                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 31173                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 31174                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 31175                                  ;
 31176                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31177                                  
 31178                                  RW_SC:
 31179                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 31180                                  	
 31181                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 31182                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 31183                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 31184                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 31185                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31186                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 31187                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 31188                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31189                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 31190                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31191                                  
 31192                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 31193                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 31194                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 31195                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 31196                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 31197                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 31198                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 31199                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31200                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 31201                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 31202                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 31203                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 31204                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 31205                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 31206                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 31207                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 31208                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 31209                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 31210                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 31211                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31212                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 31213                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 31214                                  chklow: 						
 31215                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 31216                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 31217                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 31218                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 31219                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 31220                                  readsr:
 31221                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 31222                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 31223                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 31224                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31225                                  
 31226                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 31227                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 31228                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31229                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31230                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 31231                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 31232                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 31233                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 31234                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 31235                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31236                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31237                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 31238                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 31239                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 31240                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 31241                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 31242                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 31243                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 31244                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 31245                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 31246                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 31247                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 31248                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31249                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 31250                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31251                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 31252                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31253                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31254                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31255                                  
 31256                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 31257                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31258                                  ;
 31259                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 31260                                  ;
 31261                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 31262                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 31263                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 31264                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 31265                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 31266                                  ; Function:
 31267                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 31268                                  ; Output:
 31269                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 31270                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 31271                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 31272                                  ;
 31273                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31274                                  
 31275                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31276                                  IN_SC:
 31277                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31278                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 31279                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 31280                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31281                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 31282                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 31283                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 31284                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 31285                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31286                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 31287                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31288                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 31289                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31290                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 31291                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 31292                                  	; 16/12/2022
 31293                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 31294                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31295                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 31296                                  
 31297                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 31298                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31299                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31300                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31301                                  
 31302                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 31303                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31304                                  ;
 31305                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 31306                                  ;
 31307                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 31308                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 31309                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 31310                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 31311                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 31312                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 31313                                  ;
 31314                                  ; Function:
 31315                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 31316                                  ; Output:
 31317                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 31318                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31319                                  
 31320                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 31321                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31322                                  
 31323                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 31324                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31325                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 31326                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 31327                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31328                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 31329                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31330                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31331                                  
 31332                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31333                                  ; 22/11/2022
 31334                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31335                                  
 31336                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 31337                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31338                                  ;
 31339                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 31340                                  ;
 31341                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 31342                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 31343                                  ; Function:
 31344                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 31345                                  ; Output:
 31346                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 31347                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 31348                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 31349                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 31350                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 31351                                  ;     
 31352                                  ;		       0 if failed
 31353                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31354                                  
 31355                                  VIRREAD:
 31356                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31357                                  
 31358                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 31359                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31360                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 31361                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 31362                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 31363                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 31364                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 31365                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 31366                                  
 31367                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 31368                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 31369                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31370                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31371                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31372                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31373                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31374                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31375                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31376                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 31377                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 31378                                  	POP	CX
 31379                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31380                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31381                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31382                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31383                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31384                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 31385                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 31386                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 31387                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 31388                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 31389                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 31390                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31391                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 31392                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 31393                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31394                                  
 31395                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 31396                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31397                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31398                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31399                                  
 31400                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 31401                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31402                                  ;
 31403                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 31404                                  ;
 31405                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 31406                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 31407                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 31408                                  ; Function:
 31409                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 31410                                  ; Output:
 31411                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 31412                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 31413                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31414                                  
 31415                                  SC2BUF:
 31416                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31417                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 31418                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 31419                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31420                                  	jc	short sexit
 31421                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 31422                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 31423                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31424                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 31425                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 31426                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 31427                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 31428                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 31429                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31430                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 31431                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 31432                                  	mul	cx
 31433                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 31434                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31435                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 31436                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31437                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 31438                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 31439                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31440                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 31441                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 31442                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 31443                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 31444                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 31445                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 31446                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 31447                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 31448                                  nodd:
 31449                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 31450                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 31451                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 31452                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 31453                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 31454                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 31455                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31456                                  
 31457                                  %endif	; SC

 31499                                  ;               entries

 31727                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31728                                  ;
 31729                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31730                                  ;
 31731                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31732                                  ;
 31733                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31734                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."

 31741                                  SETDOTENT:
 31742                                  ;	Fill in name field

 31750                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 31751 00005467 B010                    	MOV	AL,attr_directory
 31752 00005469 AA                      	STOSB
 31753                                  
 31754                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation

 31758 0000546A 83C708                  	add	di,8
 31759 0000546D A1[F90A]                	mov	ax,[CLUSTERS_HW]

 31781                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31782                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31783                                  ;
 31784                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31785                                  ;
 31786                                  ; Inputs:
 31787                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31788                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31789                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31790                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31791                                  ;
 31792                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31793                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31794                                  ;
 31795                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31796                                  ;               terminated)
 31797                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31798                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31799                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31800                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31801                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31802                                  ; Function:
 31803                                  ;       Make a new node
 31804                                  ; Outputs:
 31805                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31806                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31807                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31808                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31809                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31810                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31811                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31812                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31813                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31814                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31815                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31816                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31817                                  ;       ELSE
 31818                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31819                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31820                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31821                                  ;               containing new node.
 31822                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31823                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31824                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31825                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31826                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31827                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31828                                  ;
 31829                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31830                                  
 31831                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31832                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31833                                  
 31834                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31835                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31836                                  
 31837                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31838                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31839                                  
 31840                                  MakeNode:
 31841                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31842 00005484 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*

 31844 0000548B C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31845 00005490 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL

 31848                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 31849                                  	; 23/02/2024

 31851 00005499 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 31852 0000549A 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 31853 0000549C 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 31854 0000549E 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31855 000054A1 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31856                                  make_err_4:
 31857 000054A3 B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 31858                                  make_err_ret:
 31859                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31860                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31861 000054A5 98                      	cbw
 31862 000054A6 F9                      	STC

 31864 000054A7 C3                      	retn

 31867                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 31868                                  make_type:
 31869                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31870                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31871                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;

 31873 000054AD 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31874 000054AF 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 31875                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31876                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31877 000054B4 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31878 000054B9 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31879 000054BB F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31880 000054BC B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31881                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31882                                  make_retn:
 31883                                  	;return
 31884 000054BF C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;

 31886                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31887                                  
 31888                                  make_type2:
 31889 000054C0 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31890 000054C4 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 31891 000054C6 F9                      	STC			; Not found
 31892 000054C7 EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 31893                                  
 31894                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31895                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31896                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31897                                  ;   else => file
 31898                                  
 31899                                  make_exists:
 31900 000054C9 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31901 000054CB B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31902                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31903 000054CD F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31904 000054D2 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31905                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31906                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 31907 000054D4 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 31908 000054D6 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31909 000054D8 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 31910 000054DA 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31911 000054DC 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 31912 000054DD 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31913                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31914 000054E1 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31915                                  	;test	ch,1

 31918 000054EA E8FBF8                  	call	MatchAttributes

 31920 000054EE 751E                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 31921 000054F0 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL		; AL = 0, Disk Node
 31922                                  
 31923                                  make_share:
 31924                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31925                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31926 000054F2 98                      	cbw
 31927 000054F3 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save Disk or Device node

 31932 000054FE 56                      	push	si
 31933 000054FF 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 31934 00005500 E8722C                  	call	ShareEnter

 31936                                  
 31937                                  ; User failed request.
 31938 00005505 5B                      	pop	bx
 31939 00005506 5E                      	pop	si
 31940 00005507 59                      	pop	cx
 31941 00005508 58                      	pop	ax
 31942                                  
 31943                                  Make_Share_ret:
 31944 00005509 B006                    	MOV	AL,6
 31945 0000550B EB98                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31946                                  
 31947                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 31948 0000550D 59                      	POP	CX		; Get back device ID
 31949                                  make_err_ret_5:
 31950 0000550E B005                    	MOV     AL,5		; Attribute mismatch
 31951                                          ; 22/11/2022
 31952 00005510 EB93                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31953                                  
 31954                                  make_exists_dir:
 31955 00005512 B001                    	MOV	AL,1		; exists as directory, always an error
 31956                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31957 00005514 EB8F                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 31958                                  
 31959                                  make_save:
 31960 00005516 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save whether Disk or File
 31961 00005517 89C8                    	MOV	AX,CX		; Device ID to AH
 31962 00005519 E86800                  	CALL	NEWENTRY
 31963 0000551C 58                      	POP	AX		; 0 if Disk, 3 if File
 31964 0000551D 73A0                    	jnc	short make_retn
 31965 0000551F B002                    	MOV	AL,2		; create failed case 2
 31966                                  make_save_retn:
 31967 00005521 C3                      	retn
 31968                                  
 31969                                  make_new:
 31970 00005522 E8F1FF                  	call	make_save
 31971 00005525 72FA                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 31972                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 31973 00005527 F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory
 31974 0000552C 75F3                    	jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 31975                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 31976 0000552E 50                      	push	ax
 31977 0000552F 53                      	push	bx
 31978 00005530 56                      	push	si
 31979 00005531 E8412C                  	call	ShareEnter
 31980 00005534 5E                      	pop	si
 31981 00005535 5B                      	pop	bx
 31982 00005536 58                      	pop	ax
 31983 00005537 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 31984                                  
 31985                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 31986                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 31987                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 31988                                  
 31989 00005539 50                      	PUSH	AX
 31990 0000553A C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 31991                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h
 31992 0000553E 26C607E5                	MOV	BYTE [ES:BX],DIRFREE	; nuke newly created entry.
 31993                                  
 31994                                  ; 23/02/2024
 31995                                  %if 0	
 31996                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31997                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 31998                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 31999                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 32000                                  	JNZ	short yesdirty8		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 32001                                  	; 22/11/2022
 32002                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 32003                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 32004                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 32005                                  yesdirty8:
 32006                                  %else
 32007                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32008 00005542 E80114                  	call    SET_BUF_DIRTY	
 32009                                  %endif
 32010 00005545 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 32011                                  	; 15/12/2022
 32012 00005549 268A4600                	mov	al,[ES:BP]
 32013                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32014                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 32015                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 32016 0000554D E8F112                  	call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 32017 00005550 58                      	POP	AX
 32018 00005551 EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 32019                                  
 32020                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 32021                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 32022                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 32023                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 32024                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 32025                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 32026                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 32027                                  ;
 32028                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 32029                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 32030                                  
 32031                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32032                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32033                                  
 32034                                  MakeEndShare:
 32035 00005553 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 32036 00005557 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 32037 00005559 E88DC3                  	call	ECritSFT
 32038 0000555C 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 32039                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 32040 0000555F 50                      	push	ax
 32041 00005560 57                      	push	di
 32042 00005561 06                      	push	es
 32043 00005562 9C                      	PUSHF
 32044 00005563 E80A2C                  	call	ShareEnd		; remove sharing
 32045 00005566 9D                      	POPF
 32046 00005567 07                      	pop	es
 32047 00005568 5F                      	pop	di
 32048 00005569 268F05                  	pop	word [ES:DI]
 32049                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 32050 0000556C E8A7C3                  	call	LCritSFT
 32051                                  	; 22/11/2022
 32052                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32053 0000556F 5B                      	pop	bx
 32054 00005570 5E                      	pop	si
 32055 00005571 59                      	pop	cx
 32056 00005572 58                      	pop	ax
 32057 00005573 E8A0FF                  	CALL	make_save
 32058                                  
 32059                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 32060                                  
 32061 00005576 72A9                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 32062 00005578 50                      	push	ax
 32063 00005579 53                      	push	bx
 32064 0000557A 56                      	push	si
 32065 0000557B 9C                      	PUSHF
 32066 0000557C E8F62B                  	call	ShareEnter
 32067 0000557F 9D                      	POPF
 32068 00005580 5E                      	pop	si
 32069 00005581 5B                      	pop	bx
 32070 00005582 58                      	pop	ax
 32071                                  
 32072                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 32073                                  
 32074                                  makeendshare_retn:
 32075 00005583 C3                      	retn

 32077                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32078                                  ;
 32079                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 32080                                  ;
 32081                                  ; Inputs:
 32082                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 32083                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 32084                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 32085                                  ;		  entries
 32086                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 32087                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 32088                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 32089                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 32090                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 32091                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 32092                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 32093                                  ;	  If FILE
 32094                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 32095                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 32096                                  ;	  If device
 32097                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 32098                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 32099                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 32100                                  ; Function:
 32101                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 32102                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 32103                                  ; Outputs:
 32104                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 32105                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 32106                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 32107                                  ;	  else
 32108                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 32109                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 32110                                  ;
 32111                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32112                                  
 32113                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32114                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32115                                  
 32116                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32117                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 32118                                  
 32119                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 32120                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)
 32121                                  
 32122                                  NEWENTRY:
 32123 00005584 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 32124 00005588 7315                    	JNC	short EXISTENT	
 32125 0000558A 803E[4A03]00            	CMP	byte [FAILERR],0
 32126                                  	;STC
 32127                                  	;jnz	short makeendshare_retn	; User FAILed, node might exist
 32128                                  	; 24/09/2023
 32129 0000558F 750C                    	jnz	short ERRRET3
 32130 00005591 E8E9FD                  	CALL	BUILDDIR	; Try to build dir
 32131 00005594 72ED                    	jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 32132 00005596 E81BF3                  	call	GETENT		; Point at that free entry
 32133 00005599 72E8                    	jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 32134 0000559B EB0E                    	JMP	SHORT FREESPOT
 32135                                  
 32136                                  ERRRET3:
 32137 0000559D F9                      	STC
 32138                                  newentry_retn:
 32139 0000559E C3                      	retn
 32140                                  
 32141                                  EXISTENT:

 32143 000055A1 7903                    	JNS	short NOT_DEV1
 32144 000055A3 E98600                  	JMP	DOOPEN		; If so, proceed with open
 32145                                  
 32146                                  NOT_DEV1:

 32149                                  FREESPOT:
 32150                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],8
 32151 000055AB F606[6B05]08            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id
 32152 000055B0 7407                    	JZ	short NOTVOLID

 32155                                  NOTVOLID:

 32157 000055BD 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 32158                                  
 32159 000055BF BE[4B05]                	MOV	SI,NAME1
 32160

 32162 000055C5 F3A5                    	REP	MOVSW

 32164 000055C8 A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 32165 000055CB AA                      	STOSB			; Attributes
 32166                                  
 32167                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 32168 000055CC B105                    	MOV	CL,5		;FT. assume normal FBUGBUG	;AN000;
 32169                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 32170                                  
 32171 000055CE 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 32172 000055D0 F3AB                    	REP	STOSW		; Zero pad
 32173 000055D2 E88DB5                  	call	DATE16

 32175 000055D6 AB                      	STOSW			; dir_time
 32176 000055D7 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 32177                                  	; 23/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32178                                  	;;;

 32186 000055E1 AB                      	STOSW

 32188                                  updnxt:
 32189 000055E3 8B36[E205]              	MOV	SI,[CURBUF]

 32208 000055FE 50                      	PUSH	AX

 32263                                  
 32264                                  ; DOOPEN
 32265                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32266                                  ;
 32267                                  ; Inputs:
 32268                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 32269                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 32270                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 32271                                  ;	  If FILE
 32272                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 32273                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 32274                                  ;	  If device
 32275                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 32276                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 32277                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 32278                                  ; Function:
 32279                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 32280                                  ; Outputs:
 32281                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 32282                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 32283                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 32284                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 32285                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 32286                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 32287                                  ;	  sf_position = 0
 32288                                  ;	  If device
 32289                                  ;	  sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 32290                                  ;	  sf_size = 0
 32291                                  ;	  If file
 32292                                  ;	  sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 32293                                  ;	  sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 32294                                  ;	  sf_cluspos = 0
 32295                                  ;	  sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 32296                                  ;	  sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 32297                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 32298                                  ;

 32561                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32562                                  ;
 32563                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 32564                                  ;
 32565                                  ; Inputs:
 32566                                  ;	  ES:BP -> DPB

 32667 0000575F C3                      	retn
 32668                                  
 32669                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32670                                  %if 0
 32671                                  
 32672                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32673                                  ;
 32674                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 32675                                  ;
 32676                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 32677                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 32678                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 32679                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 32680                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 32681                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 32682                                  ;
 32683                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32684                                  
 32685                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 32686                                  	PUSH	AX
 32687                                  	lahf			; preserve flags
 32688                                  	CMP	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 32689                                  	JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 32690                                  	mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0 ; reset flag
 32691                                  	push	es
 32692                                  	push	di
 32693                                  	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32694                                  	call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 32695                                  	pop	di
 32696                                  	pop	es
 32697                                  
 32698                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 32699                                  	sahf			; restore flags
 32700                                  	POP	AX
 32701                                  	retn
 32702                                  
 32703                                  %endif

 32737                                  ;Break   <FNDCLUS -- Skip over allocation units>

 32740                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 32741                                  ;
 32742                                  ; Inputs:

 32745                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT

 32957                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 32958                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32959                                  ;
 32960                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 32961                                  ;
 32962                                  ; Inputs:
 32963                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 32964                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 32965                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 32966                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 32967                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 32968                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 32969                                  ; Function:
 32970                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 32971                                  ;       read if necessary.
 32972                                  ; Outputs:
 32973                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 32974                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 32975                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 32976                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 32977                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 32978                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 32979                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32980                                  
 32981                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32982                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:98C2h
 32983                                  
 32984                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8BF1h) - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1)
 32985                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8C2Ch) - Retro DOS v4.2
 32986                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0BE33h)
 32987                                  
 32988                                  BUFSEC:
 32989                                  	; 25/02/2024
 32990                                  	;;;
 32991                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32992 0000580D 8B16[E50A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 32993                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx
 32994 00005811 8716[EF0A]              	xchg	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32995 00005815 52                      	push	dx	; [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 32996                                  	;;;
 32997 00005816 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 32998 0000581A 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 32999                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 33000 0000581E C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 33001 00005823 E89801                          CALL    FIGREC
 33002 00005826 E81B0F                  	call	GETBUFFR
 33003                                  	; 25/02/2024
 33004                                  	;;;
 33005 00005829 8F06[EF0A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33006                                  	;;;
 33007 0000582D 72DD                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 33008                                  
 33009 0000582F C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 33010 00005834 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 33011 00005838 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 33012 0000583A 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 33013 0000583E 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 33014 00005840 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 33015 00005844 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 33016                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 33017 00005848 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 33018                                  	;;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 33019                                  	;;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 33020                                          ;lea	di,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1  ; 25/02/2024
 33021 0000584D 8D7D18                  	LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 33022 00005850 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 33023 00005854 F8                              CLC	; (not necessary!?) ; 25/02/2024
 33024 00005855 C3                              retn
 33025                                  
 33026                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 33027                                  
 33028                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33029                                  ;
 33030                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 33031                                  ;
 33032                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 33033                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 33034                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 33035                                  ;
 33036                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 33037                                  ;
 33038                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33039                                  
 33040                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33041                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 33042                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33043                                  BUFRD:
 33044 00005856 06                              PUSH	ES
 33045 00005857 31C0                            xor	ax,ax			; pre-read sector
 33046 00005859 E8B1FF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 33047 0000585C 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK ; ds=ss
 33048                                  
 33049                                  BUF_IO_FAIL:				; this label used by BUFWRT also
 33050 0000585E 07                              POP	ES
 33051 0000585F EB2D                            JMP     SHORT RBUFPLACED ; ds=ss
 33052                                  
 33053                                  BUF_OK:
 33054 00005861 8CC3                            MOV     BX,ES
 33055 00005863 8E06[2E03]                      MOV     ES,[DMAADD+2]
 33056 00005867 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX
 33057 00005869 87FE                    	XCHG    DI,SI
 33058 0000586B D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 33059                                  ;M039
 33060                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 33061                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 33062                                  	;MOVSB
 33063                                  ;EVENRD:
 33064                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 33065                                  
 33066                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 33067                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 33068                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 33069                                  
 33070                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 33071 0000586D F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 33072                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 33073                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 33074                                  	; 16/12/2022
 33075 0000586F 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 33076 00005871 A4                      	movsb ; ****
 33077                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 33078                                  	;adc	cx,0
 33079                                  	;rep	movsb
 33080                                  ;M039
 33081                                  EVENRD: ; ****
 33082 00005872 07                              POP	ES
 33083                                  ;hkn; SS override
 33084 00005873 36C53E[E205]                    LDS     DI,[SS:CURBUF]
 33085                                  	;;;lea	bx,[di+16]
 33086                                  	;;lea	bx,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 33087                                  	;lea	bx,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1	; 25/02/2024
 33088 00005878 8D5D18                  	LEA     BX,[DI+BUFINSIZ]
 33089 0000587B 29DE                            SUB     SI,BX                   ; Position in buffer
 33090 0000587D E8640E                          call	PLACEBUF
 33091                                  	;cmp	si,[es:bp+2]
 33092 00005880 263B7602                	CMP	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Read Last byte?
 33093 00005884 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC ; ds<>ss ; No, leave buf where it is
 33094                                  ;M039
 33095                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 33096                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 33097                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 33098                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 33099 00005886 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 33100                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 33101                                  
 33102                                  RBUFPLACEDC:
 33103 0000588B F8                              CLC
 33104                                  ;RBUFPLACED:
 33105 0000588C 16                      	push	ss
 33106 0000588D 1F                      	pop	ds
 33107                                  RBUFPLACED:	; 25/02/2024 (ds=ss)
 33108 0000588E C3                              retn
 33109                                  
 33110                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33111                                  ;
 33112                                  ; Procedure : BUFWRT
 33113                                  ;
 33114                                  ; Do a partial sector write via one of the system buffers
 33115                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 33116                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 33117                                  ;
 33118                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 33119                                  ;
 33120                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33121                                  
 33122                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 33123                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33124                                  BUFWRT:
 33125                                  	;MOV	AX,[SECPOS]

 33127                                  	;ADD	AX,1			; Set for next sector
 33128                                  	;MOV	[SECPOS],AX 		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;

 33135 00005899 A1[C605]                	MOV	AX,[SECPOS+2]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;

 33137 000058A0 B001                    	MOV	AL,1			;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 33138 000058A2 770F                    	JA	short NOREAD		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 33139 000058A4 720B                    	JB	short _doread		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 33140 000058A6 A1[C405]                	MOV	AX,[SECPOS]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 33141                                  
 33142                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 33143                                  	;INC	AX
 33144                                  	;MOV	[SECPOS],AX ; 09/09/2018
 33145                                  
 33146                                  	; 20/05/2019
 33147                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 33148 000058A9 3B06[C805]              	CMP	AX,[VALSEC]		; Has sector been written before?
 33149 000058AD B001                    	MOV	AL,1

 33151                                  _doread:
 33152 000058B1 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL
 33153                                  NOREAD:
 33154 000058B3 06                      	PUSH	ES
 33155 000058B4 E856FF                  	CALL	BUFSEC
 33156 000058B7 72A5                    	JC	short BUF_IO_FAIL
 33157 000058B9 8E1E[2E03]              	MOV	DS,[DMAADD+2]
 33158 000058BD D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1
 33159                                  ;M039
 33160                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 33161                                  	;JNC	short EVENWRT ; 09/09/2018
 33162                                  	;MOVSB
 33163                                  ;EVENWRT:
 33164                                  	;REP	MOVSW
 33165

 33571                                  
 33572                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33573                                  ; DOSCODE:8DC2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 33574                                  
 33575                                  ; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 33576                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 
 33577                                  
 33578                                  ;Break   <ALLOCATE -- Assign disk space>
 33579                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33580                                  ;
 33581                                  ; Procedure Name : ALLOCATE - Allocate Disk Space
 33582                                  ;
 33583                                  ;   ALLOCATE is called to allocate disk clusters. The new clusters are
 33584                                  ;   FAT-chained onto the end of the existing file.
 33585                                  ;
 33586                                  ;   The DPB contains the cluster # of the last free cluster allocated
 33587                                  ;   (dpb_next_free). We start at this cluster and scan towards higher
 33588                                  ;   numbered clusters, looking for the necessary free blocks.
 33589                                  ;
 33590                                  ;   Once again, fancy terminology gets in the way of correct coding. When
 33591                                  ;   using next_free, start scanning AT THAT POINT and not the one following it.
 33592                                  ;   This fixes the boundary condition bug when only free = next_free = 2.
 33593                                  ;
 33594                                  ;       If we get to the end of the disk without satisfaction:
 33595                                  ;
 33596                                  ;           if (dpb_next_free == 2) then we've scanned the whole disk.
 33597                                  ;               return (insufficient_disk_space)
 33598                                  ;           ELSE
 33599                                  ;               dpb_next_free = 2; start scan over from the beginning.
 33600                                  ;
 33601                                  ;   Note that there is no multitasking interlock. There is no race when
 33602                                  ;   examining the entrys in an in-core FAT block since there will be no
 33603                                  ;   context switch. When UNPACK context switches while waiting for a FAT read
 33604                                  ;   we are done with any in-core FAT blocks, so again there is no race. The
 33605                                  ;   only special concern is that V2 and V3 MSDOS left the last allocated
 33606                                  ;   cluster as "00"; marking it EOF only when the entire alloc request was
 33607                                  ;   satisfied. We can't allow another activation to think this cluster is
 33608                                  ;   free, so we give it a special temporary mark to show that it is, indeed,
 33609                                  ;   allocated.
 33610                                  ;
 33611                                  ;   Note that when we run out of space this algorithem will scan from
 33612                                  ;   dpb_next_free to the end, then scan from cluster 2 through the end,
 33613                                  ;   redundantly scanning the later part of the disk. This only happens when
 33614                                  ;   we run out of space, so sue me.
 33615                                  ;
 33616                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33617                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33618                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33619                                  ;   The use of FATBYT and RESTFATBYT is somewhat mysterious. Here is the
 33620                                  ;   explanation:
 33621                                  ;
 33622                                  ;   In the NUL file case (sf_firclus currently 0) ALLOCATE is called with
 33623                                  ;   entry BX = 0. What needs to be done in this case is to stuff the cluster
 33624                                  ;   number of the first cluster allocated in sf_firclus when the ALLOCATE is
 33625                                  ;   complete. THIS VALUE IS SAVED TEMPORARILY IN CLUSTER 0, HENCE THE CURRENT
 33626                                  ;   VALUE IN CLUSTER 0 MUST BE SAVED AND RESTORED. This is a side effect of
 33627                                  ;   the fact that PACK and UNPACK don't treat requests for clusters 0 and 1 as
 33628                                  ;   errors. This "stuff" is done by the call to PACK which is right before
 33629                                  ;   the
 33630                                  ;           LOOP   findfre         ; alloc more if needed
 33631                                  ;   instruction when the first cluster is allocated to the nul file. The
 33632                                  ;   value is recalled from cluster 0 and stored at sf_firclus at ads4:
 33633                                  ;
 33634                                  ;   This method is obviously useless (because it is non-reentrant) for
 33635                                  ;   multitasking, and will have to be changed. Storing the required value on
 33636                                  ;   the stack is recommended. Setting sf_firclus at the PACK of cluster 0
 33637                                  ;   (instead of actually doing the PACK) is BAD because it doesn't handle
 33638                                  ;   problems with INT 24 well.
 33639                                  ;
 33640                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33641                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33642                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33643                                  ;       ENTRY   BX = Last cluster of file (0 if null file)
 33644                                  ;               CX = No. of clusters to allocate
 33645                                  ;               ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33646                                  ;               [THISSFT] = Points to SFT
 33647                                  ;
 33648                                  ;       EXIT   'C' set if insufficient space
 33649                                  ;                [FAILERR] can be tested to see the reason for failure
 33650                                  ;                CX = max. no. of clusters that could be added to file
 33651                                  ;              'C' clear if space allocated
 33652                                  ;                BX = First cluster allocated
 33653                                  ;                FAT is fully updated
 33654                                  ;                sf_FIRCLUS field of SFT set if file was null

 33656                                  ;       USES    ALL but SI, BP

 33854                                  ;       (BX) = found free cluster #
