 34104                                  ;   info
 34105                                  dofastk:
 34106                                  ; 27/02/2024
 34107                                  %if 0
 34108                                  	; 20/05/2019
 34109                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34110                                  	;push	dx ; * MSDOS 6.0
 34111                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 34112                                  	;;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive #
 34113                                  	;mov	dl,[es:bp]
 34114                                  
 34115                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 34116                                  	; DOSCODE:8DF9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34117                                  	
 34118                                  	; 16/12/2022
 34119                                  	;push	dx ; *
 34120                                  	;mov	dl,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE] 
 34121                                  	; 15/12/2022
 34122                                  	;mov	dl,[es:bp]
 34123                                  
 34124                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 34125                                  	PUSH	ES
 34126                                  	LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 34127                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],bx
 34128                                  	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_firclus],BX
 34129                                  	;;mov	[es:di+1Bh],bx ; MSDOS 3.3
 34130                                  	;mov	[es:di+35h],bx ; MSDOS 6.0
 34131                                  	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_lstclus],BX
 34132                                  	POP	ES
 34133                                  	;retn
 34134                                  
 34135                                  	;pop	dx ; * MSDOS 6.0
 34136                                  
 34137                                  	; 16/12/2022
 34138                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 34139                                  	;pop	dx ; *
 34140                                  %else
 34141                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34142                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34143                                  	;;;
 34144 00005B7A 52                      	push	dx
 34145 00005B7B 06                      	push	es
 34146 00005B7C C43E[9E05]              	les	di,[THISSFT]
 34147 00005B80 8B16[EF0A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 34148 00005B84 26895D2B                	mov	[es:di+2Bh],bx	; [es:di+SF_ENTRYT.sf_chain]
 34149                                  				; 32 bit first cluster, lw
 34150 00005B88 2689552D                	mov	[es:di+2Dh],dx	; [es:di+SF_ENTRYT.sf_chain+2]
 34151                                  				; 32 bit first cluster, hw
 34152 00005B8C 26895D35                	mov	[es:di+35h],bx	; [es:di+SF_ENTRYT.sf_lstclus]
 34153                                  				; 32 bit last cluster, lw
 34154 00005B90 26895537                	mov	[es:di+37h],dx	; [es:di+SF_ENTRYT.sf_lstclus+2]
 34155                                  				; 32 bit last cluster, hw
 34156 00005B94 07                      	pop	es
 34157 00005B95 5A                      	pop	dx
 34158                                  	;;;
 34159                                  %endif	
 34160                                  
 34161 00005B96 C3                      	retn
 34162                                  
 34163                                  ;** we're at the end of the disk, and not satisfied. See if we've scanned ALL
 34164                                  ;   of the disk...
 34165                                  
 34166                                  ; 27/02/2024
 34167                                  %if 0
 34168                                  ads7:
 34169                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Dh],2   
 34170                                  	cmp	word [ES:BP+DPB.NEXT_FREE],2
 34171                                  	jnz	short ads1	; start scan from front of disk
 34172                                  %else	
 34173                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34174                                  	;;;
 34175                                  ads15:
 34176                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 34177 00005B97 26837E0F00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],0
 34178 00005B9C 7407                    	jz	short ads16 ; FAT32
 34179                                  	; FAT
 34180                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Dh],2
 34181 00005B9E 26837E1D02              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE],2
 34182 00005BA3 EB0C                    	jmp	short ads17
 34183                                  ads16:
 34184                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+3Bh],0
 34185 00005BA5 26837E3B00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE+2],0
 34186                                  	;jnz	short ads17
 34187 00005BAA 7507                    	jnz	short ads19 ; 27/02/2024
 34188                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+39h],2
 34189 00005BAC 26837E3902              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE],2
 34190                                  ads17:
 34191 00005BB1 7403                    	jz	short ads18
 34192                                  ads19:
 34193 00005BB3 E9AAFE                  	jmp	ads2		; start scan from front of disk
 34194                                  	;;;
 34195                                  %endif
 34196                                  
 34197                                  ;   Sorry, we've gone over the whole disk, with insufficient luck. Lets give
 34198                                  ;   the space back to the free list and tell the caller how much he could have
 34199                                  ;   had.  We have to make sure we remove the "special mark" we put on the last
 34200                                  ;   cluster we were able to allocate, so it doesn't become orphaned.
 34201                                  ;
 34202                                  ;       (CX) = clusters remaining to be allocated
 34203                                  ;       (TOS) = last cluster of file (before call to ALLOCATE)
 34204                                  ;       (TOS+1) = # of clusters wanted to allocate
 34205                                  
 34206                                  ads18:		; 27/02/2024
 34207 00005BB6 5B                              POP     BX              ; (BX) = last cluster of file
 34208 00005BB7 BAFFFF                          MOV     DX,0FFFFH
 34209                                  
 34210                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34211                                  	;;;
 34212 00005BBA 8916[F10A]              	mov	[CLUSDATA_HW],dx
 34213 00005BBE 8F06[EF0A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 34214                                  	;;;
 34215                                  
 34216 00005BC2 E84400                  	call	RELBLKS         ; give back any clusters just alloced
 34217 00005BC5 58                              POP     AX              ; No. of clusters requested
 34218                                                                  ; Don't "retc". We are setting Carry anyway,
 34219                                                                  ;   Alloc failed, so proceed with return CX
 34220                                                                  ;   setup.
 34221                                  	;;;	; 27/02/2024
 34222 00005BC6 8F06[F90A]              	pop	word [CLUSTERS_HW]
 34223                                  	;;;
 34224                                  
 34225 00005BCA 29C8                            SUB     AX,CX           ; AX=No. of clusters allocated
 34226                                  
 34227                                  	;;;	; 27/02/2024
 34228 00005BCC 831E[F90A]00            	sbb	word [CLUSTERS_HW],0
 34229                                  	;;;
 34230                                  
 34231 00005BD1 E80700                  	call	RESTFATBYT      ; Don't "retc". We are setting Carry anyway,
 34232                                                                  ;   Alloc failed.
 34233                                  Disk_Full_Return:               ;label added for magic patch 8-6-92 scottq
 34234                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 34235 00005BD4 C606[0B06]01            	MOV	byte [DISK_FULL],1 ;MS. indicating disk full
 34236 00005BD9 F9                              STC
 34237 00005BDA C3                              retn
 34238                                  
 34239                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34240                                  ;
 34241                                  ; Procedure Name : RESTFATBYT
 34242                                  ;
 34243                                  ; SEE ALLOCATE CAVEAT
 34244                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 34245                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34246                                  
 34247                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34248                                  
 34249                                  RESTFATBYT:
 34250 00005BDB 53                              PUSH    BX
 34251 00005BDC 52                              PUSH    DX
 34252 00005BDD 57                              PUSH    DI
 34253                                  
 34254 00005BDE 31DB                            XOR     BX,BX
 34255                                  
 34256                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34257                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34258                                  	;;;
 34259                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 34260                                  	;push	word [CLUSDATA_HW]
 34261                                  	;push	word [CCONTENT_HW]  ; (not necessary ?)
 34262 00005BE0 891E[EF0A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx ; 0
 34263 00005BE4 8B16[EB0A]              	mov	dx,[FATBYT_HW]
 34264 00005BE8 8916[F10A]              	mov	[CLUSDATA_HW],dx
 34265                                  	;;;
 34266                                  
 34267 00005BEC 8B16[9605]                      MOV     DX,[FATBYT]
 34268                                  
 34269 00005BF0 E86507                  	call	PACK
 34270                                  
 34271                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34272                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34273                                  	;;;
 34274 00005BF3 8F06[F30A]              	pop	word [CCONTENT_HW]
 34275 00005BF7 8F06[F10A]              	pop	word [CLUSDATA_HW]
 34276 00005BFB 8F06[EF0A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 34277                                  	;;;
 34278                                  
 34279 00005BFF 5F                              POP     DI
 34280 00005C00 5A                              POP     DX
 34281 00005C01 5B                              POP     BX
 34282                                  
 34283                                  ; 16/12/2022
 34284                                  ; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 34285                                  ;RELEASE_flush:
 34286 00005C02 C3                      	retn
 34287                                  
 34288                                  ;Break	<RELEASE -- DEASSIGN DISK SPACE>
 34289                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34290                                  ;
 34291                                  ; Procedure Name : RELEASE
 34292                                  ;
 34293                                  ; Inputs:
 34294                                  ;       BX = Cluster in file
 34295                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 34296                                  ; Function:
 34297                                  ;       Frees cluster chain starting with [BX]
 34298                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 34299                                  ; AX,BX,DX,DI all destroyed. Other registers unchanged.
 34300                                  ;
 34301                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34302                                  
 34303                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34304                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D13h
 34305                                  
 34306                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8E86h)
 34307                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C27Fh)
 34308                                  
 34309                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34310                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34311                                  RELEASE:
 34312 00005C03 31D2                            XOR     DX,DX
 34313                                  	
 34314                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34315                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34316                                  	;;;
 34317 00005C05 8916[F10A]              	mov	[CLUSDATA_HW],dx ; (dx = 0, release)
 34318                                  	;;;
 34319                                  
 34320                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D19h
 34321                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8E88h)
 34322                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C285h)
 34323                                  
 34324                                  	;entry	RELBLKS
 34325                                  RELBLKS:
 34326                                  
 34327                                  ;   Enter here with DX=0FFFFH to put an end-of-file mark in the first cluster
 34328                                  ;   and free the rest in the chain.
 34329                                  
 34330 00005C09 E8F806                  	call	UNPACK
 34331                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 34332                                  	;jz	short RELEASE_flush
 34333                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34334 00005C0C 7652                            jbe	short RET12 ; jna short RET12
 34335                                  				; CCONTENT_HW:DI= Content of FAT
 34336                                   				; for given cluster (next cluster)
 34337 00005C0E 89F8                    	MOV     AX,DI
 34338 00005C10 52                              PUSH    DX
 34339                                  
 34340                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34341                                  	;push	ax
 34342                                  	;;;
 34343                                  
 34344 00005C11 E84407                  	call	PACK
 34345                                  
 34346                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34347                                  	;pop	ax
 34348 00005C14 8B16[F30A]              	mov	dx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 34349 00005C18 8916[EF0A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx ; next cluster (hw) to be released
 34350 00005C1C 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax		 ; next cluster (lw) to be released
 34351                                  	;;;
 34352                                          
 34353 00005C1E 5A                      	POP     DX
 34354                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 34355                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34356 00005C1F 723F                    	jc	short RET12
 34357                                          
 34358 00005C21 09D2                    	OR      DX,DX
 34359 00005C23 751F                            JNZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; Was putting EOF mark
 34360                                  
 34361                                  ; 28/02/2024
 34362                                  %if 0
 34363                                  	;;cmp	word [es:bp+1Eh],-1 ; MSDOS 3.3
 34364                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],-1 ; MSDOS 6.0
 34365                                  	CMP     word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],-1 ; Free count valid?
 34366                                          JZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; No
 34367                                          INC	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 34368                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 34369                                          MOV     BX,AX
 34370                                          dec     ax              ; check for "1"
 34371                                  	jz	short RELEASE_flush	; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 34372                                  %else
 34373                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34374                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34375                                  	;;;
 34376 00005C25 3B16[F10A]              	cmp	dx,[CLUSDATA_HW]	; > 0 ? (delete, release)
 34377 00005C29 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC	; no, EOF (allocate, -1), (dx = 0)
 34378                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],0FFFFh
 34379 00005C2B 26837E1FFF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],0FFFFh ; -1
 34380                                  					; Free count valid?
 34381 00005C30 7412                    	jz	short NO_DEALLOC	; No (dx = 0)
 34382                                  relblks_ifc:
 34383                                  	;inc	word ptr es:[bp+1Fh]
 34384 00005C32 26FF461F                	inc	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 34385 00005C36 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2
 34386                                  
 34387                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 34388 00005C38 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx
 34389 00005C3C 7513                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2	; not FAT32
 34390                                  
 34391                                  	;inc	word [es:bp+21h]
 34392 00005C3E 26FF4621                	inc	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2]
 34393 00005C42 EB0D                    	jmp	short NO_DEALLOC2
 34394                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 34395                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 34396 00005C44 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx	; dx is -1 or 0
 34397                                  					; (valid 16 bit fat size is another number)
 34398 00005C48 7507                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2 ; FAT (FAT16 or FAT12)
 34399                                  					; dx = 0, FAT32
 34400                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+21h],0FFFFh
 34401 00005C4A 26837E21FF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2],0FFFFh
 34402 00005C4F 75E1                    	jnz	short relblks_ifc
 34403                                  NO_DEALLOC2:
 34404 00005C51 833E[EF0A]00            	cmp	word [CLUSTNUM_HW],0
 34405 00005C56 7503                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC3
 34406 00005C58 48                      	dec	ax			; check for "1"	
 34407 00005C59 7405                    	jz	short RET12		; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 34408                                  NO_DEALLOC3:
 34409                                  	;;;
 34410                                  %endif
 34411                                  
 34412 00005C5B E88F06                  	call	IsEOF
 34413 00005C5E 72A3                            JB	short RELEASE	; Carry clear if JMP not taken
 34414                                  
 34415                                  	; 16/12/2022
 34416                                  ; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 34417                                  ; 28/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34418                                  %if 0
 34419                                  RELEASE_flush:
 34420                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34421                                  	mov	al,[es:bp]
 34422                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 34423                                  	push	si		; FLUSHBUF may trash these and we guarantee
 34424                                  	push	cx		;  them to be preserved.
 34425                                  	push	es
 34426                                  	push	bp
 34427                                  	call	FLUSHBUF	; commit buffers for this drive
 34428                                  	pop	bp
 34429                                  	pop	es
 34430                                  	pop	cx
 34431                                  	pop	si
 34432                                  %endif		; 28/02/2024
 34433                                  
 34434                                  RET12:
 34435 00005C60 C3                      	retn
 34436                                  
 34437                                  ;Break	<GETEOF -- Find the end of a file>
 34438                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34439                                  ;
 34440                                  ; Procedure Name : GETEOF
 34441                                  ;
 34442                                  ; Inputs:
 34443                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 34444                                  ;       BX = Cluster in a file
 34445                                  ;       DS = CS
 34446                                  ; Outputs:
 34447                                  ;       BX = Last cluster in the file
 34448                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 34449                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 34450                                  ;
 34451                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34452                                  
 34453                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34454                                  %if 0
 34455                                  GETEOF:
 34456                                  	call	UNPACK
 34457                                          jc	short RET12
 34458                                          PUSH    BX
 34459                                          MOV     BX,DI
 34460                                  	call	IsEOF
 34461                                          POP     BX
 34462                                          JAE     short RET12
 34463                                          MOV     BX,DI
 34464                                          JMP     short GETEOF
 34465                                  %else
 34466                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34467                                  	;;;
 34468                                  GETEOF4:	; **
 34469 00005C61 8F06[EF0A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 34470                                  GETEOF1:
 34471 00005C65 89C7                    	mov	di,ax
 34472 00005C67 8916[F90A]              	mov	[CLUSTERS_HW],dx ; CLUSTERS_HW:DI = Cluster Count
 34473 00005C6B 58                      	pop	ax
 34474 00005C6C 5A                      	pop	dx
 34475 00005C6D C3                      	retn
 34476                                  
 34477                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D7Ch
 34478                                  GETEOF:
 34479 00005C6E 52                      	push	dx
 34480 00005C6F 50                      	push	ax
 34481 00005C70 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx ; 0	; cluster count = 0
 34482 00005C72 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 34483                                  GETEOF2:
 34484 00005C74 E88D06                  	call	UNPACK
 34485 00005C77 72EC                    	jc	short GETEOF1
 34486                                  		; CCONTENT_HW:DI = next cluster (cluster content)
 34487 00005C79 40                      	inc	ax
 34488 00005C7A 7501                    	jnz	short GETEOF3
 34489 00005C7C 42                      	inc	dx
 34490                                  GETEOF3:
 34491 00005C7D FF36[EF0A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 34492 00005C81 53                      	push    bx
 34493                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 34494 00005C82 8B1E[F30A]              	mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 34495 00005C86 891E[EF0A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 34496 00005C8A 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 34497 00005C8C E85E06                  	call	IsEOF
 34498                                  	;pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 34499 00005C8F 5B                      	pop	bx
 34500                                  	;jae	short GETEOF1   ; EOF
 34501 00005C90 73CF                    	jae	short GETEOF4 ; ** ; 28/02/2024
 34502                                  	;mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW] ; not EOF
 34503                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 34504 00005C92 5B                      	pop	bx	; * ; 28/02/2024
 34505 00005C93 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 34506 00005C95 EBDD                    	jmp	short GETEOF2   ; get next cluster
 34507                                  	;;;
 34508                                  %endif

 34517                                  ;	TITLE	FCB - FCB parse calls for MSDOS
 34518                                  ;	NAME	FCB
 34519                                  
 34520                                  ;**	FCB.ASM - Low level routines for parsing names into FCBs and analyzing
 34521                                  ;		  filename characters
 34522                                  ;
 34523                                  ;	MakeFcb
 34524                                  ;	NameTrans
 34525                                  ;	PATHCHRCMP
 34526                                  ;	GetLet
 34527                                  ;	UCase
 34528                                  ;	GetLet3
 34529                                  ;	GetCharType
 34530                                  ;	TESTKANJ
 34531                                  ;	NORMSCAN
 34532                                  ;	DELIM
 34533                                  ;
 34534                                  ;	Revision history:
 34535                                  ;
 34536                                  ;		A000  version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 34537                                  ;	
 34538                                  ;	M048 - access FILE_UCASE_TAB using DS rather than SS.
 34539                                  
 34540                                  TableLook	EQU	-1
 34541                                  
 34542                                  SCANSEPARATOR	EQU	1
 34543                                  DRVBIT		EQU	2
 34544                                  NAMBIT		EQU	4
 34545                                  EXTBIT		EQU	8
 34546                                  
 34547                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34548                                  ;
 34549                                  ; Procedure : MakeFcb
 34550                                  ;
 34551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34552                                  
 34553                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34554                                  	; DOSCODE:8E77h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34555                                  
 34556                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34557                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9DB0h
 34558                                  
 34559                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8ED3h)
 34560                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8D92h)
 34561                                  
 34562                                  MAKEFCB:
 34563                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34564                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0
 34565 00005C97 30D2                    	XOR	DL,DL		; Flag--not ambiguous file name
 34566                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34567 00005C99 368816[4E03]            	mov	[ss:SpaceFlag],dl ; 0
 34568                                  	;test	al,2
 34569 00005C9E A802                    	test	AL,DRVBIT	; Use current drive field if default?
 34570 00005CA0 7503                    	JNZ	short DEFDRV
 34571                                  	;MOV	BYTE [ES:DI],0	; No - use default drive
 34572                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34573 00005CA2 268815                  	mov	[es:di],dl ; 0
 34574                                  DEFDRV:
 34575 00005CA5 47                      	INC	DI
 34576 00005CA6 B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34577                                  	;test	al,4
 34578 00005CA9 A804                    	test	AL,NAMBIT	; Use current name fields as default?
 34579 00005CAB 93                      	XCHG	AX,BX		; Save bits in BX
 34580 00005CAC B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34581 00005CAE 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB	; If not, go fill with blanks
 34582 00005CB0 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34583 00005CB2 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX		; Don't fill any
 34584                                  FILLB:
 34585 00005CB4 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34586 00005CB6 B103                    	MOV	CL,3
 34587 00005CB8 F6C308                  	test	BL,EXTBIT	; Use current extension as default

 34730                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34731                                  ;
 34732                                  ; Procedure Name : NameTrans
 34733                                  ;
 34734                                  ; NameTrans is used by FindPath to scan off an element of a path. We must
 34735                                  ; allow spaces in pathnames
 34736                                  ;
 34737                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI points to start of path element
 34738                                  ;   Outputs:	Name1 has unpacked name, uppercased
 34739                                  ;		ES = DOSGroup
 34740                                  ;		DS:SI advanced after name
 34741                                  ;   Registers modified: DI,AX,DX,CX
 34742                                  ;
 34743                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34744                                  
 34745                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34746                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34747                                  
 34748                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34749                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9E7Ch
 34750                                  
 34751                                  NameTrans:
 34752                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34753 00005D61 36C606[4E03]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],1
 34754 00005D67 16                      	push	ss
 34755 00005D68 07                      	pop	es
 34756                                  
 34757                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 34758 00005D69 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 34759 00005D6C 57                      	PUSH	DI
 34760                                  
 34761                                  ; 29/02/2024
 34762                                  %if 0
 34763                                  	MOV	AX,'  '	; 2020h
 34764                                  	MOV	CX,5
 34765                                  	STOSB
 34766                                  	REP	STOSW		; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34767                                  	XOR	AL,AL		; Set stuff for NORMSCAN
 34768                                  	MOV	DL,AL
 34769                                  %else
 34770                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34771                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34772                                  	;;;
 34773 00005D6D B020                    	mov     al, 20h ; ' '
 34774 00005D6F B90B00                  	mov     cx, 11
 34775 00005D72 F3AA                    	rep stosb               ; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34776 00005D74 91                      	xchg    ax, cx
 34777 00005D75 99                      	cwd
 34778                                  	;;;
 34779                                  %endif
 34780                                  
 34781 00005D76 AA                      	STOSB
 34782 00005D77 5F                      	POP	DI
 34783                                  
 34784 00005D78 E884FF                  	CALL	NORMSCAN
 34785                                  
 34786                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 34787 00005D7B 36803E[4B05]E5          	CMP	byte [SS:NAME1],0E5H
 34788 00005D81 75DD                    	jnz	short scanb_retn
 34789 00005D83 36C606[4B05]05          	MOV	byte [SS:NAME1],5 ; Magic name translation
 34790 00005D89 C3                      	retn

 34798                                  ;If TableLook
 34799                                  
 34800                                  ;hkn; Table	SEGMENT
 34801                                  ;	PUBLIC	CharType
 34802                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34803                                  
 34804                                  ; Character type table for file name scanning
 34805                                  ; Table provides a mapping of characters to validity bits.
 34806                                  ; Four bits are provided for each character. Values 7Dh and above
 34807                                  ; have all bits set, so that part of the table is chopped off, and
 34808                                  ; the translation routine is responsible for screening these values.
 34809                                  ; The bit values are defined in DOSSYM.INC
 34810                                  
 34811                                  ;	      ; ^A and NUL
 34812                                  ;CharType:
 34813                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34814                                  ;	      ; ^C and ^B
 34815                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34816                                  ;	      ; ^E and ^D
 34817                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34818                                  ;	      ; ^G and ^F
 34819                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34820                                  ;	      ; TAB and BS
 34821                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34822                                  ;	      ; ^K and ^J
 34823                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34824                                  ;	      ; ^M and ^L
 34825                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34826                                  ;	      ; ^O and ^N
 34827                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34828                                  ;	      ; ^Q and ^P
 34829                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34830                                  ;	      ; ^S and ^R
 34831                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34832                                  ;	      ; ^U and ^T
 34833                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34834                                  ;	      ; ^W and ^V
 34835                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34836                                  ;	      ; ^Y and ^X
 34837                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34838                                  ;	      ; ESC and ^Z
 34839                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34840                                  ;	      ; ^] and ^;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34842                                  ;	      ; ^_ and ^^
 34843                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34844                                  ;	      ; ! and SPACE
 34845                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK)
 34846                                  ;	      ; # and "
 34847                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK)
 34848                                  ;	      ; $ - )
 34849                                  ;	 db   3 dup (0FFh)
 34850                                  ;	      ; + and *
 34851                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 34852                                  ;	      ; - and '
 34853                                  ;	 db   NOT (FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM)
 34854                                  ;	      ; / and .
 34855                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34856                                  ;	      ; 0 - 9
 34857                                  ;	 db   5 dup (0FFh)
 34858                                  ;	      ; ; and :
 34859                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 34860                                  ;	      ; = and <
 34861                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 34862                                  ;	      ; ? and >
 34863                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 34864                                  ;	      ; A - Z
 34865                                  ;	 db   13 dup (0FFh)
 34866                                  ;	      ; \ and [
 34867                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 34868                                  ;	      ; ^ and ]
 34869                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34870                                  ;	      ; _ - {
 34871                                  ;	 db   15 dup (0FFh)
 34872                                  ;	      ; } and |
 34873                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 34874                                  
 34875                                  ;CharType_last equ ($ - CharType) * 2	; This is the value of the last
 34876                                  ;					; character in the table
 34877                                  
 34878                                  ;FCHK	equ 1		; normal name char, no chks needed
 34879                                  ;FDELIM	equ 2		; is a delimiter
 34880                                  ;FSPCHK	equ 4		; set if character is not a space or equivalent
 34881                                  ;FFCB	equ 8		; is valid in an FCB
 34882

 34940                                  ; DOSCODE:9011h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34941                                  
 34942                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34943                                  ; DOSCODE:8FB5h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34944                                  
 34945                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34946                                  ;
 34947                                  ; Procedure Names : GetLet, UCase, GetLet3
 34948                                  ;
 34949                                  ; These routines take a character, convert it to upper case, and check
 34950                                  ; for delimiters.  Three different entry points:
 34951                                  ;	GetLet -  DS:[SI] = character to convert
 34952                                  ;	UCase  -  AL = character to convert
 34953                                  ;	GetLet3 - AL = character
 34954                                  ;		  [BX] = translation table to use
 34955                                  ;
 34956                                  ;	Exit (in all cases) : AL = upper case character
 34957                                  ;			      CY set if char is control char other than TAB
 34958                                  ;			      ZF set if char is a delimiter
 34959                                  ;	Uses : AX, flags
 34960                                  ;
 34961                                  ; NOTE: This routine exists in a fast table lookup version, and a slow
 34962                                  ; inline version.  Return with carry set is only possible in the inline
 34963                                  ; version. The table lookup version is the one in use.
 34964                                  ;
 34965                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34966                                  
 34967                                  ; This entry point has character at [SI]
 34968                                  
 34969                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5517h
 34970                                  GETLET:	
 34971 00005DC9 AC                      	LODSB
 34972                                  
 34973                                  ; This entry point has character in AL
 34974                                  
 34975                                  	;entry	UCase
 34976                                  UCase:	
 34977                                  	; 09/08/2018
 34978                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5518h
 34979                                  _UCase:
 34980 00005DCA 53                      	PUSH	BX
 34981 00005DCB BB[850B]                	MOV	BX,FILE_UCASE_TAB+2
 34982                                  
 34983                                  ; Convert the character in AL to upper case
 34984                                  
 34985                                  gl_0:
 34986 00005DCE 3C61                    	CMP	AL,"a"
 34987 00005DD0 7214                    	JB	short gl_2	; Already upper case, go check type
 34988 00005DD2 3C7A                    	CMP	AL,"z"
 34989 00005DD4 7702                    	JA	short gl_1
 34990 00005DD6 2C20                    	SUB	AL,20H		; Convert to upper case
 34991                                  
 34992                                  ; Map European character to upper case
 34993                                  
 34994                                  gl_1:
 34995 00005DD8 3C80                    	CMP	AL,80H
 34996 00005DDA 720A                    	JB	short gl_2	; Not EuroChar, go check type

 34998

 35000                                  	; Lantastic call Ucase thru int 2f without setting SS to DOSDATA.
 35001                                  	; So we shall set up DS and to access FILE_UCASE_TAB in BX and also 
 35002                                  	; preserve it.
 35003

 35007                                  	;CS	XLAT

 35015 00005DE4 D7                      	XLAT			; ds as file_ucase_tab is in DOSDATA
 35016 00005DE5 1F                      	pop	ds
 35017                                  
 35018                                  	; M048 - End
 35019

 35021                                  
 35022                                  ;If TableLook
 35023                                  gl_2:

 35038 00005DEC 58                      	POP	AX
 35039                                  
 35040 00005DED 5B                      	POP	BX
 35041 00005DEE C3                      	RETN
 35042

 35044

 35049 00005DF0 EBDC                    	JMP	short gl_0
 35050                                  ;ELSE
 35051                                  ;

 35155                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35156                                  ;
 35157                                  ;  GetCharType - return flag bits indicating character type
 35158                                  ;	Bits are defined in DOSSYM.INC. Uses lookup table
 35159                                  ;	defined above at label CharType.
 35160                                  ;
 35161                                  ;	Entry : AL = character to return type flags for
 35162                                  ;	Exit  : AL = type flags
 35163                                  ;	Uses  : AL, flags
 35164                                  ;
 35165                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35166                                  
 35167                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35168                                  
 35169                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 35170                                  
 35171                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35172                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35173                                  
 35174                                  GetCharType:
 35175                                  	;cmp	al,7Eh
 35176 00005E02 3C7E                    	cmp	al,CharType_last 	; beyond end of table?
 35177 00005E04 7314                    	jae	short gct_90		; return standard value
 35178                                  
 35179 00005E06 53                      	push	bx
 35180 00005E07 BB[8A5D]                	mov	bx,CharType		; load lookup table
 35181 00005E0A D0E8                    	shr	al,1			; adjust for half-byte table entry size
 35182                                  	;xlat	cs:[bx] 		; get flags
 35183 00005E0C 2ED7                    	cs	xlat	
 35184 00005E0E 5B                      	pop	bx
 35185                                  
 35186                                  ; carry clear from previous shift means we want the low nibble.  Otherwise
 35187                                  ; we have to shift the flags down to the low nibble
 35188                                  
 35189 00005E0F 7306                    	jnc	short gct_80		; carry clear, no shift needed
 35190                                  
 35191                                  ; 29/02/2024
 35192                                  %if 0
 35193                                  	shr	al,1			; we want high nibble, shift it down
 35194                                  	shr	al,1
 35195                                  	shr	al,1
 35196                                  	shr	al,1
 35197                                  %else
 35198                                  	; 29/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 35199                                  	;;;
 35200 00005E11 51                      	push	cx
 35201 00005E12 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; we want high nibble, shift it down
 35202 00005E14 D2E8                    	shr	al,cl
 35203 00005E16 59                      	pop	cx
 35204                                  	;;;
 35205                                  %endif
 35206                                  
 35207                                  gct_80:
 35208 00005E17 240F                    	and	al,0Fh			; clear the unused nibble
 35209 00005E19 C3                      	retn
 35210                                  gct_90:
 35211 00005E1A B00F                    	mov	al,0Fh			; set all flags
 35212 00005E1C C3                      	retn

 35243                                  ;	TITLE	Control C detection, Hard error and EXIT routines
 35244                                  ;	NAME	IBMCTRLC
 35245                                  
 35246                                  ;**	Low level routines for detecting special characters on CON input,
 35247                                  ;	the ^C exit/int code, the Hard error INT 24 code, the
 35248                                  ;	process termination code, and the INT 0 divide overflow handler.
 35249                                  ;
 35250                                  ;	FATAL

 35252                                  ;	reset_environment
 35253                                  ;	DSKSTATCHK

 35261                                  ;	Revision history:
 35262                                  ;
 35263                                  ;	    AN000	version 4.0   Jan 1988
 35264                                  ;	    A002	PTM    -- dir >lpt3 hangs
 35265                                  ;	    A003	PTM 3957- fake version for IBMCAHE.COM
 35266                                  ;
 35267                                  ; 	M011: NEC's 8086 clone chip uses Intel's undocumented bit number in
 35268                                  ;	      flags register. In order to return to user normally DOS used to
 35269                                  ;	      move F202 into flags, which sets bit number 1 in flags uncondit-
 35270                                  ;	      ionally. Now it is modified to maintain the state of bit 1.
 35271                                  ;
 35272                                  ; 	M024: suppressed fail and ignore options if not in the middle of int 
 35273                                  ;	      24 and if Ctrl P or ctrl printscrn is pressed in routine

 35478                                  ;
 35479                                  ; Procedure Name : SpoolInt
 35480                                  ;
 35481                                  ; SpoolInt - signal processes that the DOS is truly idle. We are allowed to
 35482                                  ; do this ONLY if we are working on a 1-12 system call AND if we are not in
 35483                                  ; the middle of an INT 24.
 35484                                  ;
 35485                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35486                                  
 35487                                  SPOOLINT:
 35488 00005EB7 9C                      	PUSHF
 35489                                  	; 15/03/2018
 35490 00005EB8 36803E[5803]00          	CMP	BYTE [SS:IDLEINT],0	; SS override
 35491 00005EBE 7423                    	JZ	SHORT POPFRET
 35492 00005EC0 36803E[2003]00          	CMP	BYTE [SS:ERRORMODE],0
 35493 00005EC6 751B                    	JNZ	SHORT POPFRET		; No spool ints in error mode
 35494                                  
 35495                                  	; 30/07/2018
 35496                                  
 35497                                  	; Note that we are going to allow an external program to issue system 
 35498                                  	; calls at this time. We MUST preserve IdleInt across this.
 35499                                  
 35500 00005EC8 36FF36[5803]            	PUSH	WORD [SS:IDLEINT]
 35501                                  
 35502                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35503                                   
 35504                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35505 00005ECD 36803E[870D]00          	cmp	byte [SS:DosHasHMA],0	; Q: is dos running in HMA (M021)
 35506 00005ED3 7504                    	jne	short do_low_int28	; Y: the int must be done from low mem
 35507 00005ED5 CD28                    	INT	int_spooler  ; int 28h	; N: Execute user int 28 handler
 35508 00005ED7 EB05                    	jmp	short spool_ret_addr
 35509                                  
 35510                                  do_low_int28:
 35511                                  	;call	far [ss:LowInt28Addr]
 35512 00005ED9 2EFF1E[325E]            	call	far [cs:LowInt28Addr]	; 05/05/2019
 35513                                  
 35514                                  spool_ret_addr:
 35515                                  	;INT	int_spooler		; INT 28h
 35516                                  
 35517 00005EDE 368F06[5803]            	POP	WORD [SS:IDLEINT]
 35518                                  POPFRET:
 35519 00005EE3 9D                      	POPF
 35520                                  _RET18:  
 35521 00005EE4 C3                      	RETN

 35650                                  	; !! NOTE: FALL THROUGH !!
 35651                                  
 35652                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35653                                  ;
 35654                                  ; Procedure Name : CNTHAND ( CTRLC_C HANDLER )
 35655                                  ;
 35656                                  ; "^C" and CR/LF is printed. Then the user registers are restored and the
 35657                                  ; user CTRL-C handler is executed. At this point the top of the stack has 1)
 35658                                  ; the interrupt return address should the user CTRL-C handler wish to allow
 35659                                  ; processing to continue; 2) the original interrupt return address to the code
 35660                                  ; that performed the function call in the first place. If the user CTRL-C
 35661                                  ; handler wishes to continue, it must leave all registers unchanged and RET
 35662                                  ; (not IRET) with carry CLEAR. If carry is SET then an terminate system call
 35663                                  ; is simulated.
 35664                                  ;
 35665                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35666                                  
 35667                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 35668                                  
 35669                                  CNTCHAND:
 35670                                  	; MSDOS 6.0			; SS override
 35671                                  					; AN002; from RAWOUT
 35672                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DOS34_FLAG],CTRL_BREAK_FLAG  
 35673                                  	;JNZ	short around_deadlock 	; AN002;
 35674                                  
 35675                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35676                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS DOSCODE:91C4h, 29/12/2022)
 35677 00005F72 36F606[1206]02          	TEST	byte [SS:DOS34_FLAG+1],(CTRL_BREAK_FLAG>>8)  ; 2 
 35678 00005F78 7508                    	JNZ	short around_deadlock 	; AN002;
 35679                                  
 35680 00005F7A B003                            MOV     AL,3			; Display "^C"
 35681 00005F7C E848BD                          CALL	BUFOUT
 35682 00005F7F E8E3BB                          CALL	CRLF
 35683                                  around_deadlock:
 35684 00005F82 16                              PUSH    SS
 35685 00005F83 1F                              POP     DS
 35686 00005F84 803E[5703]00                    CMP     BYTE [CONSWAP],0
 35687 00005F89 7403                            JZ      SHORT NOSWAP
 35688 00005F8B E8D9DB                          CALL	SWAPBACK

 35692 00005F93 8B26[8405]              	MOV	SP,[USER_SP]

 35704                                  			; Return: return via RETF 2 with CF set
 35705                                  			; DOS will abort program with errorlevel 0
 35706                                  			; else
 35707                                  			; interrupted DOS call continues
 35708

 35713

 35721                                  	;;;
 35722 00005FA6 C606[E113]00            	mov	byte [INDOS_FLAG],0	; 2nd 'in dos' flag (what for?)
 35723                                  	;;;

 35725 00005FB0 8926[3203]              	mov	[ConC_Spsave],SP	; save his SP

 35728

 35731 00005FBF 7505                    	jne	short do_low_int23	; Y: the int must be done from low mem

 35741                                  	; 30/07/2018 
 35742                                  
 35743                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (IBMDOS.COM - Offset 56C0h)
 35744                                  
 35745                                  ; The user has returned to us. The circumstances we allow are:
 35746                                  ;
 35747                                  ;   IRET	We retry the operation by redispatching the system call
 35748                                  ;   CLC/RETF	POP the stack and retry
 35749                                  ;   ... 	Exit the current process with ^C exit
 35750                                  ;

 36018                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36019                                  ;
 36020                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErr
 36021                                  ;
 36022                                  ; Hard disk error handler. Entry conditions:
 36023                                  ;	DS:BX = Original disk transfer address
 36024                                  ;	DX = Original logical sector number
 36025                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors to go (first one gave the error)
 36026                                  ;	AX = Hardware error code
 36027                                  ;	DI = Original sector transfer count	
 36028                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 36029                                  ;	[READOP] = 0 for read, 1 for write
 36030                                  ;	Allowed Set with allowed responses to this error (other bits MUST BE 0)
 36031                                  ; Output:
 36032                                  ;	[FAILERR] will be set if user responded FAIL
 36033                                  ;
 36034                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36035                                  
 36036                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 36364                                  
 36365                                  ;** --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36366                                  ;
 36367                                  ; reset_environment checks the DS value against the CurrentPDB. If they are
 36368                                  ; different, then an old-style return is performed. If they are the same,
 36369                                  ; then we release jfns and restore to parent. We still use the PDB at DS:0 as
 36370                                  ; the source of the terminate addresses.
 36371                                  ;
 36372                                  ; Some subtlety: We are about to issue a bunch of calls that *may* generate
 36373                                  ; INT 24s. We *cannot* allow the user to restart the abort process; we may
 36374                                  ; end up aborting the wrong process or turn a terminate/stay/resident into a
 36375                                  ; normal abort and leave interrupt handlers around. What we do is to set a
 36376                                  ; flag that will indicate that if any abort code is seen, we just continue the
 36377                                  ; operation. In essence, we dis-allow the abort response.
 36378                                  ;
 36379                                  ; output:   none.
 36380                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36381                                  
 36382                                  	;entry	reset_environment
 36383                                  	
 36384                                  reset_environment:
 36385                                  	; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 36386                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 588Ah 
 36387                                  
 36388                                  ;***	invoke	Reset_Version		; AN007 ;MS. reset version number
 36389                                  
 36390 00006224 1E                      	PUSH	DS			; save PDB of process
 36391                                  
 36392                                  	; There are no critical sections in force. Although we may enter
 36393                                  	; here with critical sections locked down, they are no longer 
 36394                                  	; relevant. We may safely free all allocated resources.
 36395                                  
 36396 00006225 B482                    	MOV	AH,82h
 36397                                  		; Microsoft Networks - END DOS CRITICAL SECTIONS 0 THROUGH 7
 36398                                  	;int	2Ah 	
 36399 00006227 CD2A                    	INT	int_IBM
 36400                                  
 36401                                  					; SS override
 36402 00006229 36C606[5903]FF          	MOV	byte [SS:fAborting],-1	; signal abort in progress
 36403                                  
 36404                                  					; DOS 4.00 doesn't need it
 36405                                  	;CallInstall NetResetEnvironment, MultNET, 34  
 36406                                  					; Allow REDIR to clear some stuff
 36407                                  					; On process exit.
 36408 0000622F B82211                  	mov	ax, 1122h
 36409 00006232 CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - PROCESS TERMINATION HOOK
 36410                                  			; SS = DOS CS
 36411                                  	;mov	al,22h	
 36412 00006234 B022                    	MOV	AL,int_terminate
 36413 00006236 E82EAD                  	call	_$GET_INTERRUPT_VECTOR	; and who to go to
 36414                                  
 36415 00006239 59                      	POP	CX			; get ThisPDB
 36416 0000623A 06                      	push	es
 36417 0000623B 53                      	push	bx			; save return address
 36418                                  
 36419 0000623C 368B1E[3003]            	MOV	BX,[SS:CurrentPDB] 	; get currentPDB
 36420 00006241 8EDB                    	MOV	DS,BX
 36421 00006243 A11600                  	MOV	AX,[PDB.PARENT_PID]	; get parentPDB
 36422                                  
 36423                                  	; AX = parentPDB, BX = CurrentPDB, CX = ThisPDB
 36424                                  	; Only free handles if AX <> BX and BX = CX and [exit_code].upper
 36425                                  	; is not Exit_keep_process
 36426                                  	
 36427 00006246 39D8                    	CMP	AX,BX
 36428 00006248 7418                    	JZ	short reset_return	; parentPDB = CurrentPDB
 36429 0000624A 39CB                    	CMP	BX,CX
 36430 0000624C 7514                    	JNZ	short reset_return	; CurrentPDB <> ThisPDB
 36431 0000624E 50                      	PUSH	AX			; save parent
 36432                                  
 36433                                  					; SS override
 36434                                  	;cmp	byte [SS:EXIT_TYPE],3
 36435 0000624F 36803E[7C05]03          	CMP	BYTE [SS:EXIT_TYPE],EXIT_KEEP_PROCESS ; 15/08/2018
 36436 00006255 7406                    	JZ	short reset_to_parent 	; keeping this process
 36437                                  
 36438                                  	; We are truly removing a process. Free all allocation blocks
 36439                                  	; belonging to this PDB
 36440                                  
 36441                                  	;invoke	arena_free_process
 36442 00006257 E8C30D                  	call	arena_free_process
 36443                                  
 36444                                  	; Kill off remainder of this process. Close file handles and signal
 36445                                  	; to relevant network folks that this process is dead. Remember that
 36446                                  	; CurrentPDB is STILL the current process!
 36447                                  
 36448                                  	;invoke	DOS_ABORT
 36449 0000625A E85BD4                  	call	DOS_ABORT
 36450                                  
 36451                                  reset_to_parent:
 36452                                  					; SS override
 36453 0000625D 368F06[3003]            	POP	word [SS:CurrentPDB]	; set up process as parent
 36454                                  
 36455                                  reset_return:				; come here for normal return
 36456                                  	;Context DS			; DS is used to refer to DOSDATA
 36457 00006262 16                      	push	ss
 36458 00006263 1F                      	pop	ds	
 36459                                  
 36460 00006264 B0FF                    	MOV	AL,-1
 36461                                  
 36462                                  	; make sure that everything is clean In this case ignore any errors,
 36463                                  	; we cannot "FAIL" the abort, the program being aborted is dead.
 36464

 36466 00006266 E880B6                  	call	ECritDisk
 36467                                  	;invoke	FLUSHBUF
 36468 00006269 E8D505                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 36469                                  	;LeaveCrit critDisk
 36470 0000626C E8A7B6                  	call	LCritDisk
 36471                                  
 36472                                  ; 29/02/2024 - Retrto DOS v5.0
 36473                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 36474                                  %if 0
 36475                                  	; Decrement open ref. count if we had done a virtual open earlier.
 36476                                  
 36477                                  	call	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 36478                                  %endif
 36479                                  
 36480 0000626F FA                      	CLI
 36481 00006270 C606[2103]00            	MOV	BYTE [INDOS],0		; Go to known state
 36482

 36484                                  	;;;

 36486                                  	;;;
 36487                                  
 36488 0000627A C606[2203]FF            	MOV	BYTE [WPERR],-1		; Forget about WP error
 36489 0000627F C606[5903]00            	MOV	byte [fAborting],0	; let aborts occur
 36490 00006284 8F06[8005]              	POP	WORD [EXITHOLD]
 36491 00006288 8F06[8205]              	POP	WORD [EXITHOLD+2]

 36494

 36499 00006298 E8A6A1                  	call	restore_world
 36500                                  
 36501                                  	; 05/05/2019
 36502 0000629B 07                      	pop	es ; * ; MSDOS 6.21 (DOSCODE:94A8h, MSDOS.SYS)
 36503                                  
 36504                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 36505 0000629C 50                      	push	ax			; set up ds, but save ds in TEMPSEG
 36506 0000629D 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds			; and not on stack.
 36507                                  	;getdseg <ds>			; ds -> dosdata

 36509 000062A4 A3[840D]                	mov	[TEMPSEG],ax
 36510 000062A7 58                      	pop	ax
 36511                                  					; set up ds to DOSDATA
 36512                                  	;MOV	[CS:USER_SP],AX ; MSDOS 3.3
 36513 000062A8 A3[8405]                	mov	[USER_SP],ax
 36514                                  
 36515 000062AB 58                      	POP	AX			; suck off CS:IP of interrupt...
 36516 000062AC 58                      	POP	AX
 36517 000062AD 58                      	POP	AX
 36518                                  
 36519                                  ; M011 : BEGIN
 36520

 36528 000062B3 B4F2                    	MOV	AH,0F2h
 36529

 36531

 36533 000062B5 50                      	PUSH	AX
 36534                                   
 36535                                  	;PUSH	word [CS:EXITHOLD+2]
 36536                                  	;PUSH	word [CS:EXITHOLD]
 36537                                  	
 36538                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 36539 000062B6 FF36[8205]              	PUSH	word [EXITHOLD+2]
 36540 000062BA FF36[8005]              	PUSH	word [EXITHOLD]
 36541

 36543

 36545 000062BE A1[8405]                	MOV	AX,[USER_SP]

 36547

 36549                                  
 36550                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36551                                  ;
 36552                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_I24_EXTENDED_ERROR
 36553                                  ;
 36554                                  ; This routine handles extended error codes.
 36555                                  ; Input : DI = error code from device
 36556                                  ; Output: All EXTERR fields are set
 36557                                  ;
 36558                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36559                                  
 36560                                  SET_I24_EXTENDED_ERROR:
 36561 000062C6 50                      	PUSH	AX
 36562                                  					; ErrMap24End is in DOSDATA
 36563 000062C7 B8[040F]                	MOV	AX,ErrMap24End
 36564 000062CA 2D[F40E]                	SUB	AX,ErrMap24
 36565                                  					; Change to dosdata to access
 36566                                  					; ErrMap24 and EXTERR -SR
 36567                                  	; 05/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36568                                  	
 36569                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 36570 000062CD 1E                      	push	ds
 36571                                  	;getdseg <ds>			; ds ->dosdata
 36572 000062CE 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 36573                                  
 36574                                  	; AX is the index of the first unavailable error. Do not translate
 36575                                  	; if greater or equal to AX.
 36576                                  
 36577 000062D3 39C7                    	CMP	DI,AX
 36578 000062D5 89F8                    	MOV	AX,DI
 36579 000062D7 7306                    	JAE	short NoTrans
 36580                                  
 36581                                  	;MOV	AL,[CS:DI+ErrMap24]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 36582 000062D9 8A85[F40E]              	mov	al,[ErrMap24+di] ; MSDOS 6.0
 36583 000062DD 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH
 36584                                  NoTrans:
 36585                                  	;MOV	[CS:EXTERR],AX
 36586 000062DF A3[2403]                	mov	[EXTERR],AX
 36587 000062E2 1F                      	pop	ds
 36588                                  	;assume	ds:nothing
 36589 000062E3 58                      	POP	AX
 36590                                  
 36591                                  	; Now Extended error is set correctly. Translate it to get correct
 36592                                  	; error locus class and recommended action.
 36593                                  
 36594 000062E4 56                      	PUSH	SI
 36595                                  					; ERR_TABLE_24 is in DOSCODE 
 36596 000062E5 BE[A40E]                	MOV	SI,ERR_TABLE_24
 36597 000062E8 E8C8A3                  	call	CAL_LK			; Set other extended error fields
 36598 000062EB 5E                      	POP	SI
 36599 000062EC C3                      	retn
