 45318                                  ;	BREAK <$UNLINK - delete a file entry>
 45319                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45320                                  ;
 45321                                  ;**	$UNLINK - Delete a File
 45322                                  ;
 45323                                  ;
 45324                                  ;	Assembler usage:
 45325                                  ;	    LDS     DX, name
 45326                                  ;	    IF VIA SERVER DOS CALL
 45327                                  ;	     MOV     CX,SEARCH_ATTRIB
 45328                                  ;	    MOV     AH, Unlink
 45329                                  ;	    INT     21h
 45330                                  ;
 45331                                  ;	ENTRY	(ds:dx) = path name
 45332                                  ;		(cx) = search_attribute, if via server_dos
 45333                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if no error
 45334                                  ;		'C' set if error
 45335                                  ;		  (ax) = error code
 45336                                  ;			= error_file_not_found
 45337                                  ;			= error_access_denied
 45338                                  ;
 45339                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45340                                  
 45341                                  _$UNLINK:
 45342 00007E04 51                      	push	cx			; Save possible CX input parm
 45343 00007E05 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; Point at input string
 45344 00007E07 BF[BE03]                	MOV	DI,OPENBUF		; temp spot for path
 45345 00007E0A E865FB                  	call	TransPathSet		; go get normalized path
 45346 00007E0D 59                      	pop	cx
 45347 00007E0E 7216                    	JC	short ChModErr		; badly formed path
 45348 00007E10 36803E[7A05]FF          	CMP	byte [ss:CMETA],-1	; meta chars?	;smr;SS Override
 45349 00007E16 750E                    	JNZ	short NotFound
 45350 00007E18 16                      	push	ss
 45351 00007E19 1F                      	pop	ds
 45352                                  	;mov	ch,6
 45353 00007E1A B506                    	mov	ch,attr_hidden+attr_system ; unlink appropriate files
 45354 00007E1C E81C01                  	call	SetAttrib
 45355 00007E1F E849AD                  	call	DOS_DELETE		; remove that file
 45356                                  	;JC	short UnlinkE 		; error is there
 45357                                  	; 17/12/2022
 45358 00007E22 728D                    	jc	short NORERR
 45359                                  
 45360                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 45361                                  UnlinkOk:
 45362                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_OK		; okey doksy
 45363 00007E24 EBDB                    	jmp	short OpenOkj3
 45364                                  
 45365                                  	; 17/12/2022
 45366                                  ChModErr:	; 17/12/2022
 45367                                  NotFound:
 45368                                  	;mov	al,3
 45369 00007E26 B003                    	MOV	AL,error_path_not_found
 45370                                  ChModE:		; 17/12/2022
 45371                                  UnlinkE:
 45372                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 45373                                  	;;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR		; bye
 45374                                  	;jmp	short ChModE
 45375                                  	; 17/12/2022
 45376 00007E28 EB87                    	jmp	short NORERR

 45378                                  ;BREAK <$RENAME - move directory entries around>

 45383                                  ;	    LES     DI, dest
 45384                                  ;	    IF VIA SERVER DOS CALL
 45385                                  ;	      MOV   CX,SEARCH_ATTRIB
 45386                                  ;	    MOV     AH, Rename
 45387                                  ;	    INT     21h
 45388                                  ;
 45389                                  ;   Error returns:
 45390                                  ;	    AX = error_file_not_found
 45391                                  ;	       = error_not_same_device
 45392                                  ;	       = error_access_denied
 45393                                  ;

 45396                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 45398                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)

 45412                                  epjc2:

 45418 00007E52 E81DFB                  	call	TransPathSet		; wham

 45472                                  ;Break <$CreateNewFile - Create a new directory entry>
 45473                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45474                                  ;   CreateNew - Create a new directory entry.  Return a file handle if there
 45475                                  ;	was no previous directory entry, and fail if a directory entry with
 45476                                  ;	the same name existed previously.
 45477                                  ;
 45478                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an ASCIZ file name
 45479                                  ;		CX contains default file attributes
 45480                                  ;   Outputs:	Carry Clear:
 45481                                  ;		    AX has file handle opened for read/write
 45482                                  ;		Carry Set:
 45483                                  ;		    AX has error code
 45484                                  ;   Registers modified: All
 45485                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45486                                  
 45487                                  _$CreateNewFile:
 45488 00007E9D 51                      	push	cx			; Save attributes on stack
 45489 00007E9E B9[9831]                	MOV	CX,DOS_Create_New	; routine to call
 45490 00007EA1 E914FF                  	JMP	AccessSet		; use good ol' open
 45491                                  
 45492                                  ;**	BinToAscii - convert a number to a string.
 45493                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45494                                  ;	BinToAscii converts a 16 bit number into a 4 ascii characters.
 45495                                  ;	This routine is used to generate temp file names so we don't spend
 45496                                  ;	the time and code needed for a true hex number, we just use
 45497                                  ;	A thorugh O.
 45498                                  ;
 45499                                  ;	ENTRY	(ax) = value
 45500                                  ;		(es:di) = destination
 45501                                  ;	EXIT	(es:di) updated by 4
 45502                                  ;	USES	cx, di, flags
 45503                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45504                                  
 45505                                  ; MSDOS 3.3
 45506                                  ;BinToAscii:
 45507                                  ;	mov     cx,4
 45508                                  ;bta5:
 45509                                  ;	push    cx
 45510                                  ;	mov     cl,4
 45511                                  ;	rol     ax,cl
 45512                                  ;	push    ax
 45513                                  ;	and     al,0Fh
 45514                                  ;	add     al,'0'
 45515                                  ;	cmp     al,'9'
 45516                                  ;	jbe     short bta6
 45517                                  ;	add     al,7
 45518                                  ;bta6: 
 45519                                  ;	stosb
 45520                                  ;	pop     ax
 45521                                  ;	pop     cx
 45522                                  ;	loop    bta5
 45523                                  ;	retn
 45524                                  
 45525                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 45526                                  BinToAscii:
 45527 00007EA4 B90404                  	mov	cx,404h			; (ch) = digit counter, (cl) = shift cnt
 45528                                  bta5:	
 45529 00007EA7 D3C0                    	ROL	AX,CL			; move leftmost nibble into rightmost
 45530 00007EA9 50                      	push	ax			; preserve remainder of digits
 45531 00007EAA 240F                    	AND	AL,0Fh			; grab low nibble
 45532 00007EAC 0441                    	ADD	AL,'A'			; turn into ascii
 45533 00007EAE AA                      	STOSB				; drop in the character
 45534 00007EAF 58                      	pop	ax			; (ax) = shifted number
 45535 00007EB0 FECD                    	dec	ch
 45536 00007EB2 75F3                    	jnz	short bta5		; process 4 digits
 45537 00007EB4 C3                      	retn
 45538                                  
 45539                                  ;Break	<$CreateTempFile - create a unique name>
 45540                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45541                                  ;   $CreateTemp - given a directory, create a unique name in that directory.
 45542                                  ;	Method used is to get the current time, convert to a name and attempt
 45543                                  ;	a create new. Repeat until create new succeeds.
 45544                                  ;
 45545                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a null terminated directory name.
 45546                                  ;		CX  contains default attributes
 45547                                  ;   Outputs:	Unique name is appended to DS:DX directory.
 45548                                  ;		AX has handle
 45549                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 45550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45551                                  
 45552                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 45553                                  
 45554                                  _$CreateTempFile:
 45555                                  	;Enter
 45556 00007EB5 55                      	push	bp
 45557 00007EB6 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 45558                                  
 45559                                  	;LocalVar  EndPtr,DWORD
 45560                                  	;LocalVar  FilPtr,DWORD
 45561                                  	;LocalVar  Attr,WORD
 45562                                  
 45563 00007EB8 83EC0A                  	sub	sp,10
 45564                                  
 45565                                  	;test	cx,0FFD8h
 45566 00007EBB F7C1D8FF                	test	CX,~attr_changeable
 45567 00007EBF 7405                    	JZ	short OKatts		; Ok if no non-changeable bits set
 45568                                  
 45569                                  ; We need this "hook" here to detect these cases (like user sets one both of
 45570                                  ; vol_id and dir bits) because of the structure of the or $CreateNewFile loop
 45571                                  ; below. The code loops on error_access_denied, but if one of the non
 45572                                  ; changeable attributes is specified, the loop COULD be infinite or WILL be
 45573                                  ; infinite because CreateNewFile will fail with access_denied always. Thus we
 45574                                  ; need to detect these cases before getting to the loop.
 45575                                  
 45576                                  	;mov	ax, 5
 45577 00007EC1 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 45578 00007EC4 EB69                    	JMP	SHORT SETTMPERR
 45579                                  
 45580                                  OKatts:
 45581                                  	;MOV	attr,CX 		; save attribute
 45582 00007EC6 894EF6                  	mov     [bp-10],cx
 45583                                  	;MOV	FilPtrL,DX		; pointer to file
 45584 00007EC9 8956F8                  	mov	[bp-8],dx
 45585                                  	;MOV	FilPtrH,DS
 45586 00007ECC 8C5EFA                  	mov	[bp-6],ds
 45587                                  	;MOV	EndPtrH,DS		; seg pointer to end of dir
 45588 00007ECF 8C5EFE                  	mov	[bp-2],ds
 45589 00007ED2 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 45590 00007ED3 07                      	POP	ES			; destination for nul search
 45591 00007ED4 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 45592 00007ED6 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 45593 00007ED8 F7D9                    	NEG	CX			; number of bytes remaining in segment
 45594                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 45595 00007EDA 09C9                    	OR	CX,CX			;AN000;MS. cx=0 ? ds:dx on segment boundary
 45596 00007EDC 7501                    	JNZ	short okok		;AN000;MS. no
 45597                                  	;MOV	CX,-1			;AN000;MS.
 45598                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 45599                                  	; 17/12/2022
 45600 00007EDE 49                      	dec	cx  ; mov cx,-1
 45601                                  	;mov	cx,-1 ; 0FFFh
 45602                                  okok:					;AN000;
 45603 00007EDF 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			;AN000;
 45604 00007EE1 F2AE                    	REPNZ	SCASB			;AN000;
 45605                                  					;AN000;
 45606 00007EE3 4F                      	DEC	DI			; point back to the null
 45607 00007EE4 268A45FF                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI-1]		; Get char before the NUL
 45608 00007EE8 E832DF                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; Is it a path separator?
 45609 00007EEB 7403                    	JZ	short SETENDPTR		; Yes
 45610                                  STOREPTH:
 45611 00007EED B05C                    	MOV	AL,'\'
 45612 00007EEF AA                      	STOSB				; Add a path separator (and INC DI)
 45613                                  SETENDPTR:
 45614                                  	;MOV	EndPtrL,DI		; pointer to the tail
 45615 00007EF0 8856FC                  	mov	[bp-4],dl
 45616                                  CreateLoop:
 45617 00007EF3 16                      	push	ss			; let ReadTime see variables
 45618 00007EF4 1F                      	pop	ds
 45619 00007EF5 55                      	push	bp
 45620 00007EF6 E8938C                  	call	READTIME		; go get time
 45621 00007EF9 5D                      	pop	bp
 45622                                  ;
 45623                                  ; Time is in CX:DX. Go drop it into the string.
 45624                                  ;
 45625                                  	;les	di,EndPtr		; point to the string
 45626 00007EFA C47EFC                  	les	di,[BP-4]
 45627 00007EFD 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 45628 00007EFF E8A2FF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store upper word
 45629 00007F02 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 45630 00007F04 E89DFF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store lower word
 45631 00007F07 30C0                    	xor	al,al
 45632 00007F09 AA                      	STOSB				; nul terminate
 45633                                  	;LDS	DX,FilPtr		; get name
 45634 00007F0A C556F8                  	lds	dx,[bp-8]
 45635                                  	;MOV	CX,Attr 		; get attr
 45636 00007F0D 8B4EF6                  	mov	cx,[bp-10]
 45637 00007F10 55                      	push	bp
 45638 00007F11 E889FF                  	CALL	_$CreateNewFile		; try to create a new file
 45639 00007F14 5D                      	pop	bp
 45640 00007F15 7319                    	JNC	short CreateDone	; failed, go try again
 45641                                  
 45642                                  ; The operation failed and the error has been mapped in AX. Grab the extended
 45643                                  ; error and figure out what to do.
 45644                                  
 45645                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3			; M049 - start
 45646                                  ;;	mov	ax,[ss:EXTERR]				;smr;SS Override
 45647                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_file_exists
 45648                                  ;;	jz	short CreateLoop	; file existed => try with new name
 45649                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_access_denied
 45650                                  ;;	jz	short CreateLoop	; access denied (attr mismatch)
 45651                                  
 45652                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 45653                                  	;cmp	al,50h
 45654 00007F17 3C50                    	CMP	AL,error_file_exists	; Q: did file already exist
 45655 00007F19 74D8                    	JZ	short CreateLoop	; Y: try again
 45656                                  	;cmp	al,5
 45657 00007F1B 3C05                    	CMP	AL,error_access_denied	; Q: was it access denied
 45658 00007F1D 7510                    	JNZ	short SETTMPERR		; N: Error out
 45659                                  					; Y: Check to see if we got this due
 45660                                  					;    to the network drive. Note that
 45661                                  					;    the redir will set the exterr
 45662                                  					;    to error_cannot_make if this is 
 45663                                  					;    so. 
 45664 00007F1F 36803E[2403]41          	CMP	byte [SS:EXTERR],error_net_access_denied ; M069
 45665                                  					; See if it's REALLY an att mismatch
 45666 00007F25 7408                    	je	short SETTMPERR		; no, network error, stop
 45667                                  ;M070
 45668                                  ; If the user failed on an I24, we do not want to try again
 45669                                  ;
 45670 00007F27 36803E[2403]53          	cmp	byte [SS:EXTERR],error_FAIL_I24 ;User failed on I24? ;M070
 45671                                  	;je	short SETTMPERR		;yes, do not try again ;M070
 45672                                  
 45673                                  	;jmp	short CreateLoop	;attr mismatch, try again ;M070
 45674                                  	; 17/12/2022
 45675 00007F2D 75C4                    	jne	short CreateLoop ; 10/06/2019 
 45676                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 45677                                  	;jz	short SETTMPERR
 45678                                  	;jmp	short CreateLoop
 45679                                  
 45680                                  ;;	MOV	AL,error_access_denied	; Return this "extended" error
 45681                                  					; M049 - end
 45682                                  SETTMPERR:
 45683 00007F2F F9                      	STC
 45684                                  CreateDone:
 45685                                  	;Leave
 45686 00007F30 89EC                    	mov	sp,bp
 45687 00007F32 5D                      	pop	bp
 45688 00007F33 7203                    	JC	short CreateFail
 45689 00007F35 E93887                  	jmp	SYS_RET_OK		; success!
 45690                                  CreateFail:
 45691 00007F38 E93F87                  	jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 45692                                  
 45693                                  ;   SetAttrib will set the search attribute (SAttrib) either to the normal
 45694                                  ;   (CH) or to the value in CL if the current system call is through
 45695                                  ;   serverdoscall.
 45696                                  ;
 45697                                  ;   Inputs:	fSharing == FALSE => set sattrib to CH
 45698                                  ;		fSharing == TRUE => set sattrib to CL
 45699                                  ;   Outputs:	none
 45700                                  ;   Registers changed:	CX
 45701                                  
 45702                                  SetAttrib:

 45705 00007F43 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 45706                                  Set:
 45707 00007F45 36880E[6D05]            	mov	byte [ss:SATTRIB],cl		;smr;SS Override

 45714                                  
 45715                                  ;Break	<Extended_Open- Extended open the file>
 45716                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45717                                  ; Input: AL= 0 reserved  AH=6CH
 45718                                  ;	 BX= mode
 45719                                  ;	 CL= create attribute  CH=search attribute (from server)
 45720                                  ;	 DX= flag
 45721                                  ;	 DS:SI = file name
 45722                                  ;	 ES:DI = parm list
 45723                                  ;			   DD  SET EA list (-1) null
 45724                                  ;			   DW  n  parameters
 45725                                  ;			   DB  type (TTTTTTLL)
 45726                                  ;			   DW  IOMODE
 45727                                  ; Function: Extended Open
 45728                                  ; Output: carry clear
 45729                                  ;		     AX= handle
 45730                                  ;		     CX=1 file opened
 45731                                  ;			2 file created/opened
 45732                                  ;			3 file replaced/opened
 45733                                  ;	  carry set: AX has error code
 45734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45735                                  
 45736                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 45737                                  _$Extended_Open:			  ;AN000;
 45738                                  	;ASSUME	CS:DOSCODE,SS:DOSDATA	  ;AN000;
 45739 00007F4B 368916[F405]            	MOV	[SS:EXTOPEN_FLAG],DX	  ;AN000;EO. save ext. open flag;smr;SS Override
 45740 00007F50 36C706[F705]0000        	MOV	word [SS:EXTOPEN_IO_MODE],0 ;AN000;EO. initialize IO mode;smr;SS Override
 45741                                  	; 17/12/2022
 45742 00007F57 F6C6FE                  	test	dh,0FEh ; 04/12/2022 
 45743                                  	;;test	dx,0FE00h
 45744                                  	;TEST	DX,RESERVED_BITS_MASK	  ;AN000;EO. reserved bits 0  ?
 45745 00007F5A 7545                    	JNZ	short ext_inval2	  ;AN000;EO. no
 45746 00007F5C 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL			  ;AN000;EO. make sure flag is right

 45933                                  ;============================================================================
 45934                                  ; LOCK.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 45935                                  ;============================================================================
 45936                                  ; 14/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 45937                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 45938                                  
 45939                                  ;BREAK <$LockOper - Lock Calls>
 45940                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45941                                  ;
 45942                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 45943                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle	       (DOS 3.3)
 45944                                  ;	    MOV     CX, OffsetHigh
 45945                                  ;	    MOV     DX, OffsetLow
 45946                                  ;	    MOV     SI, LengthHigh
 45947                                  ;	    MOV     DI, LengthLow
 45948                                  ;	    MOV     AH, LockOper
 45949                                  ;	    MOV     AL, Request
 45950                                  ;	    INT     21h
 45951                                  ;
 45952                                  ;   Error returns:
 45953                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 45954                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 45955                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 45956                                  ;
 45957                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 45958                                  ;	    MOV     AX, 5C??	       (DOS 4.00)
 45959                                  ;
 45960                                  ;				    0? lock all
 45961                                  ;				    8? lock write
 45962                                  ;				    ?2 lock multiple
 45963                                  ;				    ?3 unlock multiple
 45964                                  ;				    ?4 lock/read
 45965                                  ;				    ?5 write/unlock
 45966                                  ;				    ?6 add (lseek EOF/lock/write/unlock)
 45967                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle
 45968                                  ;	    MOV     CX, count or size
 45969                                  ;	    LDS     DX, buffer
 45970                                  ;	    INT     21h
 45971                                  ;
 45972                                  ;   Error returns:
 45973                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 45974                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 45975                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 45976                                  ;
 45977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 45978                                  
 45979                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 45980                                  _$LockOper:
 45981 00008096 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1
 45982 00008098 770B                    	JA	short lock_bad_func

 45985 0000809B E8D5F3                  	call	SFFromHandle		       ; ES:DI -> SFT
 45986 0000809E 731D                    	JNC	short lock_do 		       ; have valid handle
 45987 000080A0 5F                      	POP	DI			       ; Clean stack
 45988                                  	;mov	al,6
 45989 000080A1 B006                    	mov	al,error_invalid_handle
 45990                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 45991                                  ;lockoperr:
 45992                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR

 46129                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 46130                                  			; Return: CF set error
 46131                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 46132 000080E1 B80A11                  	mov     ax,110Ah
 46133 000080E4 CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - LOCK REGION OF FILE
 46134                                  			; BX = file handle, CX:DX = starting offset, SI = high word of size
 46135                                  			; STACK: WORD low word of size, ES:DI -> SFT
 46136                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file, SS = DOS CS
 46137                                  			; Return: CF set error
 46138                                  
 46139 000080E6 EBCB                    	JMP	SHORT ValChk
 46140                                  
 46141                                  ; 17/12/2022
 46142                                  %if 0
 46143                                  LOCAL_UNLOCK:
 46144                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 46145                                  	;Call	far [ss:JShare+(7*4)]	; 7 = clr_block ;smr;SS Override
 46146                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 46147                                  	Call	far [JShare+(7*4)]	; 7 = clr_block ;smr;SS Override

 46187                                  ; LOCK_CHECK

 46190                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 46194                                  ;	[PROC_ID] Set
 46195                                  ; Function:
 46196                                  ;	Check for lock violations on local I/O
 46197                                  ;	Retries are attempted with sleeps in between
 46198                                  ; Outputs:
 46199                                  ;    Carry clear
 46200                                  ;	Operation is OK
 46201                                  ;    Carry set
 46202                                  ;	A lock violation detected
 46203                                  ; Outputs of SETUP preserved

 46210                                  LockRetry:

 46212 00008101 50                      	push	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 46213

 46216                                  	;MSDOS 6.0

 46221 00008108 7307                    	jnc	short lc_ret_label ; There are no locks (retnc)
 46222                                  LockN:

 46238                                  ; Function:

 46267 00008134 74DB                    	jz	short lc_ret_label ; 1 = retry, carry clear
 46268 00008136 F9                      	STC
 46269 00008137 C3                      	retn

 46297                                  ; SHARE_CHECK
 46298                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46299                                  ; Inputs:
 46300                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to filled in local file/device SFT for new
 46301                                  ;               instance of file sf_mode ALWAYS has mode (even on FCB SFTs)
 46302                                  ;       [WFP_START] has full path of name
 46303                                  ;       [USER_ID] Set

 46307                                  ; Outputs:

 46310                                  ;    Carry set

 46313                                  ; USES    ALL but DS

 46315

 46317                                  SHARE_CHECK:
 46318                                  	; 26/07/2019

 46320                                  shchk_retn:

 46323                                  ; SHARE_VIOLATION
 46324                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46325                                  ; Inputs:
 46326                                  ;       [THISDPB] Set
 46327                                  ;       AX has error code
 46328                                  ; Function:
 46329                                  ;       Handle Sharing errors
 46330                                  ; Outputs:
 46331                                  ;       Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_sharing_violation
 46332                                  ;       Carry clear if user wants a retry
 46333                                  ;
 46334                                  ; DS, ES, DI preserved, others destroyed
 46335                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46336                                  
 46337                                  SHARE_VIOLATION:
 46338 0000814A 1E                      	PUSH    DS
 46339 0000814B 06                      	PUSH	ES
 46340 0000814C 57                      	PUSH    DI
 46341 0000814D C606[7505]00            	MOV     byte [READOP],0		; All share errors are reading
 46342                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 46343 00008152 C606[4B03]18            	MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 46344 00008157 C42E[8A05]              	LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 46345 0000815B BF0100                  	MOV     DI,1			; Fake some registers
 46346 0000815E 89F9                    	MOV     CX,DI
 46347                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+17]
 46348 00008160 268B5611                	MOV     DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]
 46349 00008164 E820DF                  	call	HARDERR
 46350 00008167 5F                      	POP     DI
 46351 00008168 07                      	POP	ES
 46352 00008169 1F                      	POP     DS
 46353 0000816A 3C01                    	CMP     AL,1
 46354 0000816C 74DB                    	jz	short shchk_retn	; 1 = retry, carry clear
 46355 0000816E F9                      	STC
 46356 0000816F C3                      	retn
 46357                                  
 46358                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46359                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 46360                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 46361                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 46362                                  ;
 46363                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 46364                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 46365                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 46366                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46367                                  
 46368                                  ShareEnd:
 46369                                  	; 26/07/2019
 46370 00008170 FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 46371 00008174 C3                      	retn
 46372                                  
 46373                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 46374                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46375                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 46376                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 46377                                  ;
 46378                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 46379                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 46380                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 46381                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 46382                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 46383                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46384                                  
 46385                                  ShareEnter:
 46386 00008175 51                      	push	cx
 46387                                  retry:
 46388 00008176 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 46389                                  attempt:
 46390 0000817A C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 46391 0000817E 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 46392                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],axfff
 46393 00008180 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 46394 00008184 51                      	push	cx
 46395 00008185 E8BDFF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 46396 00008188 59                      	pop	cx
 46397 00008189 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 46398 0000818B E85496                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 46399 0000818E E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 46400 00008190 E8B7FF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 46401 00008193 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 46402                                  done:
 46403 00008195 59                      	pop	cx
 46404 00008196 C3                      	retn

 46411                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 46412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46413                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 46414                                  ;
 46415                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 46416                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 46417                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 46418                                  ;
 46419                                  ;	Revision history:
 46420                                  ;
 46421                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 46422                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46423                                  
 46424                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46425                                  ;
 46426                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 46427                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 46428                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 46429                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 46430                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 46431                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 46432                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 46433                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 46434                                  ;
 46435                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46436                                  
 46437                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 46438                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 46439                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 46440                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 46441                                  
 46442                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 46443                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 46444                                  
 46445                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 46446                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 46447                                  
 46448                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 46449                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 46450                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 46451                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 46452

 46454                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 46455                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 46456                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2

 46458                                  ;**	Data structure passed for ExecReady call
 46459                                  ;

 46462                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 46463                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 46464                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 46465                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 46466                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 46467                                  ; .size:
 46468                                  ;endstruc
 46469                                  
 46470                                  ;DOSCODE SEGMENT
 46471                                  
 46472                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 46473                                  	; DOSCODE:B3DDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 46474                                  
 46475                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 46476                                  	; DOSCODE:B37Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 46477                                  
 46478                                  ; M028 - BEGIN
 46479                                  
 46480                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46481                                  ;
 46482                                  ;	Procedure Name		: ExecReady
 46483                                  ;
 46484                                  ;	Input			: DS:DX -> ERStruc (see exe.inc)
 46485                                  ;

 46488                                  ExecReady:
 46489 00008197 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 46490                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 46491                                  	; 17/12/2022
 46492 00008199 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 46493                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 46494 0000819D 7413                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 46495                                  
 46496                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 46497 0000819F 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 46498 000081A2 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 46499 000081A5 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 46500                                  
 46501                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 46502 000081A7 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 46503                                  	;mov	cx,[si+12]
 46504 000081AA 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 46505                                  
 46506                                  	;call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 46507 000081AD 36FF16[880D]            	call	word [ss:FixExePatch] ; 28/12/2022
 46508                                  	
 46509                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 46510                                  	;call	[ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 46511                                  
 46512                                  er_setver:
 46513                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 46514                                  	; 17/12/2022
 46515 000081B2 F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 46516                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 46517 000081B6 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 46518                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 46519 000081B8 1E                      	push	ds
 46520 000081B9 56                      	push	si
 46521                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 46522 000081BA C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 46523 000081BD E876ED                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 46524 000081C0 E887ED                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 46525 000081C3 5E                      	pop	si
 46526 000081C4 1F                      	pop	ds
 46527                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 46528 000081C5 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 46529 000081C8 36A1[040F]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 46530 000081CC 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 46531                                  
 46532                                  er_chkdoshi:
 46533 000081D0 36803E[870D]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 46534 000081D6 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 46535                                  
 46536                                  					; M068 - Start
 46537                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 46538 000081D8 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 46539                                  
 46540                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 46541 000081DB 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 46542                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 46543                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 46544                                  					; explanation
 46545                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 46546                                  	; 17/12/2022
 46547 000081E1 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 46548                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 46549 000081E5 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 46550                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 46551 000081E7 1E                         	push	ds
 46552 000081E8 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 46553 000081EA E88E02                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 46554 000081ED 1F                      	pop	ds
 46555                                  
 46556                                  er_setA20:
 46557                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 46558                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 46559                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 46560                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 46561                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 46562                                  
 46563 000081EE 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 46564 000081F3 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 46565                                  					; turned OFF.
 46566                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 46567 000081F7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 46568 000081F9 C3                      	retn
 46569
