 46576                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46577                                  ;
 46578                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 46579                                  ;
 46580                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 46581                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 46582                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 46583                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 46584                                  ;
 46585                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 46586                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 46587                                  ;
 46588                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 46589                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 46590                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 46591                                  ;
 46592                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 46593                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 46594                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 46595                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 46596                                  ; or not.
 46597                                  ;
 46598                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 46599                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 46600                                  ; running in the HMA.
 46601                                  ;
 46602                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 46603                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 46604                                  ;
 46605                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46606                                  
 46607                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 46608                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 46609                                  
 46610                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46611                                  ;
 46612                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 46613                                  ;
 46614                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46615                                  
 46616                                  rpFind1:
 46617                                  	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 46618                                  
 46619                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 46620                                  
 46621                                  ;	cli
 46622                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 46623                                  ;	pusha
 46624                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 46625                                  ;	out	43h, al
 46626                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 46627                                  
 46628                                  rpFind1a:
 46629                                  	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 46630                                  
 46631                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 46632                                  
 46633                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 46634                                  ;	out	37h, al
 46635                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 46636                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 46637                                  
 46638                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 46639                                  
 46640                                  rpFind2:
 46641                                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 46642                                  
 46643                                  rpFind2Len equ	$ - rpFind2
 46644                                  
 46645                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 46646                                  
 46647                                  rpFind3:
 46648                                  	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 46649                                  
 46650                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 46651                                  
 46652                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 46653                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 46654                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 46655                                  
 46656                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 46657                                  
 46658                                  rpRepl2:
 46659                                   	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 46660                                  
 46661                                  rpRepl2Len equ	$ - rpRepl2
 46662                                  
 46663                                  ;	push	eax
 46664                                  ;	push	cx
 46665                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 46666                                  
 46667                                  rpRepl3:
 46668                                  	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 46669                                  
 46670                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 46671                                  
 46672                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 46673                                  ;	pop	cx
 46674                                  ;	pop	eax
 46675                                  
 46676                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 46677                                  
 46678                                  rpFind4:
 46679                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 46680                                  
 46681                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 46682                                  
 46683                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 46684                                  ;	pop	ax
 46685                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 46686                                  
 46687                                  rpFind5:
 46688                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 46689                                  
 46690                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 46691                                  
 46692                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 46693                                  ;	int	67h
 46694                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 46695                                  ;	jmp	bx
 46696                                  
 46697                                  rpRepl4:
 46698                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 46699                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 46700                                  
 46701                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 46702                                  
 46703                                  	db	00h, 00h
 46704                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 46705                                  
 46706                                  rpRepl4o2Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 46707                                  
 46708                                  	db	00h, 00h
 46709                                  
 46710                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 46711                                  
 46712                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 46713                                  ;	pop	ax
 46714                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 46715                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 46716                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 46717                                  
 46718                                  rpRepl5:
 46719                                  	db	8Bh, 0E1h
 46720                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 0A1h
 46721                                  
 46722                                  rpRepl5o1Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 46723                                  
 46724                                  	db	00h, 00h
 46725                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 8Bh, 36h
 46726                                  
 46727                                  rpRepl5o2Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 46728                                  
 46729                                  	db	00h, 00h
 46730                                  	db	0FFh, 0E3h
 46731                                  
 46732                                  rpRepl5Len equ	$ - rpRepl5
 46733                                  
 46734                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 46735                                  ;	mov	eax, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 46736                                  ;	mov	esi, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 46737                                  ;	jmp	bx
 46738                                  
 46739                                  ; bug # 3 -- loss of high EAX, EBX, ECX, EDX on 386+ only if VCPI
 46740                                  
 46741                                  rpFind6:
 46742                                  	db	0FAh, 52h, 51h
 46743                                  
 46744                                  rpFind6Len equ	$ - rpFind6
 46745                                  
 46746                                  ;	cli
 46747                                  ;	push	dx
 46748                                  ;	push	cx
 46749                                  
 46750                                  rpFind7a:
 46751                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 66h, 26h, 0FFh, 1Eh
 46752                                  
 46753                                  rpFind7aLen equ	$ - rpFind7a
 46754                                  
 46755                                  ;	mov	ax, 0DE0Ch
 46756                                  ;	call	fword ptr es:[xxxx]
 46757                                  
 46758                                  rpFind7b:
 46759                                  	db	59h, 5Ah, 5Bh
 46760                                  
 46761                                  rpFind7bLen equ	$ - rpFind7b
 46762                                  
 46763                                  ;	pop	cx
 46764                                  ;	pop	dx
 46765                                  ;	pop	bx
 46766                                  
 46767                                  rpRepl6 :
 46768                                  	db	0FAh, 66h, 50h, 66h, 53h, 66h, 51h, 66h, 52h
 46769                                  
 46770                                  rpRepl6Len equ	$ - rpRepl6
 46771                                  
 46772                                  ;	cli
 46773                                  ;	push	eax
 46774                                  ;	push	ebx
 46775                                  ;	push	ecx
 46776                                  ;	push	edx
 46777                                  
 46778                                  rpRepl7:
 46779                                  	db	66h, 5Ah, 66h, 59h, 66h, 5Bh, 66h, 58h, 5Bh
 46780                                  
 46781                                  rpRepl7Len equ	$ - rpRepl7
 46782                                  
 46783                                  ;	pop	edx
 46784                                  ;	pop	ecx
 46785                                  ;	pop	ebx
 46786                                  ;	pop	eax
 46787                                  ;	pop	bx
 46788                                  
 46789                                  ; bug # 4 -- loss of high EAX and EBX on 386+ only if VCPI
 46790                                  
 46791                                  rpFind8:
 46792                                   	db	60h, 06h, 1Eh, 0B8h, 00h, 00h, 8Eh, 0D8h
 46793                                  
 46794                                  rpFind8Len equ	$ - rpFind8
 46795                                  
 46796                                  ;	pusha
 46797                                  ;	push	es
 46798                                  ;	push	ds
 46799                                  ;	mov	ax, dgroup	;jump back to here from replace8
 46800                                  ;	mov	ds, ax
 46801                                  
 46802                                  rpFind9 :
 46803                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 61h
 46804                                  
 46805                                  rpFind9Len equ	$ - rpFind9
 46806                                  
 46807                                  ;	pop	ds
 46808                                  ;	pop	es
 46809                                  ;	popa
 46810                                  
 46811                                  rpRepl8:
 46812                                   	db	66h, 60h, 06h, 1Eh
 46813                                  
 46814                                  rpRepl8Len equ	$ - rpRepl8
 46815                                  
 46816                                  ;	pushad
 46817                                  ;	push	es
 46818                                  ;	push	ds
 46819                                  
 46820                                  rpRepl9:
 46821                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 66h, 61h, 0C3h
 46822                                  
 46823                                  rpRepl9Len equ	$ - rpRepl9
 46824                                  
 46825                                  ;	pop	ds
 46826                                  ;	pop	es
 46827                                  ;	popad
 46828                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 46829                                  
 46830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46831                                  
 46832                                  struc SearchPair
 46833                                   .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 46834                                   .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 46835                                   .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 46836                                   .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 46837                                   .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 46838                                   .size:
 46839                                  endstruc
 46840                                  
 46841                                  ;rpBug1Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind2, rpFind2Len, offset rpFind3, rpFind3Len, 20h>
 46842                                  
 46843                                  rpBug1Strs:
 46844                                  	dw	rpFind2
 46845                                  	dw	rpFind2Len ; 3
 46846                                  	dw	rpFind3
 46847                                  	dw	rpFind3Len ; 4
 46848                                  	dw	20h
 46849                                  
 46850                                  ;rpBug2Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind4, rpFind4Len, offset rpFind5, rpFind5Len, 80h>
 46851                                  
 46852                                  rpBug2Strs:
 46853                                  	dw	rpFind4
 46854                                  	dw	rpFind4Len ; 4
 46855                                  	dw	rpFind5
 46856                                  	dw	rpFind5Len ; 9
 46857                                  	dw	80h
 46858                                  
 46859                                  ;rpBug3Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind6, rpFind6Len, offset rpFind7a, rpFind7aLen, 80h>
 46860                                  
 46861                                  rpBug3Strs:
 46862                                  	dw	rpFind6
 46863                                  	dw	rpFind6Len ; 3
 46864                                  	dw	rpFind7a
 46865                                  	dw	rpFind7aLen ; 7
 46866                                  	dw	80h
 46867                                  
 46868                                  ;rpBug4Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind8, 4, offset rpFind9, rpFind9Len, 80h>
 46869                                  
 46870                                  rpBug4Strs:
 46871                                  	dw	rpFind8
 46872                                  	dw	4
 46873                                  	dw	rpFind9
 46874                                  	dw	rpFind9Len ; 3
 46875                                  	dw	80h
 46876                                  
 46877                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46878                                  
 46879                                  struc StackVars
 46880                                   .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 46881                                   .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 46882                                   .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 46883                                   .size:
 46884                                  endstruc
 46885                                  
 46886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46887                                  
 46888                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 46889                                  
 46890                                  Rational386Patch:
 46891                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 46892                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 46893                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 46894                                  
 46895                                  	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 46896                                  	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 46897                                  
 46898                                  	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 46899                                  	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 46900                                  
 46901                                  	push	ax
 46902                                  
 46903                                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 46904                                  	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 46905                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 46906                                  	cmp	[es:28],ax
 46907                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 46908                                  	cmp	[es:36],ax
 46909                                  	je	short rp3Maybe
 46910                                  rp3QO_ax:
 46911                                  	pop	ax
 46912                                  rp3QuickOut:
 46913                                  	retn
 46914                                  
 46915                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 46916                                  
 46917                                  rp3Maybe:
 46918                                  	cld
 46919                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 46920                                  	push	cx
 46921                                  	push	dx
 46922                                  	push	si
 46923                                  	push	di
 46924                                  	push	es
 46925                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 46926                                  	push	bp
 46927                                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 46928                                  	mov	bp,sp
 46929                                  
 46930                                  	push	cs
 46931                                  	pop	ds
 46932                                  
 46933                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 46934                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 46935                                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 46936                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 46937                                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 46938                                  	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 46939                                  
 46940                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 46941                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 46942                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 46943                                  ; an 80286 system.
 46944                                  
 46945                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 46946                                  
 46947                                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 46948                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 46949                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 46950                                  
 46951                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 46952                                  
 46953                                  	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 46954                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 46955                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 46956                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 46957                                  
 46958                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 46959                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 46960                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 46961                                  
 46962                                  	mov	si,rpFind1a
 46963                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1aLen  ;8
 46964                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 46965                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 46966                                  
 46967                                  rp3Exit_j:
 46968                                  	jmp	rp3Exit
 46969                                  
 46970                                  ; Found the location to write patch code! DI = offset in code seg.
 46971                                  
 46972                                  rpGotPatch:
 46973                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 46974                                  	mov	[bp-StackVars.sv_pPatch],di	; save patch pointer
 46975                                  
 46976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 46977                                  ; Bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 46978                                  
 46979                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],381
 46980                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],381 ; only need bug 1 if version
 46981                                  	cmp	word [bp],381
 46982                                  	jae	short rpBug2			;   < 3.81
 46983                                  
 46984                                  	mov	bx,rpBug1Strs			; locate find2 & find3 code
 46985                                  	call	FindBadCode
 46986                                  	jc	short rpBug2
 46987                                  
 46988                                  ; si = rpFind2 offset, di = rpFind3 offset
 46989                                  
 46990                                  	push	di
 46991                                  	mov	di,si				; rpFind2 offset
 46992                                  	mov	dx,rpFind2Len ; 3
 46993                                  
 46994                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],51h	 	; find2 preceeded by push cx?
 46995                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx
 46996                                  
 46997                                  	dec	di				;   yes, gobble up push cx too
 46998                                  	inc	dx
 46999                                  rp_no_cx:
 47000                                  	mov	si,rpRepl2			; patch out find2 sequence
 47001                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl2Len  ; 6
 47002                                  	call	GenPatch
 47003                                  
 47004                                  	pop	di				; rpFind3 offset
 47005                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],59h 		; find3 preceeded by pop cx?
 47006                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx2
 47007                                  
 47008                                  	mov	byte [es:di-1],90h		;   yes, no-op it
 47009                                  rp_no_cx2:
 47010                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 47011                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; change offset of far jmp
 47012                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],ax
 47013                                  	mov	[es:di+rpFind3Len],ax		;   to go to patch code
 47014                                  
 47015                                  	push	di				; save find3 offset
 47016                                  	mov	si,rpRepl3			; copy repl3 to patch area
 47017                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl3Len ; 5
 47018                                  	call	CopyPatch
 47019                                  
 47020                                  	pop	bx				; find3 offset
 47021                                  	add	bx,rpFind3Len+4	 ; 8		; skip over find3 and far jmp
 47022                                  	call	GenJump 			; jmp back from patch area
 47023                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 47024                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch], di	;   to main-line, update patch
 47025                                  						;   area pointer
 47026                                  
 47027                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47028                                  ; Bug # 2 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 47029                                  
 47030                                  rpBug2:
 47031                                  	mov	bx,rpBug2Strs			; locate find4 & find5 code
 47032                                  	call	FindBadCode
 47033                                  	jc	short rpBug3
 47034                                  
 47035                                  ; si = rpFind4 offset, di = rpFind5 offset
 47036                                  
 47037                                  	;push	word [bp+4]
 47038                                  	push	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; save current patch pointer
 47039                                  						;   (where repl4 goes)
 47040                                  	push	di				; save find5 offset
 47041                                  
 47042                                  	mov	di,si
 47043                                  	mov	dx,rpFind4Len ; 4
 47044                                  	mov	si,rpRepl4
 47045                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl4Len ; 15
 47046                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find4 code
 47047                                  
 47048                                  	pop	di				; find5 offset
 47049                                  	add	di,5				; keep 5 bytes of find5 code
 47050                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 47051                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; jump to patch area
 47052                                  	push	bx				; save repl5 location
 47053                                  	call	GenJump
 47054                                  
 47055                                  	mov	si,rpRepl5			; copy repl5 code to patch
 47056                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl5Len  ; 15		;   area -- it has a jmp bx
 47057                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no need to jmp back to
 47058                                  						;   main-line code
 47059                                  
 47060                                  ; patches have been made, now update the patch code to store/load dwords just
 47061                                  ; after the code in the patch area
 47062                                  
 47063                                  	pop	di				; repl5 location
 47064                                  	pop	si				; repl4 location
 47065                                  
 47066                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 47067                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; (where dwords go)
 47068                                  
 47069                                  	;mov	[es:si+7],ax
 47070                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o1Len],ax		; offset for EAX
 47071                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 47072                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o1Len],ax
 47073                                  	add	ax,4
 47074                                  	;mov	[es:si+0Dh],ax
 47075                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o2Len],ax		; offset for ESI
 47076                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],ax
 47077                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o2Len],ax
 47078                                  
 47079                                  	;add	word [bp+4],8
 47080                                  	add	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],8	; reserve space for 2 dwords in
 47081                                  						; patch area
 47082                                  
 47083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47084                                  ; Bug # 3 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 47085                                  
 47086                                  rpBug3:
 47087                                  	mov	bx,rpBug3Strs			; locate find6 & find7a code
 47088                                  	call	FindBadCode
 47089                                  	jc	short rpBug4
 47090                                  
 47091                                  	;add	di,9
 47092                                  	add	di,rpFind7aLen + 2		; skip over offset in find7a
 47093                                  	push	si				;   code and locate find7b
 47094                                  	mov	si,rpFind7b			;   sequence
 47095                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 47096                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di
 47097                                  	pop	si
 47098                                  	jnz	short rpBug4
 47099                                  
 47100                                  	push	di				; save find7b code offset
 47101                                  
 47102                                  	mov	di,si
 47103                                  	mov	dx,rpFind6Len ; 3
 47104                                  	mov	si,rpRepl6
 47105                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl6Len ; 9
 47106                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find6 code
 47107                                  
 47108                                  	pop	di
 47109                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 47110                                  	mov	si,rpRepl7
 47111                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl7Len ; 9
 47112                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find7b code
 47113                                  
 47114                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47115                                  ; Bug # 4 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 47116                                  
 47117                                  rpBug4:
 47118                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],360
 47119                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],360 ; only applies if 
 47120                                  	cmp	word [bp],360
 47121                                  	jbe	short rp3Exit 			; version > 3.60 and < 3.95
 47122                                  
 47123                                  	mov	bx,rpBug4Strs			; locate find8 & find9 code
 47124                                  	call	FindBadCode
 47125                                  	jc	short rp3Exit
 47126                                  
 47127                                  	push	di				; save find9 code offset
 47128                                  
 47129                                  	mov	di,si
 47130                                  	mov	dx,3
 47131                                  	mov	si,rpRepl8
 47132                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl8Len ; 4
 47133                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find8 code
 47134                                  
 47135                                  	pop	di				; find9 offset
 47136                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 47137                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; patch find9 to jmp to
 47138                                  	call	GenJump 			;   patch area
 47139                                  
 47140                                  	mov	si,rpRepl9			; copy replacement code to
 47141                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl9Len ; 5		;   patch area--it does a RET
 47142                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no jmp back to main-line
 47143                                  
 47144                                  rp3Exit:
 47145                                  	add	sp,StackVars.size
 47146                                  	pop	bp
 47147                                  	pop	ds
 47148                                  	pop	es
 47149                                  	pop	di
 47150                                  	pop	si
 47151                                  	pop	dx
 47152                                  	pop	cx
 47153                                  	pop	bx
 47154                                  	pop	ax
 47155                                  	retn
 47156                                  
 47157                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47158                                  ;
 47159                                  ; FindBadCode
 47160                                  ;
 47161                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 47162                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 47163                                  ;
 47164                                  ; Entry:
 47165                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 47166                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 47167                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 47168                                  ;
 47169                                  ; Exit:
 47170                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 47171                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 47172                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 47173                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 47174                                  ;
 47175                                  ; Used:
 47176                                  ;	CX
 47177                                  ;
 47178                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47179                                  
 47180                                  ;struc SearchPair
 47181                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 47182                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 47183                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 47184                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 47185                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 47186                                  ; .size:
 47187                                  ;endstruc
 47188                                  
 47189                                  FindBadCode:
 47190                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 47191                                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 47192                                  
 47193                                  	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 47194                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 47195                                  	
 47196                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 47197                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 47198                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 47199                                  	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 47200                                  
 47201                                  	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 47202                                  
 47203                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 47204                                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 47205                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 47206                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 47207                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 47208                                  
 47209                                  	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 47210                                  	jnz	short fbc_error
 47211                                  
 47212                                  	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 47213                                  	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 47214                                  	jc	short fbc_error
 47215                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 47216                                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 47217                                  	ja	short fbc_error
 47218                                  
 47219                                  	clc
 47220                                  	retn
 47221                                  
 47222                                  fbc_error:
 47223                                  	stc
 47224                                  	retn
 47225                                  
 47226                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47227                                  ;
 47228                                  ; GenPatch
 47229                                  ;
 47230                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 47231                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 47232                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 47233                                  ; code.
 47234                                  ;
 47235                                  ; Entry:
 47236                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 47237                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 47238                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 47239                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 47240                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 47241                                  ;
 47242                                  ; Exit:
 47243                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 47244                                  ;
 47245                                  ; Used:
 47246                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 47247                                  ;
 47248                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47249                                  
 47250                                  GenPatch:
 47251                                  	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 47252                                  
 47253                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 47254                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 47255                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 47256                                  	call	GenJump
 47257                                  
 47258                                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 47259                                  
 47260                                  	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 47261                                  	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 47262                                  
 47263                                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 47264                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 47265                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 47266                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 47267                                  	retn
 47268                                  
 47269                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47270                                  ;
 47271                                  ; CopyPatch
 47272                                  ;
 47273                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 47274                                  ;
 47275                                  ; Entry:
 47276                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 47277                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 47278                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 47279                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 47280                                  ;
 47281                                  ; Exit:
 47282                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 47283                                  ;
 47284                                  ; Used:
 47285                                  ;	SI, Flags
 47286                                  ;
 47287                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47288                                  
 47289                                  CopyPatch:
 47290                                  	push	cx
 47291                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 47292                                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 47293                                  	cld
 47294                                  	rep movsb
 47295                                  	pop	cx
 47296                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 47297                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 47298                                  	retn
 47299                                  
 47300                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47301                                  ;
 47302                                  ; GenJump
 47303                                  ;
 47304                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 47305                                  ;
 47306                                  ; Entry:
 47307                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 47308                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 47309                                  ;
 47310                                  ; Exit:
 47311                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 47312                                  ;
 47313                                  ; Used:
 47314                                  ;	AX
 47315                                  ;
 47316                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47317                                  
 47318                                  GenJump:
 47319                                  	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 47320                                  	stosb
 47321                                  
 47322                                  	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 47323                                  	sub	ax,di
 47324                                  	sub	ax,2
 47325                                  
 47326                                  	stosw			; output offset
 47327                                  
 47328                                  	retn
 47329                                  
 47330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47331                                  ;
 47332                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 47333                                  ;
 47334                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 47335                                  ;
 47336                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 47337                                  ;
 47338                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47339                                  
 47340                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 47341                                  	mov	di,200h
 47342                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 47343                                  	push	cx
 47344                                  	sub	cx,dx
 47345                                  	inc	cx
 47346                                  scsagain:
 47347                                  	push	si
 47348                                  	push	di
 47349                                  	push	cx
 47350                                  	mov	cx,dx
 47351                                  	rep	cmpsb
 47352                                  	pop	cx
 47353                                  	pop	di
 47354                                  	pop	si
 47355                                  	je	short scsfound
 47356                                  	inc	di
 47357                                  	loop	scsagain
 47358                                  scsfound:
 47359                                  	pop	cx
 47360                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 47361                                  	retn
 47362                                  	
 47363                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47364                                  ;
 47365                                  ; VerifyVersion
 47366                                  ;
 47367                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 47368                                  ; from ES:2A.
 47369                                  ;
 47370                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 47371                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 47372                                  ;
 47373                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47374                                  
 47375                                  VerifyVersion:
 47376                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 47377                                  					;  in ascii
 47378                                  	mov	bl,10
 47379                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 47380                                  
 47381                                  	call	VVDigit
 47382                                  	jne	short vvexit
 47383                                  	call	VVDigit
 47384                                  	jne	short vvexit
 47385                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 47386                                  	jne	short vvexit
 47387                                  	dec	si
 47388                                  	;call	VVDigit
 47389                                  	; 18/12/2022
 47390                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 47391                                  ;vvexit:
 47392                                  	;retn
 47393                                  VVDigit:
 47394                                  	div	bl
 47395                                  	add	ah,'0'
 47396                                  	dec	si
 47397                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 47398                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 47399                                  	retn
 47400                                  
 47401                                  %endif
 47402

 47670                                  ; Procedure Name 	: ExePackPatch
 47671                                  ;
 47672                                  ; Inputs	 	: DS 			-> DOSDATA
 47673                                  ;			  ES:0 			-> read in image
 47674                                  ;			  ax:cx = start cs:ip of program
 47675                                  ; Output		:		
 47676                                  ;
 47677                                  ;	1. If ES <= 0fffh
 47678                                  ;	   2. if exepack signature ('RB') found
 47679                                  ;	      3. if common code to patch compares (for 3 diff. versions)
 47680                                  ;	       	 4. if rest of the code & checksum compares
 47681                                  ;	  	    5. overlay buggy code with code in 
 47682                                  ;		       doscode:str1.
 47683                                  ;		 6. endif
 47684                                  ;	      7. endif
 47685                                  ;	   8. endif
 47686                                  ;	9. endif

 47689                                  ; Uses			: NONE

 47898 00008433 B92000                  	mov	cx,size_scan_com
 47899                                  
 47900 00008436 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb	       
 47901                                  
 47902                                  					; M046 - start
 47903                                  	; a fourth possible version of these exepacked programs have a 
 47904                                  	; 056h instead of 06Bh. See scan_com above
 47905                                  	;
 47906                                  	; 	db  75h, 6Bh		;jne CorruptExe		
 47907                                  	;

 47909                                  	; we shall try to match the rest of the string
 47910                                  	;
 47911                                  
 47912 00008438 7409                    	jz	short ccs_done
 47913 0000843A 26807DFF56              	cmp	byte [es:di-1],56h
 47914 0000843F 7502                    	jnz	short ccs_done
 47915

 47917                                  ccs_done:				; M046 - end
 47918 00008443 C3                      	retn
 47919                                  
 47920                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47921                                  ;
 47922                                  ;	Procedure Name	: chk_patchsum
 47923                                  ;
 47924                                  ;	Input		: DS:SI -> string we're looking for
 47925                                  ;			: ES:DI -> offset in packed file
 47926                                  ;			: CX 	= scan length
 47927                                  ;			: BX	= length of check sum
 47928                                  ;			: AX 	= value of check sum
 47929                                  ;
 47930                                  ;	Output		: if patch & check sum compare
 47931                                  ;				NC
 47932                                  ;			  else
 47933                                  ;				CY
 47934                                  ;
 47935                                  ;	Uses		: AX, BX, CX, SI
 47936                                  ;
 47937                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47938                                  
 47939                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 47940                                  chk_patchsum:
 47941 00008444 57                      	push	di
 47942                                  
 47943 00008445 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb			   
 47944                                  
 47945 00008447 7518                    	jnz	short cp_fail		; Q: does the patch match
 47946                                  					; N: exit
 47947                                  					; Y:	
 47948                                  
 47949                                  		; we do a check sum starting from the location of the 
 47950                                  		; exepack signature 'RB' up to 11c/2 bytes, the end of the
 47951                                  		; unpacking code.
 47952                                  
 47953 00008449 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; di -> start of unpack code
 47954 0000844E 89D9                    	mov	cx,bx			; cx = length of check sum
 47955                                  
 47956 00008450 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; save check sum passed to us in bx
 47957 00008452 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 47958                                  ep_chksum:
 47959 00008454 260305                  	add	ax,[es:di]
 47960 00008457 83C702                  	add	di,2
 47961 0000845A E2F8                    	loop	ep_chksum
 47962                                  
 47963 0000845C 5F                      	pop	di			; restore di
 47964                                  
 47965 0000845D 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		 	; Q: does the check sum match
 47966                                  	;jne	short cp_fail		; N: exit
 47967                                  					; Y: 
 47968                                  	; 25/09/2023
 47969                                  	;clc	
 47970                                  	;retn
 47971 0000845F 74E2                    	je	short ccs_done ; cf=0
 47972                                  	
 47973                                  cp_fail:
 47974 00008461 F9                      	stc
 47975 00008462 C3                      	retn

 47977                                  ; 28/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.1
 47978                                  %if 0

 47980                                  
 47981                                  
 47982                                  ; M020 : BEGIN
 47983                                  ;
 47984                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47985                                  ;
 47986                                  ; procedure : RationalPatch
 47987                                  ;
 47988                                  ; A routine (in Ration DOS extender) which is invoked at hardware interrupts
 47989                                  ; clobbers CX register on 286 machines. (123 release 3 uses Rational DOS
 47990                                  ; extender). This routine identifies Buggy Rational EXEs and fixes the bug.
 47991                                  ;
 47992                                  ; THE BUG is in the following code sequence:
 47993                                  ;
 47994                                  ;8b 0e 10 00	mov	cx, ds:[10h]		; delay count
 47995                                  ;90		even				; word align
 47996                                  ;e2 fe		loop	$			; wait		CLOBBERS CX
 47997                                  ;e8 xx xx	call	set_A20			; enable A20
 47998                                  ;
 47999                                  ; This patch routine replaces the mov & the loop with a far call into a
 48000                                  ; routine in DOS data segment which is in low memory (because A20 line
 48001                                  ; is off). The routine (RatBugCode) in DOS data saves & restores CX around
 48002                                  ; a mov & loop.
 48003                                  ;
 48004                                  ; Identification of Buggy Rational EXE
 48005                                  ; ====================================
 48006                                  ;
 48007                                  ; (ALL OFFSETS ARE IN THE PROGRAM SECTION - EXCLUDING THE EXE HEADER)
 48008                                  ;
 48009                                  ; OFFSET				Contains
 48010                                  ; ------				--------
 48011                                  ; 0000h			100 times Version number in binary
 48012                                  ;			bug exists in version 3.48 thru 3.83 (both inclusive)
 48013                                  ;
 48014                                  ; 000ah			the WORDS : 0000h, 0020h, 0000h, 0040h, 0001h
 48015                                  ;
 48016                                  ; 002ah			offset where version number is stored in ASCII
 48017                                  ;				e.g. '3.48A'
 48018                                  ;
 48019                                  ; 0030h			offset of copyright string. Copyright strings either
 48020                                  ;			start with "DOS/16M Copyright...." or
 48021                                  ;			"Copyright.....". The string contains
 48022                                  ;			"Rational Systems, Inc."
 48023                                  ;
 48024                                  ; 0020h			word : Paragraph offset of the buggy code segment
 48025                                  ;				from the program image
 48026                                  ; 0016h			word : size of buggy code segment
 48027                                  ;
 48028                                  ;	Buggy code is definite to start after offset 200h in its segment
 48029                                  ;
 48030                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48031                                  
 48032                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48033                                  ; DOSCODE:B976h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 48034                                  
 48035                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48036                                  ; DOSCODE:B654h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 48037                                  
 48038                                  RScanPattern1:
 48039                                  	db	0, 0, 20h, 0, 0, 0, 40h, 0, 1, 0
 48040                                  
 48041                                  RLen1 equ $ - RScanPattern1
 48042                                  
 48043                                  RScanPattern2:
 48044                                  	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 90h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 48045                                  
 48046                                  RLen2 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 48047                                  
 48048                                  RScanPattern3:
 48049                                  	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 48050                                  
 48051                                  RLen3 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 48052                                  
 48053                                  ; DOSCODE:B98Fh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 48054                                  ; DOSCODE:B66Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 48055                                  
 48056                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48057                                  ;
 48058                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 48059                                  ;
 48060                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48061                                  
 48062                                  RationalPatch:
 48063                                  	cld
 48064                                  	push	ax
 48065                                  	push	bx
 48066                                  	push	cx
 48067                                  	push	dx
 48068                                  	push	si
 48069                                  	push	di
 48070                                  	push	es
 48071                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 48072                                  	mov	di,0Ah			; look for pat1 at offset 0Ah
 48073                                  	push	cs
 48074                                  	pop	ds
 48075                                  	
 48076                                  	mov	si,RScanPattern1
 48077                                  	;mov	cx,10
 48078                                  	mov	cx,RLen1
 48079                                  	rep	cmpsb			; do we have the pattern ?
 48080                                  	jne	short rpexit
 48081                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]
 48082                                  	cmp	ax,348			; is it a buggy version ?
 48083                                  	jb	short rpexit
 48084                                  	cmp	ax,383			; is it a buggy version
 48085                                  	ja	short rpexit
 48086                                  
 48087                                  	call	VerifyVersion
 48088                                  	jne	short rpexit
 48089                                  
 48090                                  	mov	cx,[es:16h]		; Length of buggy code seg
 48091                                  	sub	cx,200h			; Length we search (we start
 48092                                  					;  at offset 200h)
 48093                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=buggy code segment
 48094                                  	mov	si,RScanPattern2
 48095                                  	;mov	dx,8	
 48096                                  	mov	dx,RLen2
 48097                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq with nop
 48098                                  	jz	short rpfound
 48099                                  
 48100                                  	mov	si,RScanPattern3
 48101                                  	;mov	dx,15
 48102                                  	mov	dx,RLen3
 48103                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq w/o nop
 48104                                  	jnz	short rpexit
 48105                                  
 48106                                  rpfound:
 48107                                  	
 48108                                  ;	we set up a far call into DOS data
 48109                                  ;	dx has the length of the code seq we were searching for
 48110                                  
 48111                                  	mov	al,9Ah			; far call opcode
 48112                                  	stosb
 48113                                  	mov	ax,RatBugCode
 48114                                  	stosw
 48115                                  	mov	ax,ss
 48116                                  	stosw
 48117                                  	mov	cx,dx
 48118                                  	sub	cx,6			; filler (with NOPs)
 48119                                  	mov	al,90h
 48120                                  	rep	stosb
 48121                                  rpexit:
 48122                                  	pop	ds
 48123                                  	pop	es
 48124                                  	pop	di
 48125                                  	pop	si
 48126                                  	pop	dx
 48127                                  	pop	cx
 48128                                  	pop	bx
 48129                                  	pop	ax
 48130                                  	retn
 48131                                  
 48132                                  ; M020 END
 48133                                  
 48134                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48135                                  ; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 48136                                  
 48137                                  ; DOSCODE:B6D8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 48138                                  
 48139                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48140                                  ;
 48141                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 48142                                  ;
 48143                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 48144                                  ;
 48145                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 48146                                  ;
 48147                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48148                                  
 48149                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 48150                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48151                                  	mov	di,200h
 48152                                  ;ScanCodeSeq_di:
 48153                                  	push	cx
 48154                                  	sub	cx,dx
 48155                                  	inc	cx
 48156                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48157                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 48158                                  	;mov	di,200h
 48159                                  scsagain:
 48160                                  	push	si
 48161                                  	push	di
 48162                                  	push	cx
 48163                                  	mov	cx,dx
 48164                                  	rep	cmpsb
 48165                                  	pop	cx
 48166                                  	pop	di
 48167                                  	pop	si
 48168                                  	je	short scsfound
 48169                                  	inc	di
 48170                                  	loop	scsagain
 48171                                  scsfound:
 48172                                  	pop	cx
 48173                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 48174                                  	retn
 48175                                  
 48176                                  
 48177                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48178                                  ; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 48179                                  
 48180                                  ; DOSCODE:B6F0h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 48181                                  
 48182                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48183                                  ;
 48184                                  ; VerifyVersion
 48185                                  ;
 48186                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 48187                                  ; from ES:2A.
 48188                                  ;
 48189                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 48190                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 48191                                  ;
 48192                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48193                                  
 48194                                  VerifyVersion:
 48195                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 48196                                  					;  in ascii
 48197                                  	mov	bl,10
 48198                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 48199                                  
 48200                                  	call	VVDigit
 48201                                  	jne	short vvexit
 48202                                  	call	VVDigit
 48203                                  	jne	short vvexit
 48204                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.' ; 2Eh
 48205                                  	jne	short vvexit
 48206                                  	dec	si
 48207                                  	;call	VVDigit
 48208                                  	; 18/12/2022
 48209                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 48210                                  ;vvexit:
 48211                                  	;retn
 48212                                  VVDigit:
 48213                                  	div	bl
 48214                                  	add	ah,'0' ; 30h
 48215                                  	dec	si
 48216                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 48217                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 48218                                  	retn
 48219                                  
 48220                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 48221                                  %endif	; 28/12/2022
 48222                                  
 48223                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48224                                  ;
 48225                                  ;	M068
 48226                                  ;
 48227                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: IsCopyProt
 48228                                  ;
 48229                                  ;	Inputs		: DS:100 -> start of com file just read in
 48230                                  ;
 48231                                  ;	Outputs		: sets the A20OFF_COUNT variable to 10 if 
 48232                                  ;			  the program loaded in DS:100 uses a MICROSOFT
 48233                                  ;			  copy protect scheme that relies on the A20 line
 48234                                  ;			  being turned off for it's scheme to work.
 48235                                  ;
 48236                                  ;			  Note: The int 21 function dispatcher will turn 
 48237                                  ;				a20 off, if the A20OFF_COUNT is non-zero 
 48238                                  ;				and dec the A20OFF_COUNT before	iretting 
 48239                                  ;				to the user. 
 48240                                  ;
 48241                                  ;	Uses		: ES, DI, SI, CX
 48242                                  ;
 48243                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48244                                  
 48245                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48246                                  
 48247                                  CPStartOffset	EQU	0175h
 48248                                  CPID1Offset	EQU	011Bh
 48249                                  CPID2Offset	EQU	0173h
 48250                                  CPID3Offset	EQU	0146h
 48251                                  CPID4Offset	EQU	0124h
 48252                                  ID1		EQU	05343h
 48253                                  ID2		EQU	05044h
 48254                                  ID3		EQU	0F413h
 48255                                  ID4		EQU	08000h
 48256                                  
 48257                                  ; DOSCODE:B9FAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 48258                                  
 48259                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48260                                  ; DOSCODE:B71Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 48261                                  
 48262                                  CPScanPattern:
 48263 00008463 89264801                	db	89h,26h,48h,01h		 ; mov [148],sp
 48264 00008467 8C0E4C01                	db	8Ch,0Eh,4Ch,01h		 ; mov [14C],cs
 48265 0000846B C7064A010001            	db	0C7h,06h,4Ah,01h,00h,01h ; mov [14A],100h 
 48266 00008471 8C0E1301                	db 	8Ch,0Eh,13h,01h		 ; mov [113],cs
 48267 00008475 B82001                  	db	0B8h,20h,01h		 ; mov ax,120h
 48268 00008478 BE0001                  	db	0BEh,00h,01h		 ; mov si,100h
 48269                                  
 48270                                  CPSPlen	EQU $ - CPScanPattern
 48271                                  
 48272                                  ; DOSCODE:BA12h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 48273                                  ; DOSCODE:B734h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 48274                                  
 48275                                  IsCopyProt:
 48276 0000847B 813E1B014353            	cmp	word [CPID1Offset],ID1
 48277 00008481 752D                    	jne	short CP_done
 48278                                  
 48279 00008483 813E73014450            	cmp	word [CPID2Offset],ID2
 48280 00008489 7525                    	jne	short CP_done
 48281                                  
 48282 0000848B 813E460113F4            	cmp	word [CPID3Offset],ID3
 48283 00008491 751D                    	jne	short CP_done
 48284                                  
 48285 00008493 813E24010080            	cmp	word [CPID4Offset],ID4
 48286 00008499 7515                    	jne	short CP_done
 48287                                  
 48288 0000849B 0E                      	push	cs
 48289 0000849C 07                      	pop	es
 48290 0000849D BF[6384]                	mov	di,CPScanPattern	; es:di -> Pattern to find
 48291                                  
 48292 000084A0 BE7501                  	mov	si,CPStartOffset	; ds:si -> possible location 
 48293                                  					; of pattern
 48294                                  
 48295 000084A3 B91800                  	mov	cx,CPSPlen ; 24		; cx = length of pattern
 48296 000084A6 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 48297 000084A8 7506                    	jnz	short CP_done
 48298                                  
 48299 000084AA 36C606[8500]0A          	mov	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT],0Ah ; M071
 48300                                  CP_done:
 48301 000084B0 C3                      	retn
 48302
